ancillaries_colour_text_mixu_wef_wychwet.value_translated: Una espada forja un nuevo comienzo. La otra pone fin a una era. Juntas, traen el ciclo de renacimiento que sustenta la debilitada Trama.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_main_anc_enc.value_original: This war horn was made in Cathay and the legends say it holds a powerful curse..
ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_main_anc_enc.value_translated: Este cuerno de guerra fue fabricado en Cathay y las leyendas dicen que contiene una poderosa maldición.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_original: Upon this scroll is written the 'Amber Trance'; as the foes slowly turn to amber their morale is sapped away!
ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_translated: En este pergamino está escrito el "Trance de Ámbar"; mientras los enemigos lentamente se transforman en ámbar, su moral se desvanece.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_original: This gnarled staff looks out of place among the refined possession of the Elves. However, looks are oft deceiving…
ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_translated: Este bastón nudoso parece fuera de lugar entre las posesiones refinadas de los Elfos. Sin embargo, las apariencias suelen ser engañosas…

ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_original: A long twisted and gnarled stave fashioned from the rare and innately magical Wych Elm tree is a much sought-after tool. This tree draws magical power out of the ground and stores it in its wood. Any wand cut from such a tree may have centuries of stored magical power locked within it.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_translated: Un largo bastón torcido y nudoso elaborado con el raro y mágicamente innato olmo mágico, es una herramienta muy buscada. Este árbol extrae poder mágico del suelo y lo almacena en su madera. Cualquier vara cortada de tal árbol puede contener siglos de poder mágico almacenado.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_original: Such is the bountiful magic in these acorns that they can grow from seed to sapling, to towering oak in a matter of seconds. This magic too is the reason that the seeds must be gathered swiftly upon their fall.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh2_mixu_craftin.value_translated: Tal es la abundante magia en estas bellotas que pueden crecer de semilla a retoño, y de ahí a un imponente roble en cuestión de segundos. Esta magia también es la razón por la cual las semillas deben ser recogidas rápidamente tras su caída.

ancillaries_colour_text_wh_anc_grimm_bur.value_original: Flying machines are disregarded by older engineers, but that hasn't stopped Grimm Burloksson from building his own Gyrobomber. Capable of releasing a payload of high-yield explosives that wreak havoc on enemy lines.
ancillaries_colour_text_wh_anc_grimm_bur.value_translated: Las máquinas voladoras son despreciadas por los ingenieros más veteranos, pero eso no ha detenido a Grimm Burloksson de construir su propio Girobombardero. Capaz de soltar una carga de explosivos de alto rendimiento que causa estragos en las líneas enemigas.

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_bst_ghorr.value_translated: El Cráneo del Señor de los Unicornios

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_chs_egrim.value_translated: Espada Rúnica del Caos de Egrimm

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_cst_drekl.value_translated: Cráneo Blanqueado por el Sol del Rey Kalhazzar
El Garfio de Plata de Sartosa

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_dwf_grimm.value_translated: Guantelete de Vapor Refinado de Grimm
Guantelete de Vapor Perfeccionado de Grimm
Guantelete de Vapor Reforjado de Grimm
Yelmo de Batalla Refinado de Grimm
Yelmo de Batalla Perfeccionado de Grimm
Yelmo de Batalla Reforjado de Grimm
Hacha de Engranajes Refinada de Grimm
Hacha de Engranajes Perfeccionada de Grimm
Hacha de Engranajes Reforjada de Grimm

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_dwf_kazad.value_original: Armour of the King of Karak Azul
ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_dwf_kazad.value_translated: Armadura del Rey de Karak Azul

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_emp_elect.value_translated: Guardia del Cuerpo del Conde Elector

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_lzd_chaka.value_original: The Helm of the Prime Guardian
The Key to the Eternity Chamber
ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_lzd_chaka.value_translated: La Llave de la Cámara de la Eternidad

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_lzd_tetto.value_original: The Eye of the Old Ones

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_nor_skael.value_original: Black Dragon (a mount for Marauder Chieftain)
ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_nor_skael.value_translated: Dragón Negro (una montura para el Jefe de los Saqueadores)
La Melena de la Dama Elena

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_tmb_ramho.value_original: Those That Stalk Beneath the Sand
ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_tmb_ramho.value_translated: Aquellos que acechan bajo la arena
Vigilancia de la Muerte del Inframundo

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_tmb_tutan.value_translated: Máscara Dorada de la Muerte de Tutankhanut

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_wef_forge.value_translated: Armadura del Guardián de Athel Loren
Flecha de la Lluvia de Condena
Piedras Lunares de los Caminos Ocultos
Espadas de Fuego Salvaje de Rageth

ancillaries_onscreen_name_mixu_wef_wychw.value_translated: Globos de Polvo de Estrella del Embaucador
El Tambor de Piel de Orco

ancillary_sets_description_mixu_LL_wef_w.value_original: Wychwethyl will need all of his tools in order to perform the ritual dances properly.
ancillary_sets_description_mixu_LL_wef_w.value_translated: Wychwethyl necesitará todas sus herramientas para realizar correctamente las danzas rituales.

ancillary_sets_name_mixu_LL_wef_wychweth.value_original: The Ritual Dancer of Athel Loren
ancillary_sets_name_mixu_LL_wef_wychweth.value_translated: El Bailarín Ritual de Athel Loren

battle_set_piece_armies_army_onscreen_na.value_translated: Manada de Guerra de Pezuña de Guerra
Manada de Guerra de Pezuña de Guerra

battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_original: Heinrich Kemmler has made his way towards the edges of Athel Loren, no doubt searching for dark knowledge and necromantic power. With the help of a certain grail knight we have been able to find his secret barrow where he has been strengthening his army with newly raised dead. The Barrow Legion must be stopped at once for it would be unchivalrous to let this abomination continue his work!\\n\\nSir Almaric has taken a group of knights and flanked the enemy forces, his expertise against the undead will surely be useful in the upcoming fight.
battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_translated: Heinrich Kemmler se ha dirigido hacia los límites de Athel Loren, sin duda buscando conocimiento oscuro y poder nigromántico. Con la ayuda de un caballero del grial, hemos logrado encontrar su túmulo secreto, donde ha estado fortaleciendo su ejército con muertos recién levantados. ¡La Legión del Túmulo debe ser detenida de inmediato, pues sería poco caballeroso dejar que esta abominación continúe con su labor\\n\\nSir Amalric ha tomado un grupo de caballeros y ha flanqueado las fuerzas enemigas; su experiencia contra los no muertos será sin duda útil en la batalla que se avecina.

battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_original: Angered by King Kazador's victories against Gorfang Rotgut and his lackies, Gorfang has decided to take his entire army to Karak Azul and burn it to the ground. King Kazador has called every able-bodied dwarf in Karak Azul to defend the great city once more against their hated enemy. Today, Gorfang shall not be victorious. Let's finish him and his followers for good this time!
battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_translated: Molesto por las victorias del Rey Kazador contra Gorfang Soretes y sus secuaces, Gorfang ha decidido llevar a todo su ejército a Karak Azul y prenderle fuego hasta los cimientos. El Rey Kazador ha convocado a todos los enanos capaces en Karak Azul para defender la gran ciudad una vez más contra su odiado enemigo. Hoy, Gorfang no saldrá victorioso. ¡Acabemos con él y sus seguidores de una vez por todas!

battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_original: Angered by King Kazador's victories against Gorfang Rotgut and his lackies, Gorfang has decided to take his entire army to Karak Azul and burn it to the ground. King Kazador has called every able-bodied dwarf in Karak Azul to defend the great city once more against their hated enemy. Today, Gorfang shall not be victorious. Let's finish him and his followers for good this time!
battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_translated: Molesto por las victorias del Rey Kazador contra Gorfang Soretes y sus secuaces, Gorfang ha decidido llevar a todo su ejército a Karak Azul y prenderle fuego hasta los cimientos. El Rey Kazador ha convocado a todos los enanos capaces en Karak Azul para defender la gran ciudad una vez más contra su odiado enemigo. Hoy, Gorfang no saldrá victorioso. ¡Acabemos con él y sus seguidores de una vez por todas!

battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_original: While wandering through Troll County looking for the next small town to raid, Ghorros Warhoof, the Father of Beasts has come across a mysterious chaos artifact guarded by an army of Chaos. The Sorcerer won't be a problem to our forces, so let's gather our forces and blow the war horn!
battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_translated: Mientras vagaba por el Territorio Troll en busca de la próxima aldea para saquear, Ghorros Pezuña de Guerra, el Padre de las Bestias, se encontró con un misterioso artefacto caótico custodiado por un ejército del Caos. El Hechicero no será un problema para nuestras fuerzas, así que reunamos a nuestras tropas y hagamos sonar el cuerno de guerra.

battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_original: The remnants of W'soran's and Ushoran's forces are discovered, our scouts return with news that the forces of Undead have decided to meet us in battle. Without a home these ancient creatures will fight even harder against us and who knows what else is lurking in the desert.
battle_set_pieces_localised_description_.value_translated: Los restos de las fuerzas de W'soran y Ushoran han sido descubiertos. Nuestros exploradores informan que las fuerzas de los no-muertos han decidido enfrentarse a nosotros en batalla. Sin un hogar, estas antiguas criaturas lucharán con más ferocidad contra nosotros, y quién sabe qué más se oculta en el desierto.

battle_set_pieces_localised_name_mixu_LL.value_translated: El Azote de los No Muertos

battle_set_pieces_localised_name_wh2_mix.value_translated: Guerras de la Búsqueda: Los Oscuros Amos de la Noche

bretonnia_vows_localised_description_mix.value_original: "I set down my lance, symbol of duty\\nI spurn those whom I love\\nI relinquish all and take up the tools of my quest\\nNo obstacle will stand before me\\nNo plea for help shall find me waiting\\nNo moon will look upon me twice lest I be judged idle\\nI give my body, heart and soul to the Lady whom I seek..."
bretonnia_vows_localised_description_mix.value_translated: "Dejo mi lanza, símbolo del deber\\nRechazo a aquellos a quienes amo\\nRenuncio a todo y tomo las herramientas de mi búsqueda\\nNingún obstáculo se interpondrá ante mí\\nNingún llamado de auxilio me encontrará esperando\\nNinguna luna me verá dos veces sin que sea juzgado por mi ociosidad\\nEntrego mi cuerpo, corazón y alma a la Dama a quien busco..."

building_culture_variants_name_mixu_emp_.value_translated: Botín de Armas de Fuego Robadas

building_culture_variants_name_mixu_tze_.value_translated: Guarida de Trolls del Caos Hechiceros

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Through smuggling, and maybe even some legal trade, pirates can make great sums of money.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Mediante el contrabando, y quizá algo de comercio legal, los piratas pueden amasar grandes sumas de dinero.

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Recruit deckhands, gunners, and other shipmates into your pirate crews.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Recluta marineros, artilleros y otros compañeros de barco para tus tripulaciones piratas.

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Support your pirate crews with artillery pieces, mercenaries, and monstrous abominations of the sea.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Apoya a tus tripulaciones piratas con piezas de artillería, mercenarios y monstruosas abominaciones marinas.

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Upgrade parts of your galleon to improve its capabilities and bolster its crew.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Mejora partes de tu galeón para aumentar sus capacidades y reforzar a su tripulación.

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Bolster your ship crew with sartosan pirates, deck gunners, and buccaneers of the sea.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Refuerza tu tripulación con piratas sartosanos, artilleros de cubierta y bucaneros del mar.

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Enhance the Captain’s Quarters to improve your galleon’s capacity for growth and recruitment.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Mejora los camarotes del capitán para aumentar la capacidad de crecimiento y reclutamiento de tu galeón.

building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_original: Build and enhance these special features of your galleon to receive special benefits.
building_sets_onscreen_description_mixu_.value_translated: Construye y mejora estas características especiales de tu galeón para obtener beneficios especiales.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: With the correct tools, and enough labour, the ancient hoards and bones of fallen Dragons can be collected for better use.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Con las herramientas correctas y suficiente mano de obra, los antiguos tesoros y huesos de Dragones caídos pueden ser recolectados para un mejor uso.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Pigbarter used to be a home to a substantial colony of Gnoblars. Their new masters have found better uses for them now..
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Pigbarter solía ser hogar de una colonia considerable de Gnoblars. Sus nuevos amos han encontrado mejores usos para ellos ahora...

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "Skreee, that's a lot of bone things!"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "¡Skreee, son muchas cosas de huesos!"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: When the mages of Naieth's host find a point at which the magic rises towards the surface they instruct their kindred to set a great stone in that place; carved with arcane spirals, to direct the flow of magic. In this way the mages have created a web of magical protection around the Forest of Loren.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Cuando los magos del séquito de Naieth encuentran un punto donde la magia surge hacia la superficie, instruyen a sus parientes para colocar una gran piedra en ese lugar, tallada con espirales arcanas, para dirigir el flujo de magia. De esta manera, los magos han creado una red de protección mágica alrededor del Bosque de Loren.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: “There’s a lot of hungry people hereabouts, and the roads are dangerous. So, you have a choice: You can give us most of your food to feed the starving, or all your money to let you pass. What’ll it be, pal?”
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Hay mucha gente hambrienta por aquí, y los caminos son peligrosos. Así que tienes una opción: puedes darnos la mayor parte de tu comida para alimentar a los hambrientos, o todo tu dinero para que te dejemos pasar. ¿Qué será, amigo?"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The Drakwald forest covers the northern part of the Empire with a canopy of darkness. For protection a series of forts, fortified inns and watchtowers are stationed along the highways.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: El bosque de Drakwald cubre la parte norte del Imperio con un dosel de oscuridad. Para protección, una serie de fuertes, posadas fortificadas y torres de vigilancia están estacionadas a lo largo de las carreteras.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Amongst the coastal swamps, dark shapes shimmer and twist, waiting for the command to strike.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Entre los pantanos costeros, formas oscuras brillan y se retuercen, esperando la orden para atacar.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: From the darkest depths, the hideous, pulsating masses rise…
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Desde las profundidades más oscuras, las horrendas masas palpitantes se alzan…

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: A pleasant place to rest at the end of a long day of plundering the high seas with your mates.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Un lugar agradable para descansar al final de un largo día de saqueos por los mares con tus compañeros.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The ne'er do wells, the forgotten ones, the never-knowns; they reside here.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Los despreciables, los olvidados, los desconocidos; aquí residen.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: This place sure is something special. Truly breathtaking.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Este lugar es algo especial. Realmente impresionante.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Here you can find notes about missing cows, sandwitch thieves and occasionally even job listings for eager adventurers.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Aquí puedes encontrar notas sobre vacas desaparecidas, ladrones de bocadillos y, ocasionalmente, incluso anuncios de empleo para aventureros entusiastas.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Interested adventurers to present themselves to Quartermaster at the Recruiter's Tent!
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: ¡Aventureros interesados presentarse ante el Cuartelmaestre en la Tienda de Reclutadores!

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: If you're looking for adventurers with an insatiable lust for adventure, glory and... most of all gold.. well, you have found them!
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Si buscas aventureros con un insaciable deseo de aventura, gloria y… sobre todo, oro… bueno, los has encontrado.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "Roll up, roll up - come 'n' get yer fresh mea… I mean able-bodied labour force!"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "¡Pasen, pasen! ¡Vengan y consigan su… eh… fuerza laboral en plena forma!"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: A hidden cove where smugglers can conduct their shady businesses in secrecy.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Una cala oculta donde los contrabandistas pueden llevar a cabo sus negocios turbios en secreto.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Somewhere safe to play card or dice after hours…
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Un lugar seguro para jugar a las cartas o los dados después de horas…

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "All together now... 'Yo ho, blow the man down!'"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Todos juntos ahora... '¡Yo ho, derribemos al hombre!'"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Marienburg is Captain Van Der Kraal's home port and in recent years he has commanded a mercenary company of dark repute that goes by the name of Manann's Blades, named for the quixotic and violent sea god of the Empire.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Marienburgo es el puerto base del Capitán Van Der Kraal, y en años recientes ha comandado una compañía mercenaria de oscura reputación llamada Espadas de Manann, nombrada en honor al quijotesco y violento dios marino del Imperio.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "You will fight, for our amusement, or you will die. Sorry; I mean, THEN you will die."
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Lucharás, para nuestra diversión, o morirás. Perdón; quiero decir, DESPUÉS morirás."

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: In the Arena, a man is made and unmade a hundred times, until death.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: En la Arena, un hombre se hace y se deshace cien veces, hasta la muerte.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "It's an entire deck dedicated to fighting, what do you mean it's a waste of space!? The Crew LOVES it!"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Es toda una cubierta dedicada a la lucha, ¿qué quieres decir con que es un desperdicio de espacio? ¡A la tripulación LE ENCANTA!"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "No one can enter this hold without MY permission. Is that clear!"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Nadie puede entrar en esta bodega sin MI permiso. ¿Está claro?"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The most important part of any pirate ship is the Grog storage, without Grog, there would be no pirate crew.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: La parte más importante de cualquier barco pirata es el almacenamiento de Grog; sin Grog, no habría tripulación pirata.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: In this hold, the pirate crew forges bonds over shared tales, each sip a celebration of their nautical prowess.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: En esta bodega, la tripulación pirata forja lazos con historias compartidas, cada sorbo es una celebración de su destreza náutica.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "Grog makes the world go around... or at least this bloody boat."
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "El Grog hace girar el mundo... o al menos este maldito barco."

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "That's a lot of Grog"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Eso es mucho Grog."

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "I would stay far away from that place if I were you, Bernie"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "Yo me mantendría muy lejos de ese lugar si fuera tú, Bernie."

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Talking frogs and other weird creatures can be found in close vicinity of this place for some mysterious reason.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Ranas parlantes y otras criaturas extrañas se encuentran en las cercanías de este lugar por alguna misteriosa razón.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The Witch Doctors offers their services, for the right price - and the price MUST be paid…
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Los Médicos Brujos ofrecen sus servicios, por el precio adecuado... y el precio DEBE pagarse…

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: "Clan Mordkin pays a lot for these bones-skulls, we rich-rich will be!"
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: "¡El Clan Mordkin paga mucho por estos huesos-cráneos, seremos ricos-ricos!"

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The title of grave robber is a respected profession amongst the skaven of Clan Mordkin, we'll, as much respect as a skaven can get from the other of their kin, which isn't much.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: El título de saqueador de tumbas es una profesión respetada entre los skaven del Clan Mordkin, bueno, tan respetada como un skaven puede serlo entre los suyos, lo cual no es mucho.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The greatest temple to Taal is found in Talabheim, the cratered city at the centre of the Empire.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: El templo más grande a Taal se encuentra en Talabheim, la ciudad craterada en el centro del Imperio.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: An abbey of monks who worship Taal, god of Nature and Wild Places.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Una abadía de monjes que adoran a Taal, dios de la Naturaleza y los Lugares Salvajes.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Once the proud and noble rulers of the skies, now split, twisted and corrupted by the forces of change, the terrible, two-headed Chaos Dragons are nightmarish and malevolent predators.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Antaño orgullosos y nobles gobernantes de los cielos, ahora divididos, retorcidos y corrompidos por las fuerzas del cambio, los terribles Dragones del Caos de dos cabezas son depredadores malévolos y de pesadilla.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Repositories of knowledge, vaults full of garnered books and scrolls draw the knowledge-hungry and their wealth for the cults to peck on.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Repositorios de conocimiento, bóvedas llenas de libros y pergaminos recopilados atraen a los hambrientos de conocimiento y sus riquezas para que los cultos los devoren.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Cults are often formed around a personality, an individual charismatic enough to seduce men and women away from right thinking and good beliefs. He is a corruptor, a wolf in sheep's clothing, and he knows full well what it is that he does.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Los cultos a menudo se forman alrededor de una personalidad, un individuo lo suficientemente carismático como para seducir a hombres y mujeres, alejándolos del pensamiento correcto y las buenas creencias. Es un corruptor, un lobo con piel de oveja, y sabe perfectamente lo que está haciendo.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Sanctuaries of the learned – hiding from the brutes and ignorant – are perfect fodder for the cults of lore.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Santuarios de los eruditos – escondidos de los brutos e ignorantes – son un blanco perfecto para los cultos del saber.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: To summon a Daemon of Tzeentch is a tricky business, for it will use all its guile to wheedle out of any pacts it makes with its summoner. Once it discovers a loophole, it will break free from its oaths and spitefully reduce the cultists who dragged it to the mortal world into a mass of twitching, betentacled flesh, before returning to its Daemonic otherworld in the Realm of Chaos.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Invocar a un Demonio de Tzeentch es un asunto complicado, pues usará toda su astucia para escapar de cualquier pacto que haga con su invocador. Una vez que descubra una laguna, romperá sus juramentos y reducirá con desprecio a los cultistas que lo trajeron al mundo mortal en una masa de carne tentaculada y temblorosa, antes de regresar a su otro mundo demoníaco en el Reino del Caos.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The ultimate goal of many cults of Tzeentch is to perform horrific rituals that will open a gate to the Realm of Chaos from the mortal world, allowing Tzeentch's Daemons to swarm into this dimension and wreak havoc.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: El objetivo final de muchos cultos de Tzeentch es realizar rituales horribles que abrirán una puerta al Reino del Caos desde el mundo mortal, permitiendo que los Demonios de Tzeentch invadan esta dimensión y causen estragos.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: The lairs of Trolls are foetid and disgusting; the further north they are, the more disturbing they become.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Las guaridas de los Trolls son fétidas y repugnantes; cuanto más al norte están, más perturbadoras se vuelven.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Fusion of Egrimm van Horstmann's sorcerous followers with the unholy resilience of Trolls might have sounded great in his head, but the result was something he didn't expect to happen.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: La fusión de los seguidores hechiceros de Egrimm van Horstmann con la resistencia profana de los Trolls pudo haber sonado genial en su mente, pero el resultado fue algo que no esperaba que ocurriera.

building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_original: Temples to Taal are much rarer than his ubiquitous but humble shrines. There are a few, the largest of which can be found in the city that bears his name, Talabheim.
building_short_description_texts_short_d.value_translated: Los templos a Taal son mucho más raros que sus ubicuos pero humildes santuarios. Hay algunos, el más grande se encuentra en la ciudad que lleva su nombre, Talabheim.

campaign_effect_scopes_localised_text_fa.value_translated: \\n(todos los personajes en las regiones controladas)

campaign_effect_scopes_localised_text_mi.value_original: \\n(assigned Grudge Thrower, Cannon or Organ Gun unit)
campaign_effect_scopes_localised_text_mi.value_translated: \\n(unidad asignada de Lanzagravios, Cañón o Cañón Órgano)

campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_original: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after winning 5 battles with your Faction Leader.[[/col]]

campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_original: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after reaching rank 5 with your Faction Leader.[[/col]]

campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_original: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after reaching rank 10 with your Faction Leader.[[/col]]

campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_original: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after having a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord in ambush stance at the end of your turn.[[/col]]
campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_translated: [[col:dark_r]]Este rito se desbloqueará al tener un [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Señor en actitud de emboscada al final de tu turno.[[/col]]

campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_original: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after constructing the Arcane Vortex building.[[/col]]
campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_translated: [[col:dark_r]]Este rito se desbloqueará al construir el edificio de Vórtice Arcano.[[/col]]

campaign_group_rituals_unlock_text_mixu_.value_original: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after winning 3 battles.[[/col]]

campaign_localised_strings_string_lord_l.value_original: [[col:red]]This Legendary Lord will unlock after razing the Altdorf settlement.[[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_lord_l.value_translated: [[col:red]]Este Señor Legendario se desbloqueará después de arrasar el asentamiento de Altdorf.[[/col]]

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_original: Enabling this option will disable Cabal's Invasion.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_translated: Habilitar esta opción desactivará la Invasión del Cónclave.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_original: Disable Taal & Rhya units from other empire factions
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_translated: Desactivar unidades de Taal y Rhya para otras facciones del Imperio

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_original: Disables the Cult of Taal & Rhya units from other empire factions. Talabecland can still recruit them normally.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_translated: Desactiva las unidades del Culto de Taal y Rhya para otras facciones del Imperio. Talabecland aún podrá reclutarlas normalmente.
[[img:ui/flags/wh_dlc03_bst_beastmen_ripper_horn/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Manada de Guerra del Padre de Bestias
Manadas de Guerra de los Hombres Bestia
[[img:ui/flags/wh2_main_bst_manblight/mon_24.png]][[/img]] Manada de Guerra del Demonio del Hambre
Manadas de Guerra de Hombres Bestia

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_original: Should this hero be spawned or not?
Should this lord be spawned or not?\\nThis also removes faction effects from their faction.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_translated: ¿Debe aparecer este señor legendario o no?\\nEsto también elimina los efectos de facción de su respectiva facción.
La IA de los Hombres Bestia construye Piedras de Rebaño

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_original: Can Ghorros and Slugtongue build herdstones while controlled by the AI?
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_translated: ¿Pueden Ghorros y Slugtongue construir Piedras de Rebaño mientras son controlados por la IA?

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_original: The following are settings for Mixu's Legendary Lords.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_L.value_translated: Las siguientes son configuraciones para los Señores Legendarios de Mixu.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_b.value_translated: Expande la capacidad de [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Héroes de tu facción.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_original: Left-click to change the selected character's type to either a lord or a hero.\\nYou can change your character type only once per turn.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_translated: Haz clic izquierdo para cambiar el tipo del personaje seleccionado a Señor o Héroe.\\nSolo puedes cambiar el tipo de tu personaje una vez por turno.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_original: This character shall stay the same.
Change character's type.\\nYou can cancel this change by pressing this button again.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_translated: Cambia el tipo de personaje.\\nPuedes cancelar este cambio presionando este botón nuevamente.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_original: This character will become a Hero once you close the character detail panel.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_translated: Este personaje se convertirá en un Héroe una vez que cierres el panel de detalles del personaje.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_original: This character will become a Lord once you close the character detail panel.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_translated: Este personaje se convertirá en un Señor una vez que cierres el panel de detalles del personaje.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_original: [[col:red]]Character's army will be destroyed and all units this character might have will be removed![[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_c.value_translated: [[col:red]]¡El ejército de este personaje será destruido y todas las unidades que pueda tener serán eliminadas![[/col]]

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: [[col:red]]Grimm Burloksson has not crafted the previous version of this item[[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: [[col:red]]Grimm Burloksson no ha forjado la versión anterior de este objeto[[/col]].
Turnos hasta que este beneficio expire

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: Recapturing these lost holds will increase [[img:mixu_dwf_guild_approval]][[/img]]Guild Approval and prove to the Guildmasters of Zhufbar that Grimm's "radical" actions and inventions are worth it. You can take certain actions against the occupiers of these holds, however keep in mind that the Guildmasters are very much against "unsafe" gyrocopter missions.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Recuperar estas fortalezas perdidas aumentará la [[img:mixu_dwf_guild_approval]][[/img]]Aprobación del Gremio y demostrará a los Maestros del Gremio de Zhufbar que las acciones y las invenciones "radicales" de Grimm valen la pena. Puedes tomar ciertas acciones contra los ocupantes de estas fortalezas; sin embargo, ten en cuenta que los Maestros del Gremio están completamente en contra de las misiones de girocópteros "inseguras".

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: This lost hold is currently controlled by:
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Esta fortaleza perdida está actualmente controlada por:

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: This lost hold is currently a ruin!
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: ¡Esta fortaleza perdida está actualmente en ruinas!

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: Grimm is ready to carry out your request
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Grimm está listo para llevar a cabo tu petición.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: Select to reforge this item with temporary powers
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Selecciona para reforjar este objeto con poderes temporales.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: Grimm's Workshop is a place where Grimm can craft powerful items for himself, craft gyrocopter mounts for Master Engineers or create temporarily improvements for Zhufbar's artillery and missile units.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: El Taller de Grimm es un lugar donde puede fabricar objetos poderosos para sí mismo, crear monturas de girocópteros para Maestros Ingenieros o desarrollar mejoras temporales para la artillería y las unidades de proyectiles de Zhufbar.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: This is where Grimm can craft weapons and items for himself.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Aquí es donde Grimm puede fabricar armas y objetos para sí mismo.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: This is where Grimm can craft improvements to Zhufbar's armies or build mounts for fellow Master Engineers.\\n\\nGrimm can only craft one item at the time however and as such must rest for one turn after completing a task.\\n\\nThe Guildmasters are also watching his work with a keen eye, forever judging the talented engineer..
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Aquí es donde Grimm puede fabricar mejoras para los ejércitos de Zhufbar o construir monturas para otros Maestros Ingenieros.\\n\\nGrimm solo puede fabricar un objeto a la vez y, como tal, debe descansar un turno después de completar una tarea.\\n\\nLos Maestros del Gremio también observan su trabajo con atención, siempre juzgando al talentoso ingeniero...

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: Many Dwarfen holds have fallen to skaven and greenskins since the end of the Golden Age of the Dwarfs, and some to fouler things still.\\n\\nReclaiming these lost holds will greatly improve your [[img:mixu_dwf_guild_approval]][[/img]]Guild Approval.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Muchas fortalezas enanas han caído en manos de los skaven y pielesverdes desde el final de la Edad Dorada de los Enanos, y algunas ante cosas aún más impuras.\\n\\nRecuperar estas fortalezas perdidas mejorará enormemente tu [[img:mixu_dwf_guild_approval]][[/img]]Aprobación del Gremio.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: This is where the young engineer spends most of his days crafting and inventing all sorts of items and upgrades.\\nKeep in mind however that the Engineers Guild is always watching his work with a keen eye.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: Aquí es donde el joven ingeniero pasa la mayor parte de sus días fabricando e inventando todo tipo de objetos y mejoras.\\nSin embargo, ten en cuenta que el Gremio de Ingenieros siempre observa su trabajo con gran atención.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: You do not control this lost hold.\\n\\nSettlement currently occupied by:
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_translated: No controlas esta fortaleza perdida.\\n\\nAsentamiento actualmente ocupado por:

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_d.value_original: You already control this once lost hold.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_e.value_original: Bounties||Fulfil missions offered by other factions. Completion will improve relations between you.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_e.value_translated: Recompensas||Cumple misiones ofrecidas por otras facciones. Completarlas mejorará las relaciones contigo.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_e.value_original: Mercenary Contracts||Accept jobs to enter into other factions’ wars in return for payment and rewards.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_e.value_translated: Contratos Mercenarios||Acepta trabajos para entrar en guerras de otras facciones a cambio de pagos y recompensas.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_m.value_original: Could not find Mixu's Legendary Lord mod's asset pack. Please install it before continuing!
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_m.value_translated: No se pudo encontrar el paquete de recursos del mod de los Señores Legendarios de Mixu. ¡Por favor, instálalo antes de continuar!

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_n.value_original: [[col:red]]This building will unlock once you research the {{tr:technologies_onscreen_name_mixu_nor_skaeling_tech_vengeful_warriors}} Technology.[[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_n.value_translated: [[col:red]]Este edificio se desbloqueará una vez que investigues la Tecnología {{tr:technologies_onscreen_name_mixu_nor_skaeling_tech_vengeful_warriors}}.[[/col]]

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_n.value_original: [[col:red]]This building will unlock once you research the {{tr:technologies_onscreen_name_mixu_nor_skaeling_tech_the_way_of_wrath}} Technology.[[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_n.value_translated: [[col:red]]Este edificio se desbloqueará una vez que investigues la Tecnología {{tr:technologies_onscreen_name_mixu_nor_skaeling_tech_the_way_of_wrath}}.[[/col]]

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_s.value_original: Gnawing on the bones of their enemies will grant a temporary bonus for this army.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_s.value_translated: Roer los huesos de sus enemigos otorgará un bono temporal a este ejército.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_s.value_original: Bones cost\\n\\nThis amount will be deducted from this force's [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Bone Pile in order to perform this action.
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_s.value_translated: Costo de huesos\\n\\nEsta cantidad se deducirá del [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Montón de Huesos de esta fuerza para realizar esta acción.

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_original: [[col:green]][[img:death_night]][[/img]]Blood Voyage is already active.\\n\\nTurns until another Blood Voyage can be triggered: [[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_translated: [[col:green]][[img:death_night]][[/img]]El Viaje de Sangre ya está activo.\\n\\nTurnos hasta que se pueda activar otro Viaje de Sangre: [[/col]]

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_original: [[col:green]][[img:death_night]][[/img]]Blood Voyage is available.\\n\\nSending [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]slaves to Har Ganeth will grant you access to Hellebron's blood thirsty warriors ready to bear arms and undertake a murderous journey.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves required:
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_translated: [[col:green]][[img:death_night]][[/img]]El Viaje de Sangre está disponible.\\n\\nEnviar [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]esclavos a Har Ganeth te permitirá acceder a los guerreros sedientos de sangre de Hellebron, listos para tomar las armas y emprender un viaje asesino.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Esclavos requeridos:

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_original: [[col:red]]You cannot trigger a Blood Voyage until you have the required amount of [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]slaves to sacrifice.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves required:
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_translated: [[col:red]]No puedes iniciar un Viaje de Sangre hasta que tengas la cantidad requerida de [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]esclavos para sacrificar.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Esclavos requeridos:

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_original: Select to increase this unit's recruitment capacity by 1\\nCurrent capacity:
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_translated: Selecciona para aumentar la capacidad de reclutamiento de esta unidad en 1\\nCapacidad actual:

campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_original: [[col:red]]This unit will unlock once you've done stuff.[[/col]]
campaign_localised_strings_string_mixu_t.value_translated: [[col:red]]Esta unidad se desbloqueará una vez que completes ciertas acciones.[[/col]]

campaign_map_attritions_campaign_map_too.value_original: Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition within the mist.
campaign_map_attritions_campaign_map_too.value_translated: Los ejércitos sufrirán pérdidas debido a la [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]desgaste dentro de la niebla.

campaign_map_attritions_unit_card_toolti.value_original: This army is suffering heavy losses within the mist deployed by Lord Huinitenuchli.
campaign_map_attritions_unit_card_toolti.value_translated: Este ejército está sufriendo grandes bajas dentro de la niebla desplegada por el Señor Huinitenuchli.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:green]]Military Alliance formed with the Crooked Moon tribe[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:green]]Alianza Militar formada con la tribu Luna Torcida[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:green]]Military Alliance formed with the WAAAGH! Grimgor[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:green]]Alianza Militar formada con el ¡WAAAGH! de Grimgor[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Caradryan, will be unlocked to fight for your faction\\n(available from your Lord recruitment pool)
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Caradryan se desbloqueará para luchar por tu facción\\n(disponible en tu grupo de reclutamiento de Señores).

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:green]]Confederation formed with the Crooked Moon tribe[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:green]]Confederación formada con la tribu Luna Torcida[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:green]]Confederation formed with the WAAAGH! Grimgor[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:green]]Confederación formada con el ¡WAAAGH! de Grimgor[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Gained by winning battles with Chakax
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Ganado al ganar batallas con Chakax.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Achieved victory from multiple battles with Chakax
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Victoria lograda en múltiples batallas con Chakax.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[sortorder:2]][[/sortorder]][[col:green]]Upkeep greatly reduced for Night Goblin and Goblin units[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[sortorder:2]][[/sortorder]][[col:green]]El mantenimiento se reduce considerablemente para unidades de Goblins Nocturnos y Goblins[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Military alliance formed with the {{tr:factions_screen_name_wh3_main_ksl_ropsmenn_clan}}
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Alianza militar formada con el {{tr:factions_screen_name_wh3_main_ksl_ropsmenn_clan}}

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Confederation formed with the {{tr:factions_screen_name_wh3_main_ksl_ropsmenn_clan}}
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Confederación formada con el {{tr:factions_screen_name_wh3_main_ksl_ropsmenn_clan}}

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: {{tr:effects_description_mixu_ksl_rastiltin_enable_winter_rhya_upgraded}}
{{tr:effects_description_mixu_ksl_rastiltin_enable_winter_taal_upgraded}}
Confederation formed with Montfort
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Confederación formada con Montfort.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Montfort shall remain independent
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Montfort permanecerá independiente.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Make Montfort your vassal
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Haz de Montfort tu vasallo.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: New Legendary Hero: Markus Wulfhart
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Nuevo Héroe Legendario: Markus Wulfhart.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: New Legendary Lord: Markus Wulfhart, available from your faction's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord pool
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Nuevo Señor Legendario: Markus Wulfhart, disponible en la [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]reserva de Señores de tu facción.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:yellow]]Kragg's services will be offered again in 20 turns[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:yellow]]Los servicios de Kragg estarán disponibles nuevamente en 20 turnos[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: A new Legendary Lord, Lord Huinitenuchli, will be unlocked to fight for your faction\\n(available from your Lord recruitment pool)
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Un nuevo Señor Legendario, el Señor Huinitenuchli, se desbloqueará para luchar por tu facción\\n(disponible en tu grupo de reclutamiento de Señores).

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Legendary Hero Recruited: Sir Amalric de Gaudaron
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Héroe Legendario Reclutado: Sir Amalric de Gaudaron.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Legendary Lord Recruited: Kragg the Grim
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Señor Legendario Reclutado: Kragg el Gruñón.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: We have no use for them.
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: No tenemos uso para ellos.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: The wizard shall join our cabal.
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: El hechicero se unirá a nuestra cábala.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: They will stay with their current faction, but they will work for us in secret.
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Permanecerán con su facción actual, pero trabajarán para nosotros en secreto.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Legendary Lord Recruited: Melekh the Changer
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Se ha reclutado un Señor Legendario: Melekh el Cambiante.

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: High enemy casualties and character's rank increases the chance of capturing Monsters
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Altas bajas enemigas y el aumento del rango del personaje incrementan la posibilidad de capturar monstruos

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Earned by capturing a Vampire Coast settlement
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Obtenido al capturar un asentamiento de la Costa del Vampiro

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:red]]War is declared between WAAAGH! Grimgor and Red Fangs[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:red]]La guerra ha sido declarada entre el ¡WAAAGH! de Grimgor y los Colmillos Rojos[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: [[col:red]]War is declared between Crooked Moon and Red Fangs[[/col]]
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: [[col:red]]La guerra ha sido declarada entre Luna Torcida y Colmillos Rojos[[/col]].

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Wychwethyl the Wild, will be unlocked to fight for your faction\\n(available from your Lord recruitment pool)
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Wychwethyl el Salvaje se desbloqueará para luchar por tu facción\\n(disponible en tu grupo de reclutamiento de Señores).

campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_original: Tullaris Dreadbringer will join your faction on next turn start
campaign_payload_ui_details_description_.value_translated: Tullaris Dreadbringer se unirá a tu facción al inicio del siguiente turno.

campaign_post_battle_captive_options_des.value_original: Valuable bones cannot be left to the battlefield; send the slaves onto the field to gather more bones.
campaign_post_battle_captive_options_des.value_translated: Los huesos valiosos no pueden dejarse en el campo de batalla; envía a los esclavos al campo para recoger más huesos.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Tullaris Dreadbringer will arrive near Har Ganeth as a Legendary Hero.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tullaris Dreadbringer llegará cerca de Har Ganeth como un Héroe Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Tullaris Dreadbringer will be available from your faction's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord pool as a Legendary Lord.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tullaris Dreadbringer estará disponible en la [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]reserva de Señores de tu facción como un Señor Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Tullaris Dreadbringer will arrive near Shrine of Khaine as a Legendary Hero.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tullaris Dreadbringer llegará cerca del Santuario de Khaine como un Héroe Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Tullaris Dreadbringer will be available from your faction's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord pool as a Legendary Lord.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tullaris Dreadbringer estará disponible en la [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]reserva de Señores de tu facción como un Señor Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Caradryan will arrive near Shrine of Asuryan as a Legendary Hero.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Caradryan llegará cerca del Santuario de Asuryan como un Héroe Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Caradryan will be available from your faction's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord pool as a Legendary Lord.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Caradryan estará disponible en la [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]reserva de Señores de tu facción como un Señor Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: We would benefit greatly from having the Lords of Montfort serve under our banner, and they are hardly in a position to refuse such a "request".
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Nos beneficiaríamos enormemente si los señores de Montfort sirvieran bajo nuestro estandarte, y difícilmente están en posición de rechazar tal "petición".

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Gold should help smooth their Lords transition to serving under our banner.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: El oro debería ayudar a suavizar la transición de sus señores para que sirvan bajo nuestro estandarte.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Perhaps now is not the time to force matters, and there is always the chance to convince them later diplomatically.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tal vez ahora no sea el momento de forzar las cosas, y siempre existe la posibilidad de convencerlos más tarde diplomáticamente.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Your forces will be teleported to Naggaroth.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tus fuerzas serán teletransportadas a Naggaroth.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Your forces will stay in Troll County.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tus fuerzas permanecerán en el Territorio Troll.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Your forces will be teleported to North of Lustria, near Skeggi.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tus fuerzas serán teletransportadas al norte de Lustria, cerca de Skeggi.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Your forces will be teleported to somewhere in Norsca.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Tus fuerzas serán teletransportadas a algún lugar de Norsca.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Kragg the Grim will be available from your faction's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord pool as a Legendary Lord.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Kragg el Gruñón estará disponible en la [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]reserva de Señores de tu facción como un Señor Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Kragg will continue his work in the underhalls of Karaz-a-Karak.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Kragg continuará su trabajo en los salones inferiores de Karaz-a-Karak.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Markus Wulfhart will be available from your faction's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord pool as a Legendary Lord.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Markus Wulfhart estará disponible en la [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]reserva de Señores de tu facción como un Señor Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Markus Wulfhart will arrive near your capital as a Legendary Hero
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Markus Wulfhart llegará cerca de tu capital como un Héroe Legendario.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Those sanctimonious sops in armour, the Bretonnians, 'ave sent an 'eavily-defended convoy of merchant ships our way. Crow reckons they be heading to Araby, and by their sluggishness I'd say they're carrying a goodly haul by those escorts. Let's strike now an' take their riches for ourselves!
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Esos santurrones con armaduras, los bretonianos, han enviado un convoy fuertemente defendido de barcos mercantes hacia nosotros. Crow cree que van hacia Arabia, y por lo lentos que van, diría que llevan un buen botín con esos escoltas. ¡Atacamos ahora y tomamos sus riquezas para nosotros!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Pah! Northmen! Those stinkin' Norscan raiders 'ave been spotted heading back north of Naggaroth frozen following a successful raid on the coasts of the Empire. This particular tribe are known always to take captives for ransom at a later date, so this is an ample opportunity to fill our ratings.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: ¡Bah! ¡Hombres del norte! Esos apestosos saqueadores norscanos han sido vistos volviendo al norte de Naggaroth, tras una exitosa incursión en las costas del Imperio. Esta tribu en particular siempre captura prisioneros para pedir rescate más tarde, así que esta es una gran oportunidad para llenar nuestras filas.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: So… it would appear that some enterprising fellows from the New World 'ave decided to risk it all against the elements an' of course ourselves, who surely 'ave nothin' left to lose anyway. It's looking pretty likely that Sartosa is their destination. Though they're well protected, taking their cargo as our prize presents an opportunity we daren't pass up.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Entonces... parece que algunos audaces chicos del Nuevo Mundo han decidido arriesgarlo todo contra los elementos y, por supuesto, contra nosotros, que seguramente no tenemos nada que perder. Parece bastante probable que Sartosa sea su destino. Aunque están bien protegidos, tomar su carga como nuestro botín nos presenta una oportunidad que no podemos dejar pasar.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A convoy of Dark Elf slave ships are heading back to Slaver's Bay, laden with captives raided from Ulthuan's coasts. We should free them... not for altruistic reasons, you understand, but because of their potential as fresh recruits to go on account with us an' join the crew - drowned, raised 'n' bound, they'll be worth more than a cutter full o'gold sovereigns!
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un convoy de barcos esclavistas Elfos Oscuros se dirige de vuelta a la Bahía de los Esclavos, cargado con cautivos saqueados de las costas de Ulthuan. Deberíamos liberarlos... no por razones altruistas, entiéndelo, sino por su potencial como nuevos reclutas que se unan a nuestra tripulación: ahogados, resucitados y atados, ¡valdrán más que un bote lleno de soberanos de oro!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will be recruited.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Se reclutará un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: The Pirate Admiral will be permanently removed from your faction.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: El Almirante Pirata será eliminado permanentemente de tu facción.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will appear near South Lustria.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata aparecerá cerca del sur de Lustria.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will appear near Sartosa.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata aparecerá cerca de Sartosa.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will appear near North Lustria.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata aparecerá cerca del norte de Lustria.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will appear near Southlands.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata aparecerá cerca de las Tierras del Sur.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will appear near Darklands.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata aparecerá cerca de las Tierras Oscuras.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A Pirate Flagship Admiral will appear near Old World.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata aparecerá cerca del Viejo Mundo.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A female Pirate Flagship Admiral armed with two swords will be recruited.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Se reclutará una Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata femenina armada con dos espadas.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: A male Pirate Flagship Admiral armed with sword and pistol will be recruited.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Se reclutará un Almirante de Nave Insignia Pirata masculino armado con espada y pistola.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: The wizard will join our faction as a [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero. They will receive a new name once they join our faction, but they will keep their experience.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: El hechicero se unirá a nuestra facción como un [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Héroe. Recibirá un nuevo nombre una vez que se una a nuestra facción, pero mantendrá su experiencia.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: The wizard will keep working for their current faction, they will improve diplomatic relations with us and keep us updated on what they see while serving their current faction.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: El hechicero seguirá trabajando para su facción actual, mejorará las relaciones diplomáticas con nosotros y nos mantendrá informados de lo que vea mientras sirva a su facción actual.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: We have no use for them. Get rid of them.
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: No tenemos uso para ellos. Deshazte de ellos.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: WEZ STRONK TOGETHA!, Youz take this teef heap and join uz or i'll show ye the choppa
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: ¡SOMOS FUERTES JUNTOS! Toma este montón de dientes y únete a nosotros o te mostraré el hacha.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Lets fight dem humies or stunties instead of us, eh? 'Tis not komplikatud, they have more plunder and thus wez should ally with each other and attack them!
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: ¡Luchemos contra esos humanoz o taponez en lugar de entre nosotros, eh! No es complicado, tienen más botín y, por lo tanto, deberíamos aliarnos y atacarlos juntos.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Vengeance will be mine! No one will kick the Troll-Eater out of his throne room and live to tell about it, not even Grimgor. Boyz bring me my choppa, we'll go to war. WAAAAGH!
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: ¡La venganza será mía! Nadie echará al Come-Trolls de su sala del trono y vivirá para contarlo, ni siquiera Grimgor. ¡Chicos, traedme mi rebanadora, iremos a la guerra. WAAAAGH!

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: WEZ STRONK TOGETHA!, Youz take this teef heap and join uz or i'll show ye the choppa
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: ¡SOMOS FUERTES JUNTOS! Toma este montón de dientes y únete a nosotros o te mostraré el hacha.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Dis ding worked before, why change it then, wez ally with each other and both of us will benefit from it
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: Esto funcionó antes, ¿por qué cambiarlo ahora? Nos aliamos y ambos nos beneficiamos.

cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_original: Karak Eight Peaks will be mine! Let's overthrow that smelly git from his throne!
cdir_events_dilemma_choice_details_local.value_translated: ¡Karak Ocho Picos será mío! Vamos a derrocar a ese maloliente cretino de su trono.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This skull was gifted to Captain Drekla as a token of his appreciation for his excellent work as Harkon's second-in-command by the Pirate King himself.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este cráneo fue regalado al Capitán Drekla como muestra de aprecio por su excelente trabajo como segundo al mando de Harkon, de manos del propio Rey Pirata.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Sickness must be purged, and purge it shall be!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¡La enfermedad debe ser purgada, y purgarla será!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En medio de una carnicería, es bueno saber que alguien tiene tu espalda.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: {{tr:character_skills_localised_description_wh2_main_skill_all_hero_assist_army_scavenge}}
"Let your name be on the lips of every man and woman; your great deeds go before you!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Que tu nombre esté en los labios de todo hombre y mujer; ¡tus grandes hazañas te preceden!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Runelord may 'strike the runes' - a metaphor for refusing to let them cool, which reduces their potency.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Señor de las Runas puede "golpear las runas", una metáfora de negarse a dejarlas enfriar, lo que reduce su potencia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When a Master Runelord judges the time is right, he chooses a young relative to be his apprentice and reticently teaches him, for an apprentice has to prove his worthiness to wring out even the most basic steps of the craft from his Master.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando un Maestro Herrero Rúnico juzga que ha llegado el momento, elige a un joven pariente para ser su aprendiz y, de mala gana, le enseña, pues un aprendiz debe demostrar su valía para arrancar incluso los pasos más básicos del oficio de su Maestro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Wizard crackles and flows with energies that would unmake any mortal practitioner.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Mago chisporrotea y fluye con energías que desharían a cualquier mortal practicante.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con los siervos del Caos llega la corrupción; a medida que el paisaje se retuerce, este acelera la transformación.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Denying the power of Chaos with fiery passion, the Warrior Priest implores Sigmar to protect his fellow sigmarines from the Ruinous Powers’ perverting ways.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Negando el poder del Caos con ardiente pasión, el Sacerdote Guerrero implora a Sigmar que proteja a sus sigmaritas de las corruptoras maneras de los Poderes Ruinosos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: {{tr:character_skills_localised_description_wh3_main_skill_ogr_self_healthy_appetite}}
{{tr:character_skills_localised_description_wh3_main_skill_ogr_self_larger_gutplate}}
Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Mira largo tiempo en el abismo, y el abismo te mirará de vuelta.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: {{tr:character_skills_localised_description_wh3_dlc23_skill_chd_hero_self_piercing_shots}}
The Dukes of Bretonnia will command their hosts of Knights from the backs of mighty barded steeds.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Duques de Bretonia comandarán sus huestes de Caballeros desde los lomos de poderosos corceles bardados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Taming a mighty hippogryph presents a challenge that many Bretonnian lords cannot turn down.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Domar a un poderoso hipogrifo presenta un desafío que muchos señores bretonianos no pueden rechazar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The purest of all pegasi, legend has it that they descend from Glorfinial, the mighty steed of a Grail Companion.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El más puro de todos los pegasos, cuenta la leyenda que descienden de Glorfinial, el poderoso corcel de un Compañero del Grial.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A champion of the common man, this duke is beloved by those he protects. Wherever he fights, the peasants doubles their efforts and will fight to the death rather than dishonour their lord.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un campeón del pueblo común, este duque es amado por aquellos a los que protege. Dondequiera que lucha, los campesinos duplican sus esfuerzos y luchan hasta la muerte antes que deshonrar a su señor.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lyonesse is the birthplace of Trebuchets, construction that has fended them off against Norscan raiders countless times and has earned the respect of Adalhard.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Lyonesse es la cuna de los Trebuchets, construcciones que los han defendido innumerables veces contra los saqueadores norscanos y han ganado el respeto de Adalhard.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Chevaliers de Lyonesse were formed to defend Lyonesse against its enemies by Repanse de Lyonesse and they have remained in service ever since.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Caballeros de Lyonesse fueron formados por Repanse de Lyonesse para defender Lyonesse de sus enemigos y han permanecido en servicio desde entonces.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and offer their devotion."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "La bendición de la Dama es un regalo maravilloso concedido libremente a todos los súbditos bretonianos, si tan solo se arrodillan y ofrecen su devoción."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I anoint myself with the blood of Ulric that I shall not fear to bleed.\\nI pledge myself to Ulric's work that I shall not fear to suffer.\\nI give myself to Ulric, that I shall not fear to die."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Me unjo con la sangre de Ulric para no temer sangrar.\\nMe comprometo a la obra de Ulric para no temer sufrir.\\nMe entrego a Ulric para no temer morir."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lyonesse is dotted with the hills that locals call Mottes. As many people have noted, they could have been designed as a place to put a castle, but they appear to be entirely natural. These days, every motte has a castle or the ruins of a castle on top of it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Lyonesse está salpicada de colinas que los lugareños llaman Mottes. Como muchos han señalado, podrían haber sido diseñadas como lugares para construir castillos, pero parecen ser completamente naturales. Hoy en día, cada motte tiene un castillo o las ruinas de uno en su cima.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Duke keeps himself aloof from the politics of his dukedom as far as possible. If a conflict spreads to the point that he can’t ignore it, he typically takes his forces in, crushes all parties, seizes their lands, and declares a resolution.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Duque se mantiene al margen de la política de su ducado tanto como puede. Si un conflicto se extiende hasta el punto de que no puede ignorarlo, normalmente lleva sus fuerzas, aplasta a todas las partes, confisca sus tierras y declara una resolución.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lords must not be concerned with the collecting of taxes; there are others whose lot it is to feel the people's scorn.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Señores no deben preocuparse por la recaudación de impuestos; hay otros cuyo destino es soportar el desprecio del pueblo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Dukes are the highest rank within Bretonnian society, second only to the Royarch himself.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Duques son el rango más alto dentro de la sociedad bretoniana, solo superados por el propio Monarca.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Lord is entitled to collect tithes from tenants in return for continued protection.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Señor tiene derecho a recolectar diezmos de sus arrendatarios a cambio de protección continua.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Led by noble example, peasants fight longer and harder lest their Lord be dishonoured.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Guiados por un noble ejemplo, los campesinos luchan más tiempo y con más ahínco para no deshonrar a su señor.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los mejores caballos del Viejo Mundo, criados por su resistencia y temperamento fogoso, bardados para una protección adicional.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Spurred on by visions and faith, the knight has chosen to commit himself to the path of the Lady.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Impulsado por visiones y fe, el caballero ha elegido comprometerse en el camino de la Dama.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Blessing of the Lady as his guide and companion, Sir Amalric's quest has been a successful one.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con la Bendición de la Dama como su guía y compañera, la búsqueda del Sir Amalric ha sido un éxito.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Far more than allegiance or loyalty, true dedication to Lady and kingdom further empowers her Knights on the field.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Más que lealtad o fidelidad, la verdadera dedicación a la Dama y al reino otorga aún más poder a sus Caballeros en el campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Sir Amalric is a bane to the unholy, capable of destroying hordes of undead enemies without even lifting his weapon.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Sir Amalric es una perdición para lo profano, capaz de destruir hordas de enemigos no muertos sin siquiera levantar su arma.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Beastslayer possesses a lance forged into the shape of a snarling dragon, he often takes it to battlefield instead of his Beast Mace.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Cazador de Bestias posee una lanza forjada en forma de un dragón rugiente. A menudo la lleva al campo de batalla en lugar de su Maza de Bestias.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Dukes of Bretonnia will command their hosts of Knights from the backs of mighty barded steeds.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Duques de Bretonia comandarán sus huestes de Caballeros desde los lomos de poderosos corceles bardados.
