character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Taming a mighty hippogryph presents a challenge that many Bretonnian lords cannot turn down.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Domar a un poderoso hipogrifo presenta un desafío que muchos señores bretonianos no pueden rechazar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The purest of all pegasi, legend has it that they descend from Glorfinial, the mighty steed of a Grail Companion.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El más puro de todos los pegasos, cuenta la leyenda que descienden de Glorfinial, el poderoso corcel de un Compañero del Grial.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Bastonnians like to think of themselves as the heart of Bretonnia. They are the people of Gilles the Unifier, and the dukedom is roughly in the physical centre of the nation. They have more pride in their nation than do the people of any other dukedom, and the worship of the Lady of the Lake is popular with peasants as well as nobles.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los bastoneses se consideran el corazón de Bretonia. Son el pueblo de Gilles el Unificador, y su ducado se encuentra aproximadamente en el centro físico de la nación. Tienen más orgullo en su nación que cualquier otro ducado, y la adoración de la Dama del Lago es popular tanto entre los campesinos como entre los nobles.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Bohemond's search for the Holy Grail was known to have ended in a vicious duel with a massive Dragon. Casting his opponent down, Bohemond then forged a fearsome mace from the Dragon's immense thigh bone.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se sabe que la búsqueda del Santo Grial de Bohemond terminó en un feroz duelo con un enorme dragón. Al derrotar a su oponente, Bohemond forjó una temible maza a partir del inmenso fémur del dragón.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Bohemond's vast estates are almost entirely rural. His castle of Bastonne is located on a high, craggy rock overlooking the Forest of Châlons. From here Bohemond and his mighty retinue of knights wage constant war against the Orcs, Skaven and other vile creatures infesting the mountainous wilderness in the heart of Bretonnia.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las vastas tierras de Bohemond son casi en su totalidad rurales. Su castillo de Bastonne está ubicado en una alta roca escarpada que domina el Bosque de Châlons. Desde allí, Bohemond y su poderoso séquito de caballeros libran una guerra constante contra los orcos, los skaven y otras criaturas viles que infestan las tierras montañosas en el corazón de Bretonia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "He seemed like an immortal, divine paladin, a faultless living legend, and strength, majesty and faith radiated from him like the heat from an inferno."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Parecía un inmortal, un paladín divino, una leyenda viva impecable, y de él emanaban fuerza, majestuosidad y fe como el calor de un infierno."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Although a fierce foe to Bretonnia's enemies, Knights should be wary of their kleptomaniac tendencies…"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Aunque un enemigo feroz para los enemigos de Bretonia, los Caballeros deberían tener cuidado con sus tendencias cleptómanas..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Dukes of Bretonnia will command their hosts of Knights from the backs of mighty barded steeds.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Duques de Bretonia comandarán sus huestes de Caballeros desde los lomos de poderosos corceles bardados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Taming a mighty hippogryph presents a challenge that many Bretonnian lords cannot turn down.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Domar a un poderoso hipogrifo presenta un desafío que muchos señores bretonianos no pueden rechazar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The purest of all pegasi, legend has it that they descend from Glorfinial, the mighty steed of a Grail Companion.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El más puro de todos los pegasos, cuenta la leyenda que descienden de Glorfinial, el poderoso corcel de un Compañero del Grial.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Cassyon is an open and enthusiastic young man, bearing no malice towards anyone, which makes it almost impossible to dislike him. On the other hand, he believes he can fulfil his ducal duties simply by riding across the skies of the dukedom and striking down monsters.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cassyon es un joven abierto y entusiasta, que no guarda rencor hacia nadie, lo que hace casi imposible que alguien lo deteste. Por otro lado, cree que puede cumplir con sus deberes ducales simplemente recorriendo los cielos del ducado y derrotando monstruos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Duke Cassyon's prowess has not escaped the notice of the Parravonese, and the story that he is Duke Agilgar reborn has recently started to spread.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La destreza del Duque Cassyon no ha pasado desapercibida para los habitantes de Parravon, y ha comenzado a difundirse la historia de que es el renacido Duque Agilgar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It's bloody work, but someone has to do it.. whether they like it or not.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es un trabajo sangriento, pero alguien tiene que hacerlo... les guste o no.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: All the nobles of Parravon ride Pegasus and so often forget that the rest of commoners need roads to get around.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Todos los nobles de Parravon montan Pegasos, y a menudo olvidan que el resto de los plebeyos necesitan caminos para desplazarse.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Always searching for the next fight, always searching for a damsel in need of rescuing..
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Siempre buscando la próxima lucha, siempre buscando una doncella en apuros que rescatar...

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "If you always look back, you never get home"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Si siempre miras hacia atrás, nunca llegarás a casa."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Dukes of Bretonnia will command their hosts of Knights from the backs of mighty barded steeds.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Duques de Bretonia comandarán sus huestes de Caballeros desde los lomos de poderosos corceles bardados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Taming a mighty hippogryph presents a challenge that many Bretonnian lords cannot turn down.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Domar a un poderoso hipogrifo presenta un desafío que muchos señores bretonianos no pueden rechazar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The purest of all pegasi, legend has it that they descend from Glorfinial, the mighty steed of a Grail Companion.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El más puro de todos los pegasos, cuenta la leyenda que descienden de Glorfinial, el poderoso corcel de un Compañero del Grial.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Duke Chilfroy is a powerful and giant of a man who seeks pleasure in finding and killing the many beasts that lurks within the forest of Arden.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Duque Chilfroy es un hombre poderoso y gigante que encuentra placer en buscar y matar a las muchas bestias que acechan en el Bosque de Arden.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "The flame of the Lady goes with this arrow, and so too the low-born archer before long…"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "La llama de la Dama acompaña esta flecha, y así también lo hará el arquero plebeyo antes de mucho tiempo..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Chilfroy is renowned for his skill at the joust, like many of his forefathers have been.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Chilfroy es famoso por su habilidad en las justas, como lo fueron muchos de sus antepasados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Land of Artois is dominated by the dense and mysterious Forest of Arden. The Forest attracts many beasts, from beastmen to orcs and from time to time the Duke sends his knights to cleanse the forest, but it never ends.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La tierra de Artois está dominada por el denso y misterioso Bosque de Arden. Este bosque atrae a muchas bestias, desde hombres bestia hasta orcos, y de vez en cuando el Duque envía a sus caballeros a limpiar el bosque, pero nunca termina.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Chilfroy has never been heard to laugh and reputedly only smiles when surveying the devastation he has wrought on his enemies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Chilfroy nunca ha sido escuchado reír y, según dicen, solo sonríe al contemplar la devastación que ha causado a sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Más fuertes y rápidos que el más poderoso caballo de guerra, estas inteligentes bestias son excepcionalmente leales a sus nobles maestros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los mejores caballos del Viejo Mundo, criados por su resistencia y temperamento ardiente, bardados para mayor protección.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Donna Don Domingio is the right hand of Grand Master Tyreweld and the champion of the Knights of Origo, a truly valued member of the righteous brotherhood.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Donna Don Domingio es la mano derecha del Gran Maestre Tyreweld y el campeón de los Caballeros de Origo, un miembro realmente valioso de la justa hermandad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: They march because they're told to, and of course because they'll get a 'right proper thrashin'' if they don't.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Marchan porque se les dice, y, por supuesto, porque recibirán un "correcto y adecuado castigo" si no lo hacen.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: While the Knights of Origo aren't crusading, they spend their days praying and meditating, at least until another incursion from the south arrives.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Mientras los Caballeros de Origo no están cruzando, pasan sus días rezando y meditando, al menos hasta que llegue otra incursión desde el sur.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Far more than allegiance or loyalty, true dedication to Lady and kingdom further empowers her Knights on the field.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Mucho más que lealtad o fidelidad, la verdadera dedicación a la Dama y al reino potencia aún más a sus Caballeros en el campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La bendición de la Dama es un regalo maravilloso que se otorga libremente a todos los súbditos bretonianos, siempre que se arrodillen y pronuncien su devoción.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Sickness must be purged, and purged it shall be!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¡La enfermedad debe ser purgada, y purgada será!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Worry is a waste of energy, it can't change the past, it can't control the future, it only makes today miserable, so go out there and kill those heathens!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Preocuparse es un desperdicio de energía, no puede cambiar el pasado, no puede controlar el futuro, solo hace miserable el hoy, ¡así que sal ahí afuera y mata a esos herejes!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Passed down from Champion to Champion, this sword is fit for a devout and honourable Knight of olden times, ready to dispatch the Heathens.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Pasada de Campeón a Campeón, esta espada es adecuada para un Caballero devoto y honorable de los viejos tiempos, listo para despachar a los Herejes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los mejores caballos del Viejo Mundo, criados por su resistencia y temperamento ardiente, bardados para mayor protección.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "The Lady calls me hence. I must answer her…"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "La Dama me llama. Debo responderle…"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Knights have crusaded extensively against the enemies of all right thinking folk and as such have gained a considerable reputation from their enemies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Caballeros han cruzado extensamente contra los enemigos de todo el pueblo de buen juicio y, como tal, han ganado una considerable reputación entre sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "You will fight for ze Lady or you'll swim back to Bordeleaux! For ze Lady!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Lucharás por la Dama o nadarás de vuelta a Bordeleaux! ¡Por la Dama!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "We'll take them from under the ground, don't you worry - it'll be done soon."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Los tomaremos desde bajo la tierra, no te preocupes, estará hecho pronto."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I am but a simple man. To serve this most holy quest is reward enough for me."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Soy solo un hombre sencillo. Servir en esta santa cruzada es recompensa suficiente para mí."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Holy Monasteries must be protected in these dangerous deserts, preferably with nearly impregnable fortresses.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los monasterios sagrados deben ser protegidos en estos peligrosos desiertos, preferiblemente con fortalezas casi inexpugnables.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Sir John was chosen as the grand master of the knights after his predecessor was brutally murdered by the heathens. From that day forward he has sworn to lead his loyal brothers and sisters to glory or die trying, there is no alternative.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Sir John fue elegido gran maestre de los caballeros después de que su predecesor fuera brutalmente asesinado por los paganos. Desde ese día, juró liderar a sus leales hermanos y hermanas hacia la gloria o morir en el intento, sin alternativa.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Having learned from their past experiences with the undead and arabyans, the knights shall not have a rest until the entire Nehekhara has been cleansed.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Habiendo aprendido de sus experiencias pasadas con los muertos vivientes y los árabes, los caballeros no descansarán hasta que toda Nehekhara haya sido purificada.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Knights have crusaded extensively against the enemies of all right thinking folk and gained a considerable reputation from their enemies. Amongst the Goblins they became renowned as 'The Frothers', whilst the Arabyans dubbed Sir John 'The Foaming One'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Caballeros han cruzado extensamente contra los enemigos de toda persona de bien, ganando una considerable reputación entre sus enemigos. Entre los Goblins, son conocidos como "Los Espumosos", mientras que los Árabes apodaron a Sir John "El Espumoso".

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Flames shall cleanse the corrupt and destroy what cannot be healed.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las llamas purificarán a los corruptos y destruirán lo que no pueda ser sanado.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If they stand behind you give them protection,\\n If they stand beside you give them respect,\\n  If they stand against you show no mercy!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si se ponen detrás de ti, dales protección,\\n Si se ponen a tu lado, dales respeto,\\n Si se ponen en tu contra, ¡no muestres piedad!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Such high-minded ways and pure ideals count for nothing when you’re wormfood.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Tales formas de pensar elevadas y puros ideales no sirven para nada cuando eres comida para gusanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under their Grand Master, Sir John Tyreweld, the Knights of Origo have crusaded extensively against the enemies of all right thinking folk and gained a considerable reputation from their enemies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo su Gran Maestro, Sir John Tyreweld, los Caballeros de Origo han cruzado extensamente contra los enemigos de todo el pueblo de buen juicio y han ganado una considerable reputación entre sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: For Sir John every non-believer is a heretic and should be purged from this world
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Para Sir John, todo no creyente es un hereje y debe ser purgado de este mundo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When the good brothers found their prayer disturbed by Arabyan pirates and the continued complaints of the disinherited they reacted in the only way they knew how. They built fleets, wiped the waterways clean of eastern ships, and fired every Arabyan port within a hundred miles.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando los buenos hermanos vieron su oración perturbada por piratas de Arabia y las continuas quejas de los desheredados, reaccionaron de la única forma que conocían. Construyeron flotas, limpiaron las vías fluviales de los barcos orientales y destruyeron todos los puertos de Arabia en un radio de cien millas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Most people hide behind their walls and stay in their villages, fearful to step out onto the roads that connect our settlements like islands of light in a sea of darkness. We are the watchful eyes that keep these slender threads of civilization safe."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "La mayoría de la gente se esconde detrás de sus muros y permanece en sus aldeas, temerosos de salir a los caminos que conectan nuestros asentamientos como islas de luz en un mar de oscuridad. Nosotros somos los ojos vigilantes que mantenemos a salvo estos delgados hilos de civilización."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Fury of Sir John has became legendary and amongst the Easterners they have dubbed Sir John 'The Foaming One'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La furia de Sir John se ha vuelto legendaria y, entre los orientales, han apodado a Sir John "El Espumoso".

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Defeating the Undead is no problem to mighty Knights of Origos who know no fear."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Derrotar a los Muertos Vivientes no es un problema para los poderosos Caballeros de Origos que no conocen el miedo."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This sword was carried by Grand Master Sir Gaspard Mercier, the first Grand Master of Knights of Origo. It was passed down to Sir John when he was selected as new Grand Master following the events that destroyed the Monastery of Saint Origo in Fyrus.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta espada fue llevada por el Gran Maestro Sir Gaspard Mercier, el primer Gran Maestro de los Caballeros de Origo. Fue pasada a Sir John cuando fue elegido como el nuevo Gran Maestro tras los eventos que destruyeron el Monasterio de San Origo en Fyrus.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Is it better to be respected or feared? What sort of question is that... why, both of course!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¿Es mejor ser respetado o temido? ¿Qué clase de pregunta es esa... por supuesto, ¡ambos!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Even when not feasting, the Beastmen taste blood on their lips, smell it on their fur, and want for more.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Incluso cuando no están de fiesta, los Hombres Bestia saborean la sangre en sus labios, la huelen en su pelaje y desean más.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este Señor habla con una voz aterradora y resonante, un regalo de sus Oscuros Maestros para asegurar la obediencia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The warherd, though vast and hard to control, can be relied on to fight, fight, fight!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La horda de guerra, aunque vasta y difícil de controlar, siempre puede ser confiada para pelear, ¡pelear, pelear!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ghorros Warhoof is a gnarled, ancient Centigor who is forever fighting, rutting or getting drunk. His unnaturally long life has spanned many centuries and he has slaughtered his way through countless wars without succumbing to his injuries.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ghorros Casco de Guerra es un Centigor retorcido y antiguo que está siempre luchando, copulando o emborrachándose. Su vida anormalmente larga ha abarcado muchos siglos y ha masacrado su camino a través de innumerables guerras sin sucumbir a sus heridas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It has been rumoured that Centigors are wont to march into battle in a state of inebriation, though this is difficult to prove since the creatures, regardless of their condition, never fail to be fearsome opponents.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se ha rumoreado que los Centigors son propensos a marchar a la batalla en un estado de ebriedad, aunque esto es difícil de probar, ya que las criaturas, independientemente de su condición, nunca dejan de ser temibles oponentes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Amongst the Warhoof's hordes come all manner of nameless beasts and halfbreeds, and regardless of their size, barbarism or ferocity, they all pay respect to the Father when he is nearby.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Entre las huestes de Casco de Guerra vienen toda clase de bestias sin nombre y mestizos, y, sin importar su tamaño, barbarie o ferocidad, todos rinden respeto al Padre cuando está cerca.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is a rare moon indeed that does not see Ghorros go to war.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es una luna rara de verdad la que no ve a Ghorros ir a la guerra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: None can deny that Ghorros has a very great number of Centigor sons and acolytes, all fanatically devoted to their gnarled but undeniably potent leader.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Nadie puede negar que Ghorros tiene un gran número de hijos Centigor y acólitos, todos fanáticamente devotos a su líder retorcido pero indudablemente poderoso.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Atop his scalp Ghorros wears the broken skull of Arsil, the Prince of Unicorns, who had an unfortunate encounter with Ghorros in a moonlit glade many centuries ago. It still harbours some of the protective magic of its former owner.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Sobre su cuero cabelludo, Ghorros lleva la calavera rota de Arsil, el Príncipe de los Unicornios, que tuvo un encuentro desafortunado con Ghorros en un claro a la luz de la luna hace muchos siglos. Aún conserva algo de la magia protectora de su antiguo dueño.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In battle Ghorros wields a great spiked club, every bit as blunt and unsubtle as its owner. Though crude, the Mansmasher bears the blessings of dozens of Bray-Shamans, and it has been soaked in the blood of ancient dynasties.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En batalla, Ghorros empuña un gran garrote con púas, tan contundente y poco sutil como su dueño. Aunque tosco, el Destructor de Hombres lleva las bendiciones de docenas de Bray-Shamans, y ha sido empapado en la sangre de antiguas dinastías.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los saqueadores son buenos saqueando asentamientos enemigos, haciendo huir a sus habitantes mientras sus propiedades son despojadas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Despite, or perhaps because of their drunkenness, the Centigors play one very important role in the world of the Beastmen. They are often used as the messengers of the Bray-Shamans, yet the messages they deliver are imparted to them when they are extremely drunk, and delivered in the same fashion.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A pesar de su embriaguez, o quizás por ella, los Centigors juegan un papel muy importante en el mundo de los Hombres Bestia. A menudo se les utiliza como mensajeros de los Bray-Shamans, pero los mensajes que entregan les son impartidos cuando están extremadamente borrachos, y se entregan de la misma forma.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There are no Beastmen more loyal to the self-alleged father of all Centigors than these.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No hay Hombres Bestia más leales al autodenominado padre de todos los Centigors que estos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Armed with a pair of lethal throwing axes – running away will not help.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Armados con un par de letales hachas arrojadizas, huir no ayudará.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque la precisión en el combate a distancia es algo que se puede aprender, este nació con un alto grado de talento natural.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "You don't wanna know where he keeps all of these axes.."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "No quieres saber dónde guarda todas estas hachas..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El bosque enseña a un guerrero no solo cuándo disparar, sino dónde, lo que marca una gran diferencia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: By which an unexpected shower of pointy death rains down upon the unfortunate targets. Ouch!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con la cual una inesperada lluvia de muerte puntiaguda cae sobre los desafortunados objetivos. ¡Ay!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Certain lesser beasts thrive under a pack leader, if only just to charge them in the right direction to unleash their savagery.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunas bestias menores prosperan bajo un líder de manada, aunque solo sea para dirigirlas en la dirección correcta para desatar su salvajismo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Harpies are scavengers and opportunists who prey upon the sick, weary, battle-worn and dying. Old Worlders consider a flight of Harpies a terrible ill omen, especially if it is in sight of a town, village or farmstead. And with good reason — for the warherds are never far behind.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las arpías son carroñeras y oportunistas que se aprovechan de los enfermos, cansados, desgastados por la batalla y moribundos. Los habitantes del Viejo Mundo consideran a una bandada de arpías como un terrible mal augurio, especialmente si se avista cerca de un pueblo, aldea o granja. Y con razón: los rebaños de guerra nunca están lejos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: She is more powerful and cunning than others of her species, which has made her almost a legend amongst her kind.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es más poderosa y astuta que otras de su especie, lo que la ha convertido en casi una leyenda entre las de su clase.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Little Morella is known for her quick temper and mischievous nature, but she is loyal to those who she calls her friends.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La pequeña Morella es conocida por su temperamento explosivo y naturaleza traviesa, pero es leal a quienes llama amigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Even the Dark Prince has noticed Little Morella's fighting capabilities and has even granted her some of their gifts.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Incluso el Príncipe Oscuro ha notado las capacidades de combate de la pequeña Morella y le ha otorgado algunos de sus dones.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Her screeching sounds casts a shadow of dread into the hearts of any who hear them.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Sus chillidos proyectan una sombra de temor en los corazones de quienes los escuchan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Beastfather always keeps Morella close to him, for she has an excellent talent of keeping other harpies in check.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Padre de las Bestias siempre mantiene cerca a Morella, pues tiene un excelente talento para mantener a otras arpías bajo control.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Like all other harpies, she is vicious and spiteful in her attacks, but unlike her sisters, Little Morella is not afraid to pick a fight against anyone.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como todas las arpías, es viciosa y rencorosa en sus ataques, pero a diferencia de sus hermanas, la pequeña Morella no teme enfrentarse a nadie.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those who follow Slugtongue are ready for slaughter, knowing full well that war follows famine as surely as winter follows autumn. When the armies of the starving and frightened march to confront Slugtongue they are met by hordes of well-fed, hot-tempered and battle-ready Beastmen who descend upon them from every direction.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos que siguen a Slugtongue están listos para la masacre, sabiendo perfectamente que la guerra sigue a la hambruna tan inevitablemente como el invierno sigue al otoño. Cuando los ejércitos de los hambrientos y aterrados marchan para enfrentar a Slugtongue, se encuentran con hordas de Hombres Bestia bien alimentados, de temperamento feroz y listos para la batalla, que descienden sobre ellos desde todas las direcciones.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As repugnant as Slugtongue is at first-hand, the signs of his passing are just as disturbing. With a single whispered phrase, he can unleash the power of blight upon the land and those that defend it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Por repugnante que sea Slugtongue en persona, los signos de su paso son igual de perturbadores. Con una sola frase susurrada, puede desatar el poder de la plaga sobre la tierra y quienes la defienden.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: At first glance, Slugtongue could be mistaken for a death-devil, for his head is little more than a leering, bovine skull and his emaciated body is covered with liver-spots and coarse, white hair. Yet on closer inspection Slugtongue teems with life, albeit of the basest kind - he is host to colonies of fat black lice, hopping fleas, bloated tics, wriggling worms and stink-bodied cockroaches that infest every dank crevice of his wretched frame.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A primera vista, Slugtongue podría confundirse con un demonio de la muerte, ya que su cabeza no es más que un cráneo bovino burlón y su cuerpo demacrado está cubierto de manchas hepáticas y pelo blanco y áspero. Sin embargo, al observarlo de cerca, Slugtongue rebosa vida, aunque del tipo más básico: es anfitrión de colonias de piojos negros gordos, pulgas saltarinas, garrapatas hinchadas, gusanos retorciéndose y cucarachas apestosas que infestan cada rincón húmedo de su mísero cuerpo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Stalking across the lands of Man like a black, hobbled crow, Slugtongue turns the most fecund and fertile valleys into barren and freezing wastes crawling with poisonous vermin.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Acechando a través de las tierras de los hombres como un cuervo negro y cojo, Slugtongue convierte los valles más fértiles y fecundos en páramos estériles y congelados llenos de alimañas venenosas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A master of Wild Magic and Shyish, Slugtongue's very presence causes his foes to begin to wither away from his supernatural blight.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un maestro de la Magia Salvaje y Shyish, la mera presencia de Slugtongue hace que sus enemigos comiencen a marchitarse debido a su plaga sobrenatural.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wherever Slugtongue goes destruction and famine follows him. Ravenous living hurricanes of skull-headed locusts whip and tear across the crop-fields, reducing them to shocking ruin in seconds. Rivers of virgin meltwater turn to bile at the sound of his gurgling, phlegm-choked laughter.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Dondequiera que Slugtongue va, la destrucción y la hambruna lo siguen. Huracanes vivientes y voraces de langostas con cráneos desgarran los campos de cultivo, reduciéndolos a ruinas impactantes en segundos. Ríos de agua virgen de deshielo se transforman en bilis al sonido de su risa gutural, llena de flema.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A strong mind is needed to channel the Winds of Magic. Those that have such a gift become arcane conduits - funnelling the magical tempests to their cause.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se necesita una mente fuerte para canalizar los Vientos de la Magia. Aquellos que tienen tal don se convierten en conductos arcanos, canalizando las tormentas mágicas hacia su causa.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Winds of Magic twist and churn around Tzeentch's almighty Paragons of Change.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Vientos de la Magia se retuercen y agitan alrededor de los poderosos Paladines del Cambio de Tzeentch.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A spell familiar memorises a spell on its master's behalf, constantly rehearsing for its big moment until it is called upon to share its arcane knowledge.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un familiar de hechizo memoriza un conjuro en nombre de su maestro, ensayando constantemente hasta que se le llama a compartir su conocimiento arcano.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Chaos Steed makes a fierce and intimidating mount for any conniving Sorcerer Lord.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Caballo del Caos es una montura feroz e intimidante para cualquier astuto Señor Hechicero.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: During Horstmann's escape from the Pyramid of Light, he managed to free the infamous Chaos Dragon Baudros from its prison, and upon its winged and two-headed form Horstmann took to the sky and fled towards the Chaos Wastes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Durante la huida de Horstmann de la Pirámide de la Luz, logró liberar al infame Dragón del Caos Baudros de su prisión, y sobre su forma alada y de dos cabezas, Horstmann emprendió el vuelo hacia los Desiertos del Caos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como parte del ritual de vinculación, los cuerpos de los Chilladores son aplastados y transmutados en aspectos inverosímiles.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Do not ask which creature screams in the night. Do not question who waits for you in the shadow. It is my cry that wakes you in the night, and my body that crouches in the shadow. I am Tzeentch and you are the puppet that dances to my tune..."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "No preguntes qué criatura grita en la noche. No cuestiones quién te espera en las sombras. Es mi grito el que te despierta en la noche, y mi cuerpo el que se agazapa en las sombras. Yo soy Tzeentch y tú eres la marioneta que danza a mi son..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Egrimm is blessed with the deep wisdom and cunning of Tzeentch himself. In battle he can confuse enemy plans foil their attacks. The Opposing generals are like puppets in a play staged by Egrimm.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Egrimm está bendecido con la profunda sabiduría y astucia de Tzeentch mismo. En batalla, puede confundir los planes enemigos y frustrar sus ataques. Los generales oponentes son como marionetas en una obra dirigida por Egrimm.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Horstmann’s Apprentices are everywhere, and nearly two thirds of all the Chaos cults in the Empire are either created indirectly by agents from within his network, are controlled by his Cabal in some round about way, or owe direct allegiance to him.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Aprendices de Horstmann están en todas partes, y casi dos tercios de todos los cultos del Caos en el Imperio son creados indirectamente por agentes dentro de su red, están controlados por su Cabal de alguna manera indirecta o le deben lealtad directa a él.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I would be so grateful for your cooperation in this, my lord. I do so hate to be... disappointed."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Sería muy agradecido por tu cooperación en esto, mi señor. Odio profundamente ser... decepcionado."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Daemons of Tzeentch no doubt whisperes their timeless secrets into Horstmann’s sleeping mind, and his powers grows strong.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Sin duda, los Demonios de Tzeentch susurran sus secretos eternos en la mente dormida de Horstmann, y sus poderes crecen fuertes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The majority of the warriors who protect the Cabal are willing slaves to Horstmann and his Apprentices. They are ignorant men desperate for the chance to learn a fraction of their master’s skills.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La mayoría de los guerreros que protegen el Círculo son esclavos dispuestos de Horstmann y sus Aprendices. Son hombres ignorantes, desesperados por la oportunidad de aprender una fracción de las habilidades de su maestro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Daemons of Tzeentch no doubt whisperes their timeless secrets into Horstmann’s sleeping mind, and his powers grows strong.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No hay duda de que los Demonios de Tzeentch susurran sus secretos eternos en la mente dormida de Horstmann, y sus poderes crecen con fuerza.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This potent talisman consists of a filigree of witch-hair cradling the fossilised eye of a Lord of Change. It is said to give the bearer a sixth sense that warns him of threats from afar.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este potente talismán consiste en un filigrana de pelo de bruja que sostiene el ojo fosilizado de un Señor de la Transformación. Se dice que otorga al portador un sexto sentido que le advierte de amenazas lejanas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This Runeblade encrusted with writhing Chaos runes that radiate a blue and malevolent power. Its touch is deadly and its bite will penetrate ordinary armour with ease.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta Espada Rúnica incrustada con retorcidas runas del Caos que irradian un poder azul y maligno. Su toque es mortal y su mordida penetra fácilmente la armadura ordinaria.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Powerful winds of magic constantly surround this daemon, greatly diminishing the effectiveness of magic attacks.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Vientos poderosos de magia rodean constantemente a este demonio, disminuyendo enormemente la efectividad de los ataques mágicos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La velocidad y brutalidad antinaturales de un Prometeo reanimado lo convierten en la montura ideal para cualquier pirata No Muerto amante de la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Drekla is the only other vampire in Harkon's fleet who has been present at the Battle of Grim Moor and survived to reach the Dead and Buried.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Drekla es el único otro vampiro en la flota de Harkon que estuvo presente en la Batalla de Grim Moor y sobrevivió para alcanzar el Dead and Buried.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Captain fights without speaking, his heavy cutlass rising and falling like an executioner's axe, ichor and slime spattering his barnacle-encrusted coat.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Capitán lucha sin hablar, su pesada alfanje subiendo y bajando como un hacha de verdugo, con icor y baba salpicando su abrigo cubierto de percebes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Captain Drekla's ironclad loyalty is inversely proportional to his wits. Where Harkon goes, Drekla follows – no matter how hopeless the fight.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La lealtad inquebrantable del Capitán Drekla es inversamente proporcional a su ingenio. Donde va Harkon, Drekla lo sigue, sin importar lo desesperada que sea la lucha.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Captain of the Desolation has a loyal crew behind him, ready to follow him wherever he goes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Capitán del Desolation tiene detrás una tripulación leal, lista para seguirlo a donde sea que vaya.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Pirate King would have perished many times over had not loyal Drekla ever been in his wake, hacking apart those zombies that came too close to Luthor Harkon.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Rey Pirata habría perecido muchas veces de no ser porque el leal Drekla siempre estaba a su sombra, desmembrando a los zombis que se acercaban demasiado a Luthor Harkon.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Captain Drekla is Luthor Harkon's right hand, which is somewhat ironic as he had lost his own left hand following the vampire admiral into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Capitán Drekla es la mano derecha de Luthor Harkon, lo cual es algo irónico, ya que perdió su propia mano izquierda siguiendo al almirante vampiro en batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The captain uses his hook to pinion his foes in place, trapping them beneath the brutal impact of his blade.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El capitán usa su garfio para inmovilizar a sus enemigos, atrapándolos bajo el brutal impacto de su espada.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Deep is Kouran's loathing for the ancient enemy, he has personally lead many attacks against them and will gladly do it again and again..
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Profundo es el odio de Kouran hacia el antiguo enemigo, ha liderado personalmente muchos ataques contra ellos y lo hará gustosamente una y otra vez.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: All fear his wrath and, under his merciless leadership, the army of Naggarond has crushed every foe it has faced with him at its head.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Todos temen su ira y, bajo su liderazgo implacable, el ejército de Naggarond ha aplastado a todo enemigo que se ha cruzado en su camino con él al frente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kouran cares nothing for the lives of other mortals, save the Witch King and Morathi, and has been known to sacrifice entire armies to defend the Dark Elf realm.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A Kouran no le importa la vida de otros mortales, salvo la del Rey Hechicero y Morathi, y se sabe que ha sacrificado ejércitos enteros para defender el reino de los Elfos Oscuros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kouran is that rarest of things in a land steeped in treachery is an honest soul, a warrior utterly loyal to the Witch King.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kouran es esa rara cosa en una tierra sumida en la traición: un alma honesta, un guerrero completamente leal al Rey Hechicero.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kouran has extensively studied the use of both sword and halberd from the finest weapon masters in Naggaroth, many of whom perished during the tutelage.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kouran ha estudiado ampliamente el uso tanto de la espada como de la alabarda con los mejores maestros de armas de Naggaroth, muchos de los cuales perecieron durante la instrucción.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Not a single Executioner have been granted one of these gifts of Khaine previously, Crone Hellebron has made an exception with Tullaris however, a fitting reward for his military contributions.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ningún Ejecutor había recibido antes uno de estos regalos de Khaine, sin embargo, la Anciana Hellebron ha hecho una excepción con Tullaris, una recompensa merecida por sus contribuciones militares.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is said that this weapon claimed the first victim during the great sacrifice that led to the creation of the Executioners and that it feeds upon the blood of its decapitated victims, imbuing its wielder with magical accuracy.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se dice que esta arma reclamó a la primera víctima durante el gran sacrificio que condujo a la creación de los Ejecutores y que se alimenta de la sangre de sus víctimas decapitadas, imbuyendo a su portador con precisión mágica.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Dios de las Manos Sangrientas vela por sus discípulos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: While a loyal servant of the Hag Queen, Tullaris' devotion is to Khaine, and Khaine alone. He has slain fellow Executioners without flinching, if he thought that they were remiss in their dedication or showed sloppy blade work.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Siendo un leal servidor de la Reina Hechicera, la devoción de Tullaris es hacia Khaine, y solo hacia Khaine. Ha matado a otros Ejecutores sin vacilar, si pensaba que eran negligentes en su dedicación o mostraban un manejo flojo de la espada.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Hellebron immediately took great interest in Tullaris when he was just a young executioner, so much so that when the Executioners first formed a bodyguard for the Hag Queen on a journey to Naggarond, she chose Tullaris to lead it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Hellebron inmediatamente tomó un gran interés en Tullaris cuando era solo un joven ejecutor, tanto que cuando los Ejecutores formaron por primera vez una escolta para la Reina Hechicera en un viaje a Naggarond, ella eligió a Tullaris para liderarla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under his command, the Executioners have partaken in such cold-blooded destruction that they have gained a fearful reputation across the world. Beneath their banner they march at the head of the army, eagerly seeking battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo su mando, los Ejecutores han participado en tal destrucción sangrienta que han ganado una temible reputación por todo el mundo. Bajo su bandera marchan a la cabeza del ejército, buscando con ansias la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: On Ulthuan, Tullaris is known as Drakiur, the Dreadbringer, ever since he captured a band of Shadow Warriors near to the ruins of Anlec and had their body parts nailed to the eastern gate of the ancient citadel.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En Ulthuan, Tullaris es conocido como Drakiur, el Portador del Terror, desde que capturó a una banda de Guerreros Sombra cerca de las ruinas de Anlec y clavó sus partes del cuerpo en la puerta oriental de la antigua ciudadela.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Hay un gran placer en la humillación y sufrimiento de los demás; este ha sentido y se ha deleitado en ello.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is said that this weapon claimed the first victim during the great sacrifice that led to the creation of the Executioners and that it feeds upon the blood of its decapitated victims, imbuing its wielder with magical accuracy.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se dice que esta arma reclamó a la primera víctima durante el gran sacrificio que condujo a la creación de los Ejecutores y que se alimenta de la sangre de sus víctimas decapitadas, imbuyendo a su portador con precisión mágica.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Witch Elves will often follow the Dreadbringer, for death and favour of Khaine usually follows wherever Tullaris goes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las Elfas Brujas suelen seguir al Portador de Muerte, ya que la muerte y el favor de Khaine normalmente siguen a donde quiera que Tullaris vaya.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The merest rumour that Tullaris and his Executioners are part of an invading Dark Elf army can cause floods of refugees to flee before the Druchii forces and in battle, enemies rout rather than face Tullaris and his deadly warriors.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El más mínimo rumor de que Tullaris y sus Ejecutores son parte de un ejército invasor de Elfos Oscuros puede hacer que las oleadas de refugiados huyan ante las fuerzas de los Druchii y en combate, los enemigos huyen antes que enfrentarse a Tullaris y a sus mortales guerreros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under his command, the Executioners have partaken in such cold-blooded destruction that they have gained a fearful reputation across the world. Beneath their banner they march at the head of the army, eagerly seeking battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo su mando, los Ejecutores han participado en tal destrucción a sangre fría que han ganado una reputación temible por todo el mundo. Bajo su estandarte marchan a la cabeza del ejército, buscando ansiosos la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Every ritual execution that Tullaris performs serves as a glorious offering to Khaine, driving the other Executioners he leads to match his skill and devotion with further slaughter.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cada ejecución ritual que Tullaris realiza sirve como una gloriosa ofrenda a Khaine, empujando a los demás Ejecutores que lidera a igualar su habilidad y devoción con más matanzas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "We dominate the seas of the world because they are ours to do with as we will. Our weak willed cousins once held all the oceans in their grasp, but allowed them to slip away as they declined into decadence. Not so, our forces. We strike where and when we will, leaving no doubt who are the true masters of the seas. We make slaves of the lesser races because they are fit for nothing else. It is only just that they should strive for their betters."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Dominamos los mares del mundo porque son nuestros para hacer con ellos lo que queramos. Nuestros primos de voluntad débil una vez sostuvieron todos los océanos en su poder, pero los dejaron escapar mientras caían en la decadencia. No así, nuestras fuerzas. Atacamos donde y cuando queremos, dejando claro quiénes son los verdaderos maestros de los mares. Hacemos esclavos de las razas inferiores porque no sirven para nada más. Es justo que ellos se esfuercen por sus superiores."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: His life has been punctuated by a bloody behaviour ever since he first heard the calling of Khaine.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Su vida ha estado marcada por un comportamiento sangriento desde que escuchó por primera vez el llamado de Khaine.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "If you're not on the list, you're not coming in!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Si no estás en la lista, no entras!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Death is always just a shot away.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La muerte siempre está a un disparo de distancia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque la precisión en el combate a distancia es algo que se puede aprender, este nació con un alto grado de talento natural.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Grungni is credited with teaching the Dwarfs all the skills for which they are famous.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A Grungni se le atribuye haber enseñado a los Enanos todas las habilidades por las que son famosos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este no caerá fácilmente; será necesario romper primero su voluntad y luego su cuerpo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills this dawi has perfected.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuándo golpear, cuándo bloquear, cuándo esquivar. Estas son habilidades que este dawi ha perfeccionado.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "El miedo del enemigo, su sangre derramada en el barro... estas son las cosas que me sostienen."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Grimm Burloksson is the youngest Dwarf to pass the many rituals required to be named a Master Engineer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Grimm Burloksson es el enano más joven en superar los muchos rituales necesarios para ser nombrado Ingeniero Maestro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Gyrobomber is a heavily-modified version of the Gyrocopter, equipped with a large payload of powerful bombs and ordinance.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Girobombardero es una versión fuertemente modificada del Girocóptero, equipado con una gran carga de poderosas bombas y municiones.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Gyrocopters are revolutionary flying machines that provides the armies of the Dwarfs with dedicated aerial support or as a form of fast reconnaissance.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Girocópteros son máquinas voladoras revolucionarias que proporcionan a los ejércitos de los Enanos apoyo aéreo dedicado o una forma de reconocimiento rápido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Whether by steam-powered clamp or teeth located along its blade, the cog axe can catch and break a foe’s weapon.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ya sea mediante una pinza a vapor o dientes a lo largo de su hoja, el hacha dentada puede atrapar y romper el arma de un enemigo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Maestros Ingenieros familiarizados con las formaciones defensivas usan sus siglos de experiencia en asedios.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un sabio Señor reunirá Ingenieros a su servicio, asegurándose de que los Enanos mantengan su ventaja tecnológica.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si un Maestro Ingeniero quiere algo, lo conseguirá. Los intendentes rara vez pueden negarse a un exigente ingeniero del Gremio.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I have seen better lavatory walls than this - I'll have it down by the morrow, that's a pledge!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "He visto mejores paredes de letrinas que esta. La derribaré para mañana, lo prometo".

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This new armoured gyrobomber plating has been developed to withstand high temperatures, as well as enemy strikes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este nuevo revestimiento blindado para el girobombardero ha sido desarrollado para resistir altas temperaturas, así como ataques enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Enemies struck by these bombs have their flesh melted off them in a slough, leaving only scorched bones and a foul-smelling liquid that is best described as 'goo'. Even the bravest of those who survive, after seeing their comrades so gruesomely reduced, have been known to flee immediately.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los enemigos alcanzados por estas bombas ven cómo su carne se derrite en una masa líquida, dejando solo huesos chamuscados y un líquido maloliente que solo puede describirse como 'baba'. Incluso los más valientes de los supervivientes, tras ver a sus camaradas reducidos tan horriblemente, suelen huir de inmediato.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This flamethower is a a powerful and deadly technological weapon that showers enemy units with a wave of white-hot alchemic fire.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este lanzallamas es un arma tecnológica poderosa y letal que inunda a las unidades enemigas con una ola de fuego alquímico blanco y abrasador.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Gyrocopters are as valuable for reconnaissance as they are for combat, sensing the most advantageous positions from which Grimm and his army can inflict the most harm.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Girocópteros son tan valiosos para el reconocimiento como lo son para el combate, identificando las posiciones más ventajosas desde las cuales Grimm y su ejército pueden infligir el mayor daño.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This new scanning device reveals enemy troop movement with greater efficiency.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este nuevo dispositivo de escaneo revela el movimiento de tropas enemigas con mayor eficiencia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This modified cannon fires Trollhammer Torpedoes - a spiky cone of death - at unfortunate foes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este cañón modificado dispara Torpedos Martillotroll: un cono puntiagudo de muerte dirigido hacia enemigos desafortunados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Dwarf Engineers are known throughout the world as unparalleled masters of science, gadgets, and technology.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Ingenieros Enanos son conocidos en todo el mundo como maestros inigualables de la ciencia, los artilugios y la tecnología.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un disparo certero es obra de un Ingeniero o un Trueno que puede acertar a un objetivo a más de quinientos pasos (enanos).

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos ingenieros que pasan sus vidas bajo tierra tienen un buen entendimiento de la guerra en las cavernas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Maestro Ingeniero conoce todo sobre las tasas de disparo, los campos de fuego y las mejores proporciones, su conocimiento mejora la eficiencia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los ingenieros siempre están modificando, llamando a estos ajustes "mejoras"; la mayoría realmente mejora cualquier artefacto en el que estén trabajando.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los ingenieros usan la sabiduría de los números para calcular las mejores trayectorias y arcos de muerte óptimos para sus máquinas de guerra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If you could once kill with it, this one can make it kill again, more and better.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si alguna vez algo podía matar, este puede hacerlo de nuevo, mejor y con mayor eficacia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Unheeding of advice, Grimm continues to forego the precision tuning so beloved by his guild and instead focuses on the trial and error of his own bold inventions.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Sin atender consejos, Grimm continúa ignorando el ajuste de precisión tan amado por su gremio y, en cambio, se centra en el ensayo y error de sus audaces invenciones.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An eccentric, if somewhat erratic genius, the young Engineer torments his guildmates by attempting new designs, questioning past methods and stubbornly refusing to give up new inventions.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un genio excéntrico, aunque algo errático, el joven Ingeniero atormenta a sus compañeros de gremio al intentar nuevos diseños, cuestionar métodos pasados y negarse obstinadamente a abandonar nuevas invenciones.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Rocket Engineering was something Grimm's father started experimenting on years ago, it only makes sense his son would continue the family tradition.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Ingeniería de Cohetes fue algo que el padre de Grimm comenzó a experimentar hace años, por lo que tiene sentido que su hijo continúe la tradición familiar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Even as a beardling, Grimm exhibited all the signs of a skilled inventor; when other aspirants were still learning basic principles, he had already constructed a self-lighting pipe, a steam-powered beard-braider and a double-barrelled rifle that could kill a half-dozen Greenskins with one shot.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Incluso como un joven sin barba, Grimm exhibía todos los signos de ser un inventor hábil; cuando otros aspirantes aún aprendían principios básicos, ya había construido una pipa de encendido automático, una trenzadora de barbas a vapor y un rifle de doble cañón que podía matar a media docena de pielesverdes con un solo disparo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As the son of the Guildmaster Burlok Damminsson, it was always expected that he would follow in his father’s footsteps. Even the eldest guildmembers conceded his ability; however, there were signs that his judgement was suspect and he did not value the ancient laws that Dwarf Engineers are expected to follow.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como hijo del Maestro del Gremio Burlok Damminsson, siempre se esperó que siguiera los pasos de su padre. Incluso los miembros más ancianos del gremio reconocieron su habilidad; sin embargo, había señales de que su juicio era dudoso y no valoraba las leyes antiguas que se espera que sigan los Ingenieros Enanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Grimm Burloksson is the youngest Dwarf to pass the many rituals required to be named a Master Engineer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Grimm Burloksson es el enano más joven en pasar los muchos rituales requeridos para ser nombrado Maestro Ingeniero.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This armour was forged in ancient days and is worn by the King of Karak Azul whenever he marches to war. It is forged from the finest gromril.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta armadura fue forjada en días antiguos y es usada por el Rey de Karak Azul siempre que marcha a la guerra. Está hecha del mejor gromril.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Thunderhorn is carved from an ancient tusk said to have been brought by the Dwarfs from the distant south in ages past. It has been carried into battle by every Lord of Azul since Karak Azul was founded.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Cuerno del Trueno está tallado en un colmillo antiguo que, según se dice, fue traído por los Enanos desde tierras lejanas al sur en épocas remotas. Ha sido llevado a la batalla por cada Señor de Azul desde que se fundó Karak Azul.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: While their King sits on his throne, the forges of Karak Azul have continued to produce weapons of unrivalled quality. Traded along the Underway and through hidden mountain trails, weapons from Karak Azul are in great demand throughout Dwarfholds and settlements.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Mientras su Rey se sienta en el trono, las forjas de Karak Azul han continuado produciendo armas de calidad inigualable. Comercializadas a lo largo de los Senderos Subterráneos y a través de senderos ocultos de las montañas, las armas de Karak Azul son muy demandadas en todas las fortalezas y asentamientos enanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The King has promised half his treasure hoard to the Dwarf who brings his kinsfolk back alive; a quarter of it to anyone who brings their dead bodies back to rest in Karak Azul. To anyone who kills Gorfang he has promised the pick of his treasures.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Rey ha prometido la mitad de su tesoro a cualquier enano que traiga a su parentela con vida; un cuarto de él a cualquiera que traiga sus cuerpos muertos para descansar en Karak Azul. A cualquiera que mate a Gorfang, le ha prometido elegir entre sus tesoros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: King Kazador has become a dark and brooding avenger, a pursuer of his people's enemies, and callous destroyer of evil wherever he finds it. As he leads his armies into battle, he sounds the great Thunderhorn to proclaim that King Kazador has come to take his vengeance once more.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Rey Kazador se ha convertido en un oscuro y sombrío vengador, un perseguidor de los enemigos de su pueblo y un insensible destructor del mal dondequiera que lo encuentre. Cuando lidera a sus ejércitos en batalla, hace sonar el gran Cuerno del Trueno para proclamar que el Rey Kazador ha venido a tomar venganza una vez más.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In his younger days, Kazador enjoyed life to the full, entertaining his subjects by performing feats of strength such as lifting a pack mule loaded with gold, drinking his greatest warriors under the table, and - his favourite sport of all - hunting greenskins in the mountains, perhaps with Gorfang gone these days could come back..
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En su juventud, Kazador disfrutaba de la vida al máximo, entreteniendo a sus súbditos con proezas de fuerza como levantar una mula cargada de oro, derrotar a sus mejores guerreros en competencias de bebida y, su deporte favorito, cazar pielesverdes en las montañas. Quizás, con Gorfang fuera del camino, esos días puedan regresar...

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Karak Azul is a center for all kinds of metalworking. The trade value of their products in the human realms makes the craftsguilds of Karak Azul as economically important as the weaponsmiths.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Karak Azul es un centro de todo tipo de trabajo en metal. El valor comercial de sus productos en los reinos humanos hace que los gremios artesanales de Karak Azul sean tan importantes económicamente como los herreros de armas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Hammer of Karak Azul has been borne by the royal line of Azul since the time of Grungni, and it can only be lifted by a member of Kazador's clan. This mighty two-handed warhammer is forged from gromril, and it bears an unusually potent combination of runes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Martillo de Karak Azul ha sido portado por la línea real de Azul desde los tiempos de Grungni, y solo puede ser levantado por un miembro del clan de Kazador. Este poderoso martillo de guerra a dos manos está forjado con gromril y lleva una combinación de runas inusualmente potente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kragg's armour is forged from heavy gromril. Over the years the Runelord has laboured long and hard on it, turning each separate component into a lovingly crafted work of art.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La armadura de Kragg está forjada con pesado gromril. A lo largo de los años, el Señor Rúnico ha trabajado largo y arduo en ella, convirtiendo cada componente individual en una obra de arte meticulosamente elaborada.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: During the Golden Age, even the lesser strongholds and fortified mines each had a banner with this rune struck on it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Durante la Edad Dorada, incluso las fortalezas menores y las minas fortificadas tenían un estandarte con esta runa grabada en él.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This rune was first made for mining tools, to allow them to break through rock with ease.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta runa fue creada originalmente para herramientas mineras, permitiéndoles atravesar la roca con facilidad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A banner with this rune resonates with loyalty, bolstering the resolve of the Dwarfs who bear it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un estandarte con esta runa resuena con lealtad, reforzando la determinación de los Enanos que lo portan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A war machine with this rune makes its crew unbearably proud - they will fight with great boldness to defend their beloved engine of war.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una máquina de guerra con esta runa hace que su tripulación sienta un orgullo insoportable: lucharán con gran audacia para defender su amada máquina de guerra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Forged in the embers of a captured book of spells, this rune hungers after the Winds of Magic.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Forjada en las brasas de un libro de hechizos capturado, esta runa ansía los Vientos de la Magia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Created to help guard stronghold gates (the first being those of Karaz-a-Karak), this rune has since been used on many other devices.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Creada para ayudar a proteger las puertas de las fortalezas (las primeras fueron las de Karaz-a-Karak), esta runa se ha usado desde entonces en muchos otros dispositivos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This rune causes rocks, vegetation, snow and mud to become easily passable.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta runa hace que las rocas, la vegetación, la nieve y el barro sean fácilmente transitables.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This ancient rune was invented by Valaya herself, the Ancestor Goddess of the Dwarfs and founder of Karaz-a-Karak.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta antigua runa fue inventada por la propia Valaya, la Diosa Ancestral de los Enanos y fundadora de Karaz-a-Karak.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This ancient staff of oak is adorned with the skull of a minotaur which Kragg slew while still a youth of just a hundred winters. The Skull has been coated in brass to preserve it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este antiguo bastón de roble está adornado con el cráneo de un minotauro que Kragg mató cuando era un joven de apenas cien inviernos. El cráneo ha sido recubierto de bronce para preservarlo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kragg is accompanied to the battlefield by Ancestral Guards who have sworn binding oaths of protection.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kragg es acompañado al campo de batalla por Guardianes Ancestrales que han jurado votos vinculantes de protección.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Perhaps one day he will find a worthy successor, but so far no one has proven themselves, much to the chagrin of many an aspiring Runesmith.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Quizás algún día encuentre un digno sucesor, pero hasta ahora nadie ha demostrado serlo, para disgusto de muchos aspirantes a Herreros Rúnicos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kragg rarely emerges from the Underhalls of Karaz-a-Karak, preferring instead to labour secretly on his lore, which he jealously guards.
