character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kragg rara vez emerge de los Salones Subterráneos de Karaz-a-Karak, prefiriendo trabajar en secreto en su saber, que guarda celosamente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The dense power exuded from the old runelord dampens any enemy magics hurled at Dawi nearby.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El denso poder que emana del viejo Señor Rúnico amortigua cualquier magia enemiga lanzada contra los Dawi cercanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Kragg goes to war he brings with him some of the finest rune items he has created.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando Kragg va a la guerra, lleva consigo algunos de los mejores objetos rúnicos que ha creado.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kragg the Grim is by far the oldest living Runesmith - only rivaled in power by a certain Thorek Ironbrow.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kragg el Ceñudo es, con mucho, el Herrero Rúnico vivo más antiguo, solo rivalizado en poder por cierto Thorek Cejohierro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kragg forged his hammer when he was still a young Runesmith, it bears Kragg's own hidden and secret rune. It heats up the hammer till it glows red hot and then transfers the heat to whatever it hits. It also drives the hammer forward with crushing force. The hammer is so hot that any enemies affected by fire are affected by the hammer as if it were actually burning.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kragg forjó su martillo cuando aún era un joven Herrero Rúnico; lleva inscrita una runa oculta y secreta propia de Kragg. El martillo se calienta hasta ponerse al rojo vivo y transfiere ese calor a lo que golpea. También impulsa el martillo hacia adelante con una fuerza aplastante. El martillo está tan caliente que cualquier enemigo afectado por el fuego sufre el impacto del martillo como si estuviera realmente ardiendo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Insidious thaggoraki, who dare threaten the great dawi holds with their vile plagues, must be wiped from its hallowed gates.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los insidiosos thaggoraki, que se atreven a amenazar las grandes fortalezas dawi con sus viles plagas, deben ser exterminados de sus puertas sagradas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Thorek can never be found without his Anvil of Doom and his most able assistant, a long-suffering Dwarf named Kraggi. Most of the time, Kraggi is a great aid to Thorek, but on occasion, his inexperience (he’s only been smithing a century) causes issues.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Thorek nunca se encuentra sin su Yunque de la Perdición ni sin su más capaz asistente, un sufrido enano llamado Kraggi. La mayoría de las veces, Kraggi es de gran ayuda para Thorek, pero en ocasiones, su inexperiencia (solo lleva un siglo como herrero) causa problemas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There are none more adept at metal-shaping than those who command the runes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No hay nadie más experto en la manipulación del metal que aquellos que dominan las runas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: With a resounding clang on his anvil, Thorek Ironbrow grounds enemy spells and smites those who would dare defy the growing might of the Dwarfs.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con un resonante golpe en su yunque, Thorek Cejohierro neutraliza los hechizos enemigos y castiga a aquellos que osan desafiar el creciente poder de los Enanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Like his High King, Thorek too longs to reclaim the Dwarf Empire of old, but he also has a personal quest — he seeks lost relics of the ancient days.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Al igual que su Alto Rey, Thorek también anhela reclamar el Imperio Enano de antaño, pero además tiene una búsqueda personal: recuperar reliquias perdidas de los días antiguos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Master Runelord of Karak Azul, is a Runelord like unto those of legend. In the best of his moods, he is fiercely irate and a living terror to his apprentices in the weapons shops of Karak Azul, where he has ruled for centuries on end.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Maestro Herrero Rúnico de Karak Azul es un Señor de las Runas digno de las leyendas. En sus mejores días, es ferozmente iracundo y un terror viviente para sus aprendices en los talleres de armas de Karak Azul, donde ha gobernado durante siglos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "In the olden days our ancestor realised the perils of dabbling with the forces of magic in its raw form, and they knew best. Runes they made, powerful runes to capture the magic, not let it float about all willy-nilly where it could do no end of harm. Everything had runes on in them days, even had me a rune-lamp once, and a rune-cloak.."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "En los días antiguos, nuestros ancestros entendieron los peligros de jugar con las fuerzas de la magia en su forma pura, y sabían lo que era mejor. Crearon runas, runas poderosas para capturar la magia y evitar que flotara libremente causando todo tipo de males. Todo tenía runas en aquellos días, incluso tuve una lámpara rúnica y una capa rúnica..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una vez entrenados para llevar a un hombre en batalla, los grifos imperiales son asesinos preparados e increíblemente dedicados a sus jinetes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un pegaso imperial es una noble montura alada, inteligente y leal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game in Stirland..."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Mejor que creas que podemos cazar. El problema es que no hay mucha caza en Stirland..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Stirland is a poor province and thus many of its soldiers bear simple arms and armour. Arrows are also hard to come by which means each arrow must hit its intended target, otherwise the enemy will surely be victorious.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Stirland es una provincia pobre, y por ello muchos de sus soldados portan armas y armaduras simples. Las flechas también son escasas, lo que significa que cada una debe alcanzar su objetivo, de lo contrario, el enemigo seguramente será victorioso.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Haupt-Anderssen is extremely religious and is known for his rousing prayers to Sigmar in the heat of battle. One might say that the young Count would have made an excellent Warrior Priest!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Haupt-Anderssen es extremadamente religioso y es conocido por sus fervientes plegarias a Sigmar en el fragor de la batalla. Podría decirse que el joven Conde habría sido un excelente Sacerdote Guerrero.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those who have sacrificed all to do the gods’ work enjoy more than a modicum of their protection.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos que han sacrificado todo para cumplir la obra de los dioses disfrutan de más que una modesta protección de su parte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When attacking larger abominations, the Witch Hunter has the accoutrements to bring such beasts down.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Al atacar abominaciones más grandes, el Cazador de Brujas cuenta con los accesorios necesarios para derribar a tales bestias.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I spy with my beady eye… something that needs to be killed."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Con mi ojo avizor… veo algo que necesita ser eliminado."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Witch Hunter levels his finger across the battlefield and accuses one of the enemy of arch-heresy!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Cazador de Brujas extiende su dedo a través del campo de batalla y acusa a uno de los enemigos de alta herejía.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Witch Hunter keeps many blessed relics on his person to protect him against arcane attack.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Cazador de Brujas lleva consigo muchas reliquias benditas para protegerse contra ataques arcanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Witch Hunter is a stern, grim figure, that can rarely be rattled despite the horrors he faces.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Cazador de Brujas es una figura severa y sombría, que rara vez se desconcierta a pesar de los horrores que enfrenta.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The role of Witch-Finder General is the highest attainable office within the practices of legally authorised and sanctioned witch hunters operating openly in the Empire. Bearing such a writ gives a witch hunter leave to investigate the taint of Chaos anywhere within the Empire and act upon it should he find it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El papel de General Cazador de Brujas es el cargo más alto alcanzable dentro de las prácticas de los cazadores de brujas autorizados y sancionados oficialmente que operan abiertamente en el Imperio. Portar tal mandato permite a un cazador de brujas investigar la corrupción del Caos en cualquier lugar del Imperio y actuar en consecuencia si la encuentra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una vez entrenados para llevar a un hombre en batalla, los grifos imperiales son asesinos preparados e increíblemente dedicados a sus jinetes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un pegaso imperial es una noble montura alada, inteligente y leal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is important to protect the trade routes within Drakwald forest, for without trade, there is no Hochland.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es importante proteger las rutas comerciales dentro del bosque de Drakwald, ya que sin comercio, no hay Hochland.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In Hochland, they say, a man may love his Longrifle more than his wife.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En Hochland, dicen que un hombre puede amar más a su rifle largo que a su esposa.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This large predator takes to the sky at the start of a battle. Ludenhof has but to whistle and point, and the eagle will dive sharply to attack his unwitting, and unlucky, foe with large razor-sharp talons.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este gran depredador toma el cielo al inicio de la batalla. Ludenhof solo tiene que silbar y señalar para que el águila se lance en picada y ataque a su desprevenido y desafortunado enemigo con grandes y afiladas garras.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ludenhof's hunting hawk, Parzifal, is his master's most favored bird. Trained, as all of his birds, from a hatchling, Parzifal lends aid to his master by viciously attacking the Count's enemy whilst in combat.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El halcón de caza de Ludenhof, Parzifal, es el ave favorita de su maestro. Entrenado, como todas sus aves, desde que era un polluelo, Parzifal ayuda a su maestro atacando ferozmente al enemigo del Conde durante el combate.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: At times, Aldebrand will bring a great horned owl to battle. In Hochland, the owl represents both wisdom and death. Though not a ferocious beast, the perching owl is symbolic of his master's efficiency - both in matters of governing and in matters of war.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En ocasiones, Aldebrand lleva un gran búho cornudo a la batalla. En Hochland, el búho representa tanto la sabiduría como la muerte. Aunque no es una bestia feroz, el búho posado es un símbolo de la eficiencia de su maestro, tanto en cuestiones de gobierno como de guerra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Aldebrand Ludenhof is a consummate politician and experienced hunter, strong of body and mind. Each of these skills lends to a rather unique style of warfare.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aldebrand Ludenhof es un consumado político y experimentado cazador, fuerte tanto de cuerpo como de mente. Cada una de estas habilidades contribuye a un estilo de guerra bastante único.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As an elected governing official of the Empire, an Elector Count has the power and authority to raise troops from his home province. In times of need, or if a regiment is being raised by the right individual, the Count may grant his favor to a unit.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como oficial gobernante electo del Imperio, un Conde Elector tiene el poder y la autoridad para reclutar tropas de su provincia natal. En tiempos de necesidad, o si el regimiento es reclutado por la persona adecuada, el Conde puede otorgar su favor a una unidad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¿Alguna vez pensaste en unirte a las tropas del Elector, jefe? Serías un buen soldado, sin duda."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La presencia de este Señor asegura cierta calma, reduciendo el pánico y la deserción entre sus seguidores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other ones, many wizard lords are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Lejos de las mezquinas disputas de otros, muchos señores magos pueden dedicarse al aprendizaje, la magia y las artes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "By earth, tree, and bone."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Por la tierra, el árbol y el hueso."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Ulric give me the fangs of the wolf,\\nUlric give me the claws of the wolf,\\nUlric give me the coat of the wolf,\\nAnd I will show your enemies the mercy of the wolf."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Ulric dame los colmillos del lobo,\\nUlric dame las garras del lobo,\\nUlric dame el pelaje del lobo,\\nY mostraré a tus enemigos la misericordia del lobo."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Mother Goddess provides succour for her children when needed.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Diosa Madre proporciona alivio a sus hijos cuando es necesario.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ulric is the god of warriors across the Old World, and initiates of his cult are expected to make their way in the world by directness, bravery and force of arms.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ulric es el dios de los guerreros en todo el Viejo Mundo, y se espera que los iniciados de su culto se enfrenten al mundo con franqueza, valentía y fuerza en las armas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Middenheim is a better place to live than many imperial cities. This liberalism might seem odd in a fortress city. It surely has much to do with the fact that the Todbringers have, for many years, taken care to listen carefully to their people when making and enforcing laws.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Middenheim es un lugar mejor para vivir que muchas ciudades imperiales. Este liberalismo puede parecer extraño en una ciudad fortaleza. Seguramente tiene mucho que ver con el hecho de que los Todbringer, durante muchos años, han tenido cuidado de escuchar atentamente a su pueblo al elaborar y hacer cumplir las leyes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Graf Boris is a great warrior and a brilliant statesman, and has been the head of his family for decades. He regularly leads the armies of Middenland personally, smiting his enemies with his Runefang and urging his soldiers to victory.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Graf Boris es un gran guerrero y un brillante estadista, y ha sido la cabeza de su familia durante décadas. Regularmente lidera personalmente los ejércitos de Middenland, golpeando a sus enemigos con su Colmillo Rúnico y animando a sus soldados a la victoria.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Todbringer's battles with the Beastmen in the Drakwald Forest, in particular with the banebeast Khazrak whose eye he took and in turn lost his own right eye to the year after, has made him a feared and hated name amongst the spawns of chaos.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las batallas de Todbringer contra los Hombres Bestia en el Bosque de Drakwald, en particular contra la bestia maldita Khazrak, cuyo ojo tomó y a cambio perdió su propio ojo derecho al año siguiente, han hecho de él un nombre temido y odiado entre los engendros del caos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Give me an enemy I may meet with strong steel and stout oak in my hands, not a dagger in the night and an accounting-book."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Dame un enemigo al que pueda enfrentarme con acero fuerte y roble robusto en mis manos, no una daga en la noche y un libro de cuentas."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: One of Van Der Kraal's most precious prizes, taken from a weird temple located in Lustria. Rumours suggested it was previously occupied by a crazed female-only cult who worshipped a snake god, but those are only rumours, that can't be true..
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Uno de los premios más preciados de Van Der Kraal, tomado de un extraño templo ubicado en Lustria. Los rumores sugieren que previamente fue ocupado por un culto compuesto únicamente por mujeres que adoraban a un dios serpiente, pero esos son solo rumores, no pueden ser ciertos...

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Although a black-hearted cutthroat of the first order, he is also notoriously a man of his word, which makes him rare indeed and sought after as a mercenary.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque es un despiadado asesino de primer orden, también es conocido por ser un hombre de palabra, lo que lo hace realmente raro y muy solicitado como mercenario.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Van Der Kraal has escaped death a great many times over the years, fought against the dark-mist kindred of the Cursed Marshes and lived, raided the Norscan coast with fire and sword and it is said even survived shipwreck on the infamous Vampire Coast of Lustria and somehow returned to tell the tale.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Van Der Kraal ha escapado de la muerte muchas veces a lo largo de los años, luchó contra los parientes de la niebla oscura de los Pantanos Malditos y sobrevivió, saqueó la costa de Norsca con fuego y espada, y se dice que incluso sobrevivió a un naufragio en la infame Costa de los Vampiros de Lustria y, de alguna manera, regresó para contarlo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Edvard is a dangerous man, a hard man and a grizzled survivor, albeit his adventures have left him grizzled, scarred and maimed, but only a fool would think him slowed down by his injuries.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Edvard es un hombre peligroso, un hombre duro y un sobreviviente curtido. No obstante, sus aventuras le han dejado cicatrices, marcas y mutilaciones, pero solo un tonto pensaría que sus heridas lo han ralentizado.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Manann's Blades have fought as often on the battlefields of the Old World as they have aboard privateer vessels plundering the coast of Sartosa. In recent years, under Van Der Kraal's command, the Manann's Blades have gained a reputation as dark as their captain.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las Espadas de Manann han luchado tanto en los campos de batalla del Viejo Mundo como a bordo de barcos corsarios saqueando la costa de Sartosa. En los últimos años, bajo el mando de Van Der Kraal, las Espadas de Manann han ganado una reputación tan oscura como la de su capitán.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those who break their word to Edvard, especially employers have quickly discovered that he makes a revenge an art form.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos que rompen su palabra con Edvard, especialmente los empleadores, descubren rápidamente que él convierte la venganza en una forma de arte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This strengthened hook was inspired by the Ogre's ironfists. It can be used to block missiles as well as a weapon.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este gancho reforzado fue inspirado por los puños de hierro de los Ogros. Puede usarse tanto para bloquear proyectiles como arma.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Seafather looks after his own.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Padre del Mar cuida de los suyos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: More stalwart and powerful than even the rider atop it, demigryph delivers a monstrous charge into enemy battle lines.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Más robusto y poderoso incluso que su jinete, un demigrifo lanza una carga monstruosa contra las líneas de batalla enemigas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una vez entrenados para llevar a un hombre en batalla, los grifos imperiales son asesinos preparados e increíblemente dedicados a sus jinetes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: While hated by the Merchants Guild and other Nobles, Helmut has always kept his relations to Cult of Taal and Rhya relatively good. He often takes at least one priest of Taal with him when he goes to war with his armies against the enemies of Talabecland.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque odiado por el Gremio de Mercaderes y otros Nobles, Helmut siempre ha mantenido buenas relaciones con el Culto de Taal y Rhya. A menudo lleva al menos un sacerdote de Taal con él cuando marcha a la guerra con sus ejércitos contra los enemigos de Talabecland.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Look around you -- these trees are their temple. The birds are their choir. Out here, other gods are small and far away. But Taal and Rhya are everywhere."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Mira a tu alrededor: estos árboles son su templo. Los pájaros son su coro. Aquí fuera, otros dioses son pequeños y están lejos. Pero Taal y Rhya están en todas partes."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Count is famous for having a long list of people who would much rather see Helmut Feuerbach disappear, Helmut however does not care what those foolish nobles think of him.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Conde es famoso por tener una larga lista de personas que preferirían ver a Helmut Feuerbach desaparecer; sin embargo, a Helmut no le importa lo que esos nobles insensatos piensen de él.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Taalbaston Guard is responsible for the defence of Talabheim. Taalbaston guardsmen take their jobs very seriously as they should considering that Talabheim lies deep within the Great Forest of the Empire of Man.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Guardia de Taalbaston es responsable de la defensa de Talabheim. Los guardias de Taalbaston toman su trabajo muy en serio, como deberían, considerando que Talabheim se encuentra en lo profundo del Gran Bosque del Imperio del Hombre.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those dedicated to Taal and Rhya respect people that are capable of taking care of themselves, but know the community works best if it works together, like a pack of wolves or herd of elk.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos dedicados a Taal y Rhya respetan a las personas que son capaces de valerse por sí mismas, pero saben que la comunidad funciona mejor cuando trabaja unida, como una manada de lobos o una manada de ciervos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "It's the emissary's job to mince words. It's my job to mince everything else..."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "El trabajo del emisario es medir sus palabras. Mi trabajo es medir todo lo demás..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The enigmatic smile that appears on the Theogonist's face whenever Luthor's name is mentioned has led many to think that the old man knows something important about Luthor's ultimate destiny. None are known to be sure of the Grand Theogonist's motives, but whatever the case, this lone Warrior Priest of Sigmar continues his long holy crusade against the Darkness, fighting with nothing but his faith and the powerful swing of his mighty Warhammer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La enigmática sonrisa que aparece en el rostro del Teogonista siempre que se menciona el nombre de Luthor ha llevado a muchos a pensar que el anciano sabe algo importante sobre el destino final de Luthor. No se conoce a nadie que esté seguro de los motivos del Gran Teogonista, pero, sea como sea, este solitario Sacerdote Guerrero de Sigmar continúa su larga cruzada santa contra la Oscuridad, luchando solo con su fe y el poderoso balanceo de su enorme martillo de guerra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A worthy mount for Warrior Priests to spread Sigmar's divine lore far and wide.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una montura digna para que los Sacerdotes Guerreros difundan el saber divino de Sigmar por todas partes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A worthy mount for Warrior Priests to spread Sigmar's divine lore far and wide.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una montura digna para que los Sacerdotes Guerreros difundan el saber divino de Sigmar por todas partes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "To me, sons and daughters! Forget your pain! Forget your despair! A new power is among you! To me! This is what you have become!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡A mí, hijos e hijas! ¡Olvidad vuestro dolor! ¡Olvidad vuestra desesperación! ¡Un nuevo poder está entre vosotros! ¡A mí! ¡Esto es en lo que os habéis convertido!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Tal es la convicción de este que otros no tienen más opción que creer.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este lucha con un fervor digno tanto de admiración como de desprecio.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Luthor Huss is a grim and determined figure of zeal, whose unwavering faith in Sigmar and his stern and almost emotionless expression has ensured the rooting of corruption whever he goes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Luthor Huss es una figura sombría y decidida de celo, cuya fe inquebrantable en Sigmar y su expresión severa y casi carente de emoción han asegurado la erradicación de la corrupción dondequiera que vaya.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Many Priest suspected of corruption have been found slain by Luthor's feet, and the tales of such grisly acts of righteous justice meted out by his hands has drove an Arch Lector of the Church to demand for his immediate excommunication.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Muchos sacerdotes sospechosos de corrupción han sido hallados muertos a los pies de Luthor, y los relatos de estos sangrientos actos de justicia recta impartidos por sus manos llevaron a un Archilector de la Iglesia a exigir su inmediata excomunión.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Luthor is truly a living nightmare of every corrupt priest, the scourge of the unfaithful and the bane of those who consorted with the Dark Powers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Luthor es verdaderamente una pesadilla viviente para cada sacerdote corrupto, el azote de los infieles y la perdición de aquellos que conspiraron con los Poderes Oscuros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Luthor has traveled the length and breath of the Empire, preaching against corruption and rousing the faithful to seek the will of holy Sigmar.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Luthor ha viajado por todo el Imperio, predicando contra la corrupción y animando a los fieles a buscar la voluntad del santo Sigmar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: You can't have too much of a good thing and a bit of what you fancy does no harm.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No se puede tener demasiado de algo bueno, y un poco de lo que te apetece no hace daño.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Never thought I'd die fighting side-by-side with a crab."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Nunca pensé que moriría luchando codo a codo con un cangrejo."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: These wandering warriors have left their homes to travel the world, fighthing, drinking and eating at every opportunity.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Estos guerreros errantes han dejado sus hogares para recorrer el mundo, luchando, bebiendo y comiendo en cada oportunidad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Norscans are infamous for raiding and marauding, so it is no surprise that they have a reputation as wanton pirates.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los norscanos son infames por sus saqueos y pillajes, así que no es sorpresa que tengan una reputación como piratas desenfrenados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In battle, Gunners oversee the banks of cannon, and on land they tend to be armed with the best pistols and other blackpowder weapons from the ship’s stores.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En batalla, los Artilleros supervisan las baterías de cañones, y en tierra tienden a estar armados con las mejores pistolas y otras armas de pólvora de los almacenes del barco.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As sailors, deckhands are experts in seamanship and ship operations. As pirates, they also quickly become proficient in swordplay and in using a variety of weapons.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como marineros, los tripulantes son expertos en maniobras y operaciones navales. Como piratas, también se vuelven rápidamente hábiles en el combate con espada y en el uso de una variedad de armas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Hay un momento en la vida de todo marinero en el que la bandera negra parece la mejor, si no la única opción.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This one has survived calamities and wounds uncounted, although they may have lost a few bits and pieces of themselves along the way.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este ha sobrevivido a calamidades y heridas innumerables, aunque puede que haya perdido algunas partes de sí mismo en el camino.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuidado con aquellos que navegan bajo la bandera negra: no dan cuartel y nunca, nunca abandonan la persecución.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The only law worth noting in Sartosa is the so-called “Pirate's Code”. It stresses both personal freedom and loyalty to your captain, crew, and ship (in that order).
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La única ley digna de mención en Sartosa es el llamado "Código Pirata". Este enfatiza tanto la libertad personal como la lealtad al capitán, la tripulación y el barco (en ese orden).

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As far as the tide stretches inland, so too does the Sea God's influence.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Hasta donde la marea se extiende tierra adentro, también lo hace la influencia del Dios del Mar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I'd rather give my tenth coin to Ranald than risk losing the remaining nine."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Preferiría dar mi décima moneda a Ranald antes que arriesgarme a perder las otras nueve."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Fuego, para destruir todo lo que has hecho; fuego, para acabar con todo lo que te has convertido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If you're offering enough, most people eventually start to see things your way.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si ofreces lo suficiente, la mayoría de las personas eventualmente empiezan a ver las cosas a tu manera.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Why would one pretend to be what he is not? There are many reasons, none of them innocent.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¿Por qué alguien fingiría ser lo que no es? Hay muchas razones, ninguna de ellas inocente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Ni siquiera de cerca notarán la diferencia."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Such methods are blunt and crude in the extreme, but still very, very effective.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Estos métodos son extremadamente burdos y crudos, pero siguen siendo muy, muy efectivos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las bestias del mundo pertenecen a todos, nunca a un solo individuo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si hay aranceles que pagar, ten por seguro que este encontrará una forma de evitarlos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Fuego, para destruir todo lo que has hecho; fuego, para acabar con todo lo que te has convertido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If you're offering enough, most people eventually start to see things your way.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si ofreces lo suficiente, la mayoría de las personas eventualmente empiezan a ver las cosas a tu manera.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Why would one pretend to be what he is not? There are many reasons, none of them innocent.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¿Por qué alguien fingiría ser lo que no es? Hay muchas razones, ninguna de ellas inocente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Ni siquiera de cerca notarán la diferencia."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Such methods are blunt and crude in the extreme, but still very, very effective.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Estos métodos son extremadamente burdos y crudos, pero siguen siendo muy, muy efectivos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las bestias del mundo pertenecen a todos, nunca a un solo individuo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Si hay aranceles que pagar, ten por seguro que este encontrará una forma de evitarlos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Beautiful and innocent it may be, but all will be consumed by fire in the end. It is written.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Puede ser hermoso e inocente, pero al final todo será consumido por el fuego. Está escrito.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Pirate Flagships are helmed by the most experienced and toughest of Pirate Admirals.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las Naves Insignia Piratas son comandadas por los más experimentados y duros de los Almirantes Piratas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It takes more than mere muscle to be leader, you must also know how to make money and how to inflict pain - a lot of pain.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se necesita más que mera fuerza para ser líder, también debes saber cómo ganar dinero y cómo infligir dolor, mucho dolor.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There's nothing quite like a good, straightforward plan - and this is nothing like one! Complexity rarely trumps simplicity, in all matters.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No hay nada como un buen plan directo, y esto no se parece en nada a uno. La complejidad rara vez supera a la simplicidad, en cualquier asunto.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Killing is at the forefront of this one's mind. Hopefully, they also know how to run a ship.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Matar está en el centro de la mente de este individuo. Esperemos que también sepa cómo manejar un barco.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: How else is an ordinary, decent pirate to make an honest living in these hard, dark times?
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¿Cómo más podría un pirata común y decente ganarse la vida honestamente en estos tiempos duros y oscuros?

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Be the cargo powder, steel, gold or flesh, in the final analysis it matters not.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Sea la carga pólvora, acero, oro o carne, al final no importa.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When pelting a helpless enemy with heavy projectiles is so much fun, why bother stopping?
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando bombardear a un enemigo indefenso con proyectiles pesados es tan divertido, ¿por qué detenerse?

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Its tough carapace gives Prometheans protection from most attacks, while its tremendously powerful pincers can rip apart masts, sails and superstructure.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Su duro caparazón brinda a los Prometeos protección contra la mayoría de los ataques, mientras que sus tremendamente poderosas pinzas pueden destrozar mástiles, velas y estructuras superiores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those shipmates who continue to do their job well, gets an extra share of booty.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los compañeros de barco que continúan haciendo bien su trabajo reciben una porción extra del botín.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Pirate crew are drawn together by the lure of the sea as well as the lure of plunder.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La tripulación pirata se une tanto por el llamado del mar como por la promesa de botín.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "My dearest darling Daisy deserves the best armour you can find for her. I don't care how much it costs, ask the dwarfs if you must, just get it done!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Mi querida y adorada Daisy merece la mejor armadura que puedas encontrar para ella. No me importa cuánto cueste, pregunta a los enanos si es necesario, ¡pero hazlo!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Oh, we'll make a soldier out of you yet, don't you worry. Now, grab that sword and show me what you can do!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Oh, aún haremos un soldado de ti, no te preocupes. Ahora, coge esa espada y muéstrame de lo que eres capaz."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is common knowledge that Marius relies on the advice of his warhorse, Daisy Kurt von Helboring II, as much as any advisors.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es de conocimiento común que Marius confía tanto en los consejos de su corcel, Daisy Kurt von Helboring II, como en los de cualquier asesor.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una vez entrenados para llevar a un hombre en batalla, los grifos imperiales son asesinos preparados e increíblemente leales a sus jinetes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un pegaso imperial es un noble corcel alado, inteligente y leal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A knight's worth no less than his steed, and Averland's horses are among the Old World's best.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El valor de un caballero no es menor que el de su corcel, y los caballos de Averland están entre los mejores del Viejo Mundo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Leitdorf is notorious for wearing flamboyant clothing and for that he needs the best clothing materials available.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Leitdorf es conocido por vestir ropa extravagante y, para ello, necesita los mejores materiales disponibles.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Leitdorf is an exceptional swordsman and military tactician who leads his armies at the front with considerable flair and skill. In fact, a number of great victories are owed to his insane courage and uncanny insights, and Karl Franz counts Leitdorf amongst his most trusted allies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Leitdorf es un espadachín excepcional y un táctico militar que lidera a sus ejércitos desde el frente con considerable estilo y habilidad. De hecho, varias grandes victorias se deben a su insana valentía y a sus increíbles intuiciones, y Karl Franz cuenta a Leitdorf entre sus aliados más confiables.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: While not that many outside of Averland would ever admit it, the rest of the Empire owns a lot to Averlanders and their Black Fire Pass defenders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque pocos fuera de Averland lo admitirían, el resto del Imperio debe mucho a los averlandeses y a sus defensores del Paso del Fuego Negro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Not many men can be said to have waged wars against forests, swarms of bees and half-imagined fishmen. Marius Leitdorf is one of them though.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No muchos hombres pueden decir que han librado guerras contra bosques, enjambres de abejas y semiimaginarios hombres-pez. Sin embargo, Marius Leitdorf es uno de ellos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: No hide nor armour can stand against the piercing fury of a Maneater's anchor.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ninguna piel ni armadura puede resistir la furia perforadora del ancla de un Comehombres.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: {{tr:character_skills_localised_description_wh3_main_skill_ogr_self_dominant}}
Some Maneater Captains keep their favourite Gnoblar as a "Giant Parrot" on their shoulders. These gnoblars are painted with beautiful plumage and wear masks that makes them look like parrots.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos Capitanes Comehombres llevan a su Gnoblar favorito como un "Loro Gigante" en sus hombros. Estos gnoblars están pintados con plumajes hermosos y llevan máscaras que los hacen parecer loros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This Maneater Captain has become an Admiral's favourite and they trust him and his endless loyalty when things get sticky.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este Capitán Comehombres se ha convertido en el favorito de un Almirante, quien confía en él y en su lealtad interminable cuando las cosas se complican.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This one is often found leading a mounted charge from the front, with his trusted lucky anchor in hand.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este individuo suele liderar una carga montada desde el frente, con su confiable y afortunado ancla en mano.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Such a tiny thing, you need more meat if ye wanna have any impact on the battlefield."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Qué cosa tan pequeña, necesitas más carne si quieres tener algún impacto en el campo de batalla!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Master Gunner assisting the gunnery crews during a battle is a welcome support, for only he knows how much black powder should be used or what to do when your pistol doesn't work- if he can hear you, that is.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Artillero Maestro asistiendo a las tripulaciones durante la batalla es un apoyo bienvenido, pues solo él sabe cuánto polvo negro usar o qué hacer cuando tu pistola no funciona... si es que puede escucharte, claro está.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A true master knows there is more than one way to defeat your enemies. Being thrown off your feat by a nearby blast is enough to leave many disorientated, deaf and defenceless.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un verdadero maestro sabe que hay más de una forma de derrotar a tus enemigos. Ser lanzado por una explosión cercana es suficiente para dejar a muchos desorientados, sordos e indefensos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Earning the respect of his subordinates is no small feat, but this one leads his forces with a camaraderie.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ganar el respeto de sus subordinados no es poca cosa, pero este lidera a sus fuerzas con camaradería.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Oleg and the Stalwart Bulls have tracked down and destroyed predatory herds of Beastmen near Wolfenburg and cast down their fell monolith. It was he who toppled the Skull Tower of Ravenhill, a beacon to all evil creatures that was found on the edges of the eastern hills. After such heroics, Oleg was appointed as Grand Marshal of Ostland, a senior military leader under his father.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Oleg y los Toros Férreos han rastreado y destruido manadas depredadoras de Hombres Bestia cerca de Wolfenburg y derribado su siniestro monolito. Fue él quien derribó la Torre de Cráneos de Ravenhill, un faro para todas las criaturas malignas que se encontraba en los límites de las colinas orientales. Después de tales heroicidades, Oleg fue nombrado Gran Mariscal de Ostland, un líder militar de alto rango bajo su padre.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Hold fast, men of Ostland. Where walls fall, there must stand men. But I will not be pulled from Volganof like a beast from a trap! Who will join me in taking the fight to our foe? Who will sally out with me?"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Manteneos firmes, hombres de Ostland. Donde caen los muros, deben mantenerse los hombres. ¡Pero no seré arrancado de Volganof como una bestia de una trampa! ¿Quién se unirá a mí para llevar la lucha a nuestro enemigo? ¿Quién saldrá conmigo?"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Si necesitas algo, hay guardias afuera de las puertas. Muchos guardias."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The youngest von Raukov has famously chosen to fight on foot, marching at the fore of his own unit of Greatswords, the Stalwart Bulls.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El más joven de los von Raukov es famoso por elegir luchar a pie, marchando al frente de su propia unidad de Espadachines, los Toros Férreos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A wolf at the door is still a wolf.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un lobo en la puerta sigue siendo un lobo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from all of their years spent barking orders at their ship.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este Señor habla con una voz grave y atronadora, un regalo de todos sus años dando órdenes en su barco.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This Captain never sails sober. The sea goes one way, Captain goes the other. Makes the rockin' bearable.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este Capitán nunca navega sobrio. El mar va en una dirección, el Capitán en otra. Hace que el vaivén sea soportable.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Taal's blessing grants this character additional skill in navigation and outdoor survival.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La bendición de Taal otorga a este personaje habilidad adicional en navegación y supervivencia al aire libre.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Rhya, the Mother Goddess shall provide succour for her children.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Rhya, la Diosa Madre, brindará consuelo a sus hijos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Many of Taal's priests wear a stag skull as a symbol of their devotion and the Forest Lord's power can be used to emulate the speed and beauty of this magnificent beast.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Muchos sacerdotes de Taal llevan un cráneo de ciervo como símbolo de su devoción, y el poder del Señor del Bosque puede ser usado para emular la velocidad y belleza de esta magnífica criatura.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: With its magnificent frame and the great plumes of steam of its snorting breath, the stag instils unflinching valour into those who ride it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con su magnífica figura y los grandes vapores de su resoplido, el ciervo inspira un valor inquebrantable en aquellos que lo montan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Many an armoured knight has been knocked to the ground by the surprising strength of the followers of Taal. Although traditionally called "Bear's Paw" this prayer is sometimes referred to as "Moose's Breath" by those who have felt its power.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Muchos caballeros acorazados han sido derribados por la sorprendente fuerza de los seguidores de Taal. Aunque tradicionalmente llamada "Zarpa del Oso", esta plegaria a veces es referida como "Aliento de Alce" por aquellos que han sentido su poder.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Bringers of Bounty perform rituals on crops and livestock, asking their Gods for growth and fecundity. Most are well versed in farming and animal husbandry, and are sought by commoners for their practical knowledge as much as their blessing. They organise local festivals and rituals to celebrate the equinoxes and solstices, guard the spirits of corn and wheat fields, and aid women in childbirth.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Portadores de Abundancia realizan rituales en los cultivos y el ganado, pidiendo a sus Dioses crecimiento y fecundidad. La mayoría están bien versados en agricultura y cría de animales, y son buscados por los campesinos tanto por su conocimiento práctico como por sus bendiciones. Organizan festivales y rituales locales para celebrar los equinoccios y solsticios, guardan los espíritus de los campos de maíz y trigo, y ayudan a las mujeres durante el parto.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Taal's name is invoked three times and the blood of an eagle is poured on the ground, the Lord of the Wild will cause thunder to rumble and the earth to shake.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando el nombre de Taal es invocado tres veces y la sangre de un águila se vierte en el suelo, el Señor de lo Salvaje hará que el trueno retumbe y la tierra tiemble.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Kin of Taal spend a great deal of their time building and sitting in sweat lodges, consuming alcohol, and using hallucinogenic substances to induce powerful altered states of mind. They lead men into the deep forest, where they dance, drink, and drum for days or weeks on end, or host wild hunting parties where the game is cooked and eaten in honour of Taal, along with gallons of powerful moonshine.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Hijos de Taal pasan gran parte de su tiempo construyendo y sentándose en cabañas de sudor, consumiendo alcohol y usando sustancias alucinógenas para inducir potentes estados alterados de conciencia. Llevan a los hombres al bosque profundo, donde bailan, beben y tocan tambores durante días o semanas, o realizan salvajes cacerías donde la presa se cocina y se come en honor a Taal, junto con galones de potente licor artesanal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Taal is the master of all beasts both great and small. Those who anger him may be mauled by a mountain lion or drowned in a flood caused by an angry beaver.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Taal es el maestro de todas las bestias, grandes y pequeñas. Aquellos que lo enfurecen pueden ser atacados por un puma de montaña o ahogados en una inundación causada por un castor enfadado.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is said that when Taal walked the earth, living things would spring up behind him as he passed. A portion of his power can be summoned by his followers to help regrow forests and aid in the return of the land to its natural state.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se dice que cuando Taal caminaba por la tierra, las cosas vivas brotaban detrás de él mientras pasaba. Una porción de su poder puede ser invocada por sus seguidores para ayudar a reforestar y restaurar la tierra a su estado natural.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Wardens are the stalwart defenders of Taal and Rhya's sacred locations, protecting them from the incursions of Beastmen, Greenskins, and ignorant citizens of the Empire who may not know what they are doing. Wardens are known for their quiet, serious, and often mysterious behaviour, and are rightly feared for the passion they have in defending Taal and Rhya's sacred locations.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Guardianes son los defensores férreos de los lugares sagrados de Taal y Rhya, protegiéndolos de las incursiones de Hombres Bestia, Pielesverdes y ciudadanos ignorantes del Imperio que pueden no saber lo que están haciendo. Los Guardianes son conocidos por su comportamiento tranquilo, serio y a menudo misterioso, y son justamente temidos por la pasión que tienen al defender los lugares sagrados de Taal y Rhya.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "By earth, tree, and bone."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Por la tierra, el árbol y el hueso."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: You command a beast with the authority Taal, and it complies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Comandas a una bestia con la autoridad de Taal, y esta obedece.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Your prayers imbue a character with the constitution of an ox.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Tus plegarias imbuyen a un personaje con la constitución de un buey.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: You growl wild prayers to Taal, and they fill you with wild rage.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Gruñes plegarias salvajes a Taal, y te llenan de una furia salvaje.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un pegaso imperial es una noble montura alada, inteligente y leal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Gausser leads the hardened Nordland armies against all foes from atop his enormous black and white Imperial Griffon, Schwartzmere. Each foe slain is one less to defile this mighty province.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Gausser lidera los endurecidos ejércitos de Nordland contra todos los enemigos desde lo alto de su enorme Grifo Imperial blanco y negro, Schwartzmere. Cada enemigo derrotado es uno menos que mancilla esta poderosa provincia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Gausser is a fearsome warrior-lord who embodies his people's tenacity and war-like nature to its very core. As Elector Count, he also holds the title of Prince of Marienburg, however he is forbidden to enter the city on pain of death.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Gausser es un temible señor guerrero que encarna la tenacidad y la naturaleza belicosa de su pueblo hasta la médula. Como Conde Elector, también ostenta el título de Príncipe de Marienburgo; sin embargo, tiene prohibido entrar en la ciudad bajo pena de muerte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Since its incoporation as a province, Nordland is famous for housing the Imperial Navy and its heavily tolled coastal roads, which provide both safe passage for rich merchants heading towards the city of Marienburg and the main source of income that funds it's economy.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Desde su incorporación como provincia, Nordland es famosa por albergar a la Marina Imperial y sus caminos costeros con altos peajes, que ofrecen un paso seguro para los ricos comerciantes que se dirigen a la ciudad de Marienburgo y son la principal fuente de ingresos que financia su economía.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The opposing nobles say that Gausser is nothing but a pawn of the Laurelorn Elves, but he knows that just this once, a pact with them is better option than a war with the elves.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los nobles opositores dicen que Gausser no es más que un peón de los elfos de Laurelorn, pero él sabe que, al menos esta vez, un pacto con ellos es mejor opción que una guerra con los elfos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Nordland Marines are resented in many seaside communities. When raiders attack, however, these same citizens are quick to accept the aid of battle-hardened Marines.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Marines de Nordland son mal recibidos en muchas comunidades costeras. Sin embargo, cuando los saqueadores atacan, estos mismos ciudadanos son rápidos en aceptar la ayuda de los Marines endurecidos por la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Many sea fortresses and watch-towers line the coast of Nordland, as raiders from across the Sea of Claws are an all too common threat that can't be ignored without dire consequences.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Muchas fortalezas marítimas y torres de vigilancia bordean la costa de Nordland, ya que los saqueadores del otro lado del Mar de las Garras son una amenaza demasiado común como para ser ignorada sin graves consecuencias.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Elector Counts of Nordland have accumulated an impressive collection of titles and claims over the millennia, which if enforced, would make them rulers of the entire northern portions of the Empire. Reality has a way of foiling the most grandiose ambitions, however, and the Count's rule extends to barely half of the lands he claimed.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Condes Electores de Nordland han acumulado una impresionante colección de títulos y reclamaciones a lo largo de los milenios que, de ser aplicados, los convertirían en gobernantes de todas las porciones septentrionales del Imperio. Sin embargo, la realidad tiene una forma de frustrar las ambiciones más grandiosas, y el dominio del Conde apenas se extiende a la mitad de las tierras que reclama.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Once trained to carry a man in battle, Imperial griffons are poised killers and incredibly dedicated to their riders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una vez entrenados para llevar a un hombre en batalla, los grifos imperiales son asesinos preparados e increíblemente dedicados a sus jinetes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un pegaso imperial es una noble montura alada, inteligente y leal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: For Ostlanders gun ownership is more important than basic personal hygiene, they also love tinkering with their weapons and as such many of their weapons have double barrels.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Para los ostlandeses, poseer armas es más importante que la higiene personal básica; además, les encanta modificar sus armas, y muchas de ellas tienen cañones dobles.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: At the head of his armies Valmir has fought against bandits, barbaric Orcs and Goblins, savage Beastmen, seaborne Norse raiding parties and marauding Chaos warbands. He is widely considered one of the most warlike leaders of The Empire.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A la cabeza de sus ejércitos, Valmir ha luchado contra bandidos, orcos y goblins bárbaros, salvajes hombres bestia, partidas de saqueadores norscanos y bandas de guerra del Caos. Es ampliamente considerado uno de los líderes más belicosos del Imperio.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ostland has tasted the lash of Chaos and their hatred of the evil ones knows no bounds.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ostland ha probado el látigo del Caos, y su odio hacia los malvados no conoce límites.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Like his father before him, he has spent a lifetime fighting against Chaos warbands, raiding Norse, and marauding Orcs, not to mention the occasional forays of bandits from Kislev.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Al igual que su padre antes que él, ha pasado toda su vida luchando contra las bandas del Caos, los saqueadores norscanos y los orcos merodeadores, sin mencionar las ocasionales incursiones de bandidos de Kislev.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Those bull-headed Ostlanders really will eat anything..."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Esos cabezotas de Ostland realmente comerán cualquier cosa..."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Oh, I'm sure it's this way. I can smell it."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Oh, estoy seguro de que es por aquí. Puedo olerlo."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This one won't move, won't roll over, won't give a solitary inch to anyone, ever, over anything.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este no se moverá, no cederá ni un ápice a nadie, nunca, por nada.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Smaller than their powerful Bretonnian equivalents, barding protects Imperial warhorses from blows that would otherwise fell these proud beasts.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Más pequeños que sus poderosos equivalentes bretonianos, las barda protege a los corceles de guerra imperiales de golpes que de otro modo derribarían a estas orgullosas bestias.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Despite his talent and high rank, he remains humble, and feels more comfortable with the common soldiery than the nobles. As an inspiration to Middenheim's defenders, Vorn is able to lift their spirits when he walks the walls at their side - a talent that will be needed in the dark times ahead.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A pesar de su talento y alto rango, permanece humilde y se siente más cómodo con la soldadesca común que con los nobles. Como inspiración para los defensores de Middenheim, Vorn es capaz de levantar sus espíritus cuando camina por las murallas a su lado, un talento que será necesario en los oscuros tiempos venideros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Vorn Thugenheim is inspired with the martial spirit of Ulric. He trains diligently every day, rising an hour before his peers to practice his weapons training and to run through the forests.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Vorn Thugenheim está inspirado por el espíritu marcial de Ulric. Entrena diligentemente todos los días, levantándose una hora antes que sus compañeros para practicar con sus armas y correr por los bosques.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Vorn has excelled in all areas of his schooling, mastering the litanies of Ulric and proving himself as skilled swordsman and hunter.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Vorn ha destacado en todas las áreas de su educación, dominando las letanías de Ulric y demostrando ser un espadachín y cazador hábil.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Vorn is a respected warrior who has been given the honour of being chosen to enter the Teutogen Guard for his service within the Knights of the White Wolf, holding a powerful position within the order.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Vorn es un guerrero respetado que ha recibido el honor de ser elegido para ingresar en la Guardia Teutógena por su servicio en los Caballeros del Lobo Blanco, ocupando una posición poderosa dentro de la orden.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Loyal, steadfast and fierce, he is the right hand of the Elector Count, Boris Todbringer. His father, Vieran was one of Todbringer's closest confidants and advisers. He gave his life for his lord in the same battle that Todbringer lost his eye in a desperate battle against the foul Beastmen of the Drakwald, led by Khazrak the One-Eye.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Leal, firme y feroz, es la mano derecha del Conde Elector Boris Todbringer. Su padre, Vieran, fue uno de los más cercanos confidentes y consejeros de Todbringer. Dio su vida por su señor en la misma batalla en la que Todbringer perdió su ojo en un desesperado enfrentamiento contra los repugnantes Hombres Bestia del bosque de Drakwald, liderados por Khazrak el Tuerto.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This warrior has something of an anger management problem. Funnily enough, no one has yet found a safe way to broach the issue.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este guerrero tiene cierto problema de control de la ira. Curiosamente, nadie ha encontrado aún una forma segura de abordar el asunto.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: {{tr:ancillaries_colour_text_wh3_main_anc_mount_ksl_boyar_war_bear}}
Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Estos usuarios de magia pueden ser sabios y ofrecer consejos prudentes, especialmente si han escrutado la región.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "I made this one specifically for you, keep it close or the spirits will take you"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Hice este específicamente para ti, mantenlo cerca o los espíritus te llevarán."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This one keeps her strange looking dolls nearby wherever she goes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta persona lleva consigo sus extrañas muñecas a donde quiera que vaya.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Detrás de cada pensamiento y acto suyo hay un rencor descarado y visceral.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Algunos me llaman vicioso. Les sacaré los ojos a quienes lo digan en mi presencia."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El caballo de un general puede ser su compañero más confiable y audaz. Solo no lo llames 'Daisy'.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Count Hertwig usually fights from the saddle of his blood clenched Imperial Griffon, Bloodfeather.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Conde Hertwig suele luchar desde la silla de su grifo imperial, Bloodfeather, que empuña con firmeza.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An Imperial pegasus is a noble, winged steed, intelligent and loyal.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un pegaso imperial es una noble montura alada, inteligente y leal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ostermark's trade routes have been secured by Count Hertwig's watchful state-troops, making trade between Kislev, Dwarfs and The Empire more secure and profitable.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las rutas comerciales de Ostermark han sido aseguradas por las atentas tropas estatales del Conde Hertwig, haciendo que el comercio entre Kislev, los Enanos y el Imperio sea más seguro y rentable.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Stuck next to Kislev and Sylvania, a dreary land of fog and rain on the best of days... Why does anyone want to live there?"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Pegado a Kislev y Sylvania, una tierra gris de niebla y lluvia en los mejores días... ¿Por qué alguien querría vivir allí?"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Plagued by an unfortunate incident in his past, the Elector Count of Ostermark fights all the harder to overcome his enemies and restore his reputation. Indeed, in the Mark, few who have seen his victories will even mention the event that transpired so long ago.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Acosado por un desafortunado incidente de su pasado, el Conde Elector de Ostermark lucha con mayor empeño para superar a sus enemigos y restaurar su reputación. De hecho, en la Marca, pocos de los que han presenciado sus victorias mencionan siquiera el evento que ocurrió hace tanto tiempo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wolfram is a fussy man, renowned for his methodical approach to warfare. The common folk sees him as someone to look up to.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Wolfram es un hombre meticuloso, conocido por su enfoque metódico de la guerra. El pueblo común lo ve como alguien digno de admiración.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Like the land itself, Wolfram Hertwig is proud and resolute, vying to stand strong against all enemies of the Empire.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como la misma tierra, Wolfram Hertwig es orgulloso y resuelto, esforzándose por mantenerse firme contra todos los enemigos del Imperio.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Choppa's out, ladz, we're goin' beard huntin' again!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¡Saca las hachas, chicos, vamos a cazar barbudos otra vez!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Gorfang's chariot rides to war, there is little that can stand in the way of his terrific charge.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando el carro de Gorfang marcha a la guerra, poco puede interponerse en el camino de su terrible carga.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This stinky hog is as grumpy and fierce as its brutal rider.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este apestoso cerdo es tan gruñón y feroz como su brutal jinete.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wyverns are highly-prized mounts for the most powerful of Orc Warlords.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las guivernos son monturas altamente apreciadas por los más poderosos de los Caudillos Orcos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Many of Gorfang's battles have been fought against Dwarfs, including the siege of Barak Varr and the attack on Karak Azul. As a result of his long struggles, Gorfang has acquired an unreasoning hatred of the Dwarf race.
