During the siege of Barak Varr he ordered the severed heads of Dwarf captives be catapulted over the walls and into the city.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Muchas de las batallas de Gorfang se han librado contra los Enanos, incluyendo el asedio de Barak Varr y el ataque a Karak Azul. Como resultado de sus largas luchas, Gorfang ha adquirido un odio irracional por la raza Enana. Durante el asedio de Barak Varr ordenó que las cabezas decapitadas de los prisioneros Enanos fueran catapultadas sobre los muros y dentro de la ciudad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Now, kill da gitz, all of 'em, everywhere! "
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Ahora, matad a esos cretinos, todos, en todas partes!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Gorfang is one of the mightiest Orc Warbosses, described as being as large as an Ogre and renowned for hunting and slaying Trolls for sport.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Gorfang es uno de los más poderosos Caudillos Orcos, descrito como tan grande como un Ogro y conocido por cazar y matar Trolls por deporte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "The betta the metal, the betta the murderin'!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Cuanto mejor el metal, mejor la matanza!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Youz wanna know how da boss got da name?"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¿Queréis saber cómo el jefe consiguió su nombre?"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Gorfang's tribe, the Red Fangs, is currently the most powerful Orc tribe within the area around the western end of Death Pass. Gorfang has subjugated most of the local Orc tribes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La tribu de Gorfang, los Colmillos Rojos, es actualmente la tribu de Orcos más poderosa en la zona alrededor del extremo occidental de Paso de la Muerte. Gorfang ha subyugado la mayoría de las tribus locales de Orcos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El pánico y el miedo son cosas que les suceden a otros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Amongst his many tasks he gathers information from the Sword Masters who roam the lands of Ulthuan, searching out Dark Elf spies and uncovering their destructive plots. When the enemies of the White Tower strike he will be ready, and the Sword Masters shall accompany him as they march to do battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Entre sus muchas tareas, recoge información de los Maestros de Espada que deambulan por las tierras de Ulthuan, buscando espías Oscuros y desbaratando sus destructivos planes. Cuando los enemigos de la Torre Blanca ataquen, él estará listo, y los Maestros de Espada lo acompañarán cuando marchen a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Ulthuan marches to war, none go more eagerly than the Swordsmasters of Hoeth, for only in war can they truly unleash the full extent of their deadly art.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando Ulthuan marcha a la guerra, nadie va con más ansias que los Maestros de Espada de Hoeth, pues solo en la guerra pueden desatar toda la extensión de su mortal arte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Belannaer has became a great mage and a teacher of sorcery to true seekers of knowledge. As a frail youth Teclis himself studied at the feet of Belannaer, absorbing and eventually coming to surpass his master's knowledge.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Belannaer se ha convertido en un gran mago y un maestro de la hechicería para los verdaderos buscadores de conocimiento. Cuando era un joven débil, Teclis estudió a los pies de Belannaer, absorbiendo y finalmente superando el conocimiento de su maestro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those who seek wisdom in Saphery will find it. Those who seek power for power's sake are never seen again.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Quienes busquen sabiduría en Saphery la encontrarán. Quienes busquen poder por el poder mismo, nunca serán vistos nuevamente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Belannaer has studied warfare and personal combat for centuries now. It is said that he can slay a foe with but a touch, or kill with a single precisely-pitched whistle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Belannaer ha estudiado la guerra y el combate personal durante siglos. Se dice que puede matar a un enemigo con solo un toque, o matarlo con un único silbido lanzado con precisión.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: These days Belannaer sits in the White Tower and reflects upon a lifetime of study. He is painfully aware that his duties have not yet ended. He senses that a greater challenge lies ahead, and that his powers will be sorely tested before he is allowed to find peace.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En estos días, Belannaer se sienta en la Torre Blanca y reflexiona sobre toda una vida de estudio. Es dolorosamente consciente de que sus deberes aún no han terminado. Siente que un gran desafío se avecina y que sus poderes serán severamente puestos a prueba antes de poder encontrar la paz.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Belannaer is the oldest living Loremaster of Hoeth, second only in power to the Warden of the White Tower, High Loremaster Teclis himself.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Belannaer es el más antiguo de los Maestros de la Sabiduría de Hoeth, solo superado en poder por el Guardián de la Torre Blanca, el Gran Maestro de la Sabiduría Teclis.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is rare to encounter two Loremasters who have trodden the same path to illumination. Even to an Elven mind, the realm of knowledge is a labyrinth, and none can explore all of its many chambers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es raro encontrar dos Maestros de la Sabiduría que hayan seguido el mismo camino hacia la iluminación. Incluso para una mente Elfa, el reino del conocimiento es un laberinto, y ninguno puede explorar todas sus muchas cámaras.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: At the time when the Norse began raiding Ulthuan in earnest Belannaer was one of the wizards whose magic shrouded the coast of Ulthuan in a maze of spells, making it almost impossible for raiders to reach the Elven Kingdoms.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando los nórdicos comenzaron a saquear Ulthuan en serio, Belannaer era uno de los magos cuya magia envolvía la costa de Ulthuan en un laberinto de hechizos, haciendo casi imposible que los saqueadores llegaran a los Reinos Élficos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Kingdom of Saphery is an enchanted land, with skies that shine with all the colours of the rainbow, hills that move by night and warm rivers that glow with gentle light. Magic courses through the blood of Sapherian Elves, and all of the realm's princes are also mages of awesome power.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Reino de Saphery es una tierra encantada, con cielos que brillan con todos los colores del arco iris, colinas que se mueven por la noche y ríos cálidos que brillan con una luz suave. La magia corre por la sangre de los Elfos de Saphery, y todos los príncipes del reino también son magos de un poder asombroso.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan stands atop the walls of the Shrine, his keen gaze scouring the lands of Ulthuan. Indeed, it is said that no event is so small as to evade Caradryan's gaze, and no sound small enough to escape his hearing.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan se encuentra en lo alto de los muros del Santuario, su mirada aguda escrutando las tierras de Ulthuan. De hecho, se dice que ningún evento es tan pequeño como para evadir la mirada de Caradryan, y ningún sonido es tan leve como para escapar de su oído.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los adeptos de Asuryan creen que forman parte del plan del Creador y que nunca serán abandonados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There is a natural bond between the Phoenix Guard and the Phoenixes of Ulthuan. This is a truly fearsome combination, the clear headed judgement of the Phoenix knight directing the Phoenixes attacks to where they can cause the most damage.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Existe un vínculo natural entre la Guardia del Fénix y los Fénixes de Ulthuan. Esta es una combinación verdaderamente temible, el juicio claro del caballero Fénix dirigiendo los ataques de los Fénixes a donde puedan causar más daño

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan serves the purpose and the plan of the Lord of the Gods, taking orders from no wordly master and appearing on the battlefield only by the will of Asuryan.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan sirve al propósito y al plan del Señor de los Dioses, tomando órdenes de ningún amo mundano y apareciendo en el campo de batalla solo por la voluntad de Asuryan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan leads the devoted guardians of Asuryan during times of peace and war. There is divine strength in his hand and the wisdom of Asuryan sits upon his noble brow.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan lidera a los devotos guardianes de Asuryan en tiempos de paz y guerra. Hay fuerza divina en su mano y la sabiduría de Asuryan se posa sobre su noble frente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Some have accused Caradryan of harnessing the prophecies of Asuryan in order to influence the future. However the truth of the matter is that he simply notices things that others do not, and has no prattling tongue to distract him from matters of greater import.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos han acusado a Caradryan de utilizar las profecías de Asuryan para influir en el futuro. Sin embargo, la verdad es que simplemente nota cosas que otros no, y no tiene una lengua parlante que lo distraiga de los asuntos de mayor importancia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There is a natural bond between the Phoenix Guard and the Phoenixes of Ulthuan. This is a truly fearsome combination, the clear headed judgement of the Phoenix knight directing the Phoenixes attacks to where they can cause the most damage.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Existe un vínculo natural entre la Guardia del Fénix y los Fénixes de Ulthuan. Esta es una combinación verdaderamente temible, el juicio claro del caballero Fénix dirigiendo los ataques de los Fénixes a donde puedan causar más daño.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Over his long years of study and contemplation, Caradryan has become ever closer to the thoughts of Asuryan, until finally the hand of the Creator marked him as the Captain of the Phoenix Guard.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A lo largo de sus largos años de estudio y contemplación, Caradryan se ha acercado cada vez más a los pensamientos de Asuryan, hasta que finalmente la mano del Creador lo marcó como el Capitán de la Guardia del Fénix.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan normally fights at the head of the Phoenix Guard, as befits his rank, but sometimes conducts the battle from the back of Ashtari, oldest and wisest of the Phoenixes of the Flamespyre.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan normalmente pelea al frente de la Guardia del Fénix, como corresponde a su rango, pero a veces dirige la batalla desde la espalda de Ashtari, el más antiguo y sabio de los Fénixes de las Llamas de Fuego.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan serves the purpose and the plan of the Lord of the Gods, taking orders from no wordly master and appearing on the battlefield only by the will of Asuryan.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan sirve al propósito y al plan del Señor de los Dioses, tomando órdenes de ningún amo mundano y apareciendo en el campo de batalla solo por la voluntad de Asuryan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan leads the devoted guardians of Asuryan during times of peace and war. There is divine strength in his hand and the wisdom of Asuryan sits upon his noble brow.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan lidera a los devotos guardianes de Asuryan en tiempos de paz y guerra. Hay fuerza divina en su mano y la sabiduría de Asuryan se posa sobre su noble frente.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Some have accused Caradryan of harnessing the prophecies of Asuryan in order to influence the future. However the truth of the matter is that he simply notices things that others do not, and has no prattling tongue to distract him from matters of greater import.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos han acusado a Caradryan de utilizar las profecías de Asuryan para influir en el futuro. Sin embargo, la verdad es que simplemente nota cosas que otros no, y no tiene una lengua parlante que lo distraiga de los asuntos de mayor importancia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There is a natural bond between the Phoenix Guard and the Phoenixes of Ulthuan. This is a truly fearsome combination, the clear headed judgement of the Phoenix knight directing the Phoenixes attacks to where they can cause the most damage.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Existe un vínculo natural entre la Guardia del Fénix y los Fénixes de Ulthuan. Esta es una combinación verdaderamente temible, el juicio claro del caballero Fénix dirigiendo los ataques de los Fénixes a donde puedan causar más daño

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Over his long years of study and contemplation, Caradryan has become ever closer to the thoughts of Asuryan, until finally the hand of the Creator marked him as the Captain of the Phoenix Guard.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A lo largo de sus largos años de estudio y contemplación, Caradryan se ha acercado cada vez más a los pensamientos de Asuryan, hasta que finalmente la mano del Creador lo marcó como el Capitán de la Guardia del Fénix.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan will become a Hero on the start of the next turn.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan se convertirá en un Héroe al inicio del próximo turno.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan will become a Lord on the start of the next turn.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan se convertirá en un Señor al inicio del próximo turno.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This ancient flame-wreathed weapon was enchanted for Kor-Baelon, the first Captain of the Phoenix Guard.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Esta antigua arma envuelta en llamas fue encantada para Kor-Baelon, el primer Capitán de la Guardia del Fénix.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En medio de un baño de sangre, es bueno saber que alguien tiene tu espalda.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Isha's protection can protect the faithful Asur through the darkest of days.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La protección de Isha puede resguardar a los fieles Asur durante los días más oscuros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El esposo de Isha es el padre de todos los Elfos; sus bendiciones se dan a quienes cazan para alimentarse, pero ay de aquellos que matan por deporte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those who employ War Lion Chariots benefit considerably from the ferocity of the huge, snarling cats, keeping foes exposed to their cleaving weaponry.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos que emplean Carros de Leones de Guerra se benefician considerablemente de la ferocidad de estos enormes gatos rugientes, manteniendo a los enemigos expuestos a sus armas cortantes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A War Lion's loyalty is to its kin, first and last. This fidelity, along with their incredible ferocity when they attack, has given rise to a great many songs and poems throughout Ulthuan, and it is with a clear measure of pride that the Phoenix King's bodyguard have adopted the famed White Lions of Chrace as their namesakes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La lealtad de un León de Guerra es para su parentela, primero y último. Esta fidelidad, junto con su increíble ferocidad cuando atacan, ha dado lugar a muchas canciones y poemas a lo largo de Ulthuan, y es con un claro orgullo que el cuerpo de guardia del Rey Fénix ha adoptado a los célebres Leones Blancos de Chrace como sus homónimos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El esposo de Isha es el padre de todos los Elfos; sus bendiciones se dan a quienes cazan para alimentarse, pero ay de aquellos que matan por deporte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Korhil is the leader of the White Lions honour guard and the personal and trusted bodyguard of Phoenix King Finubar the Seafarer. Thus has Korhil served Finubar the Seafarer with unfailing loyalty for many years, and has stood steadfastly beside him at many battles. Indeed Korhil's gemstone-set belt was a gift from Finubar following the Battle of Tor Achare, where Korhil hurled himself in the path of Morech the Black's Manticore.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Korhil es el líder de la guardia de honor de los Leones Blancos y el guardaespaldas personal y confiable del Rey Fénix Finubar el Navegante. Así ha servido Korhil al Rey Fénix Finubar con lealtad inquebrantable durante muchos años, y ha estado firmemente a su lado en muchas batallas. De hecho, el cinturón adornado con piedras preciosas de Korhil fue un regalo de Finubar tras la Batalla de Tor Achare, donde Korhil se lanzó al camino de la Mantícora de Morech el Negro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Korhil's honest demeanour and noble bearing have won him many friends amongst the Lords of Ulthuan, and the heroes of other races besides. Korhil has ever repaid his friendship with the same loyalty he offers his liege, and gladly marches to his allies' aid should the Phoenix King consent to sparing his services.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El comportamiento honesto y la nobleza de Korhil le han ganado muchos amigos entre los Señores de Ulthuan, y los héroes de otras razas. Korhil siempre ha devuelto su amistad con la misma lealtad que ofrece a su señor, y marcha gustosamente al auxilio de sus aliados si el Rey Fénix consiente liberar sus servicios.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: War lions which have remained in service for long enough develop a true bond with their handlers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los leones de guerra que han permanecido al servicio el tiempo suficiente desarrollan un vínculo verdadero con sus manejadores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Korhil was a famous warrior even before his rise to captain. Years before, it had been he who had hunted and slain the great lion Charandis. This was a particularly ferocious creature, mutated by the warping power of Chaos to an armour-hided brute that was mighty even by the standards of other white lions.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Korhil fue un famoso guerrero incluso antes de ascender a capitán. Años antes, fue él quien cazó y mató al gran león Charandis. Esta era una criatura particularmente feroz, mutada por el poder deformante del Caos, convirtiéndola en una bestia de piel blindada que era poderosa incluso para los estándares de otros leones blancos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The White Lions claim Korhil to be the mightiest Elf in all of Ulthuan and certainly his strength and stature is legendary. Yet, Korhil is no lumbering giant, for he wields his long axe with dexterity and grace that makes even his fellow White Lions appear cumbersome.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Leones Blancos afirman que Korhil es el Elfo más poderoso de todo Ulthuan y ciertamente su fuerza y estatura son legendarias. Sin embargo, Korhil no es un gigante torpe, pues maneja su hacha larga con destreza y gracia, haciendo que incluso sus compañeros Leones Blancos parezcan torpes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Hand-picked by Korhil to aid in his quest, each of the Puremane Company understood the enormity of the task before them and are prepared to die in its prosecution.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Escogidos por Korhil para ayudar en su misión, cada uno de los miembros de la Compañía Puremane entendió la enormidad de la tarea que tenían por delante y están preparados para morir en su ejecución.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Tree-cutter? Chayal would find your neck before you could pull that shiny toothpick from its sheath."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¿Cortador de árboles? Chayal encontraría tu cuello antes de que pudieras sacar esa brillante cucharita de su funda."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Korhil slew the Great Lion Charandis he afterwards skinned the animal and wore it's fur proudly upon his shoulders. Years later it was remade into a magnificent cloak, enchanted by the Loremaster Finreir and presented to Korhil as a gift from Finubar himself.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando Korhil mató al Gran León Charandis, luego despellejó al animal y llevó su piel orgullosamente sobre sus hombros. Años después fue transformada en una magnífica capa, encantada por el Maestro de Sabiduría Finreir y presentada a Korhil como un regalo de Finubar el Navegante.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Captain of the White Lions has carried this keen-edged and finely balanced axe since the regiment's founding. Korhil is but the most recent of a long and honored line.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Capitán de los Leones Blancos ha llevado esta hacha de filo afilado y equilibrada finamente desde la fundación del regimiento. Korhil es solo el más reciente de una larga y honorable línea.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Duke Adalhard appears to be a simple man. He excels on the battlefield and, whilst off it, enjoys feasting, gambling, and the other entertainments of warriors.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Duque Adalhard parece un hombre sencillo. Sobresale en el campo de batalla y, fuera de él, disfruta de los banquetes, el juego y otros entretenimientos propios de los guerreros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: He is anathema to the unholy, capable of destroying hordes of undead enemies without even lifting his weapon.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Es un anatema para lo profano, capaz de destruir hordas de enemigos no muertos sin siquiera levantar su arma.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Bohemond Beastslayer is the Duke of the vast domain of Bastonne in the heartland of Bretonnia. One of the god-like Grail Knights, he is renowned for slaying the mightiest beasts and the most horrific monstrosities.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bohemond Cazador de Bestias es el Duque del vasto dominio de Bastonne en el corazón de Bretonia. Uno de los Caballeros del Grial casi divinos, es renombrado por matar a las bestias más poderosas y las monstruosidades más horrendas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Cassyon of Parravon is the youngest of the Dukes of Bretonnia, still in his early twenties. Nevertheless, he is a Grail Knight and rides a Royal Pegasus.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cassyon de Parravon es el más joven de los Duques de Bretonia, con apenas veinte años. No obstante, es un Caballero del Grial y monta un Pegaso Real.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Chilfroy is a huge man, stronger and tougher than any of his knights or nobles. He is also famously grim: he has never been heard to laugh and reputedly only smiles when surveying the devastation he has wrought on his enemies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Chilfroy es un hombre enorme, más fuerte y resistente que cualquiera de sus caballeros o nobles. También es famoso por su severidad: nunca se le ha oído reír y, según se dice, solo sonríe al contemplar la devastación que ha causado a sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "For ze Lady!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Por la Dama!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos seres simplemente no saben cuándo dejar la botella.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It is commonly said that Ghorros Warhoof is the father of a thousand young, and yet that still does not do his exploits justice. A menagerie of twisted terrors that cover the Old World from one end to the other share his bloodline.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se dice comúnmente que Ghorros Casco de Guerra es el padre de mil jóvenes, y aún así eso no hace justicia a sus hazañas. Una menagerie de terrores retorcidos que cubren el Viejo Mundo de un extremo a otro comparte su linaje.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Little Morella is a rarity amongst her kind, she has shown intelligent unmatched by any other harpy and has managed to gain the respect of the Beastfather and his dread followers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La pequeña Morella es una rareza entre las de su clase, ha demostrado una inteligencia inigualable por cualquier otra arpía y ha logrado ganarse el respeto del Padre de las Bestias y sus temidos seguidores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The repulsive creature known as Molokh Slugtongue is anathema to cultivated life and natural harmony. Everything Mankind does to harness nature, every act of order intended to trammel the chaos of the wild, can be undone by a single gesture from Slugtongue's blackened claw. Slugtongue is the cold talon of winter incarnate, and famine follows in his wake.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La repulsiva criatura conocida como Molokh Slugtongue es una anatemización de la vida cultivada y la armonía natural. Todo lo que la humanidad hace para aprovechar la naturaleza, cada acto de orden destinado a controlar el caos de lo salvaje, puede deshacerse con un solo gesto de la garra ennegrecida de Slugtongue. Slugtongue es la garra fría del invierno encarnado, y la hambruna sigue su estela.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Seek refuge in faith or madness, for there's no longer any other place to hide. The Reign of Chaos has begun!..."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Busca refugio en la fe o la locura, porque ya no hay otro lugar donde esconderse. ¡El Reinado del Caos ha comenzado!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Drekla is the captain of the Desolation and Luthor Harkon's trusted second-in-command.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Drekla es el capitán de la Desolación y el confiado segundo al mando de Luthor Harkon.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kouran Darkhand is the longest-serving member of Malekith's personal army, having fought at the Witch King's side for nearly a thousand years.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kouran Darkhand es el miembro de más antigüedad en el ejército personal de Malekith, habiendo luchado al lado del Rey Hechicero durante casi mil años.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Lord Khaine. I send you this meagre offering, the first of many, on your night, Death Night. Let this be a sign of the compact between us, and lend your strength to me. Let the murders I commit this night be in your name and for your glory."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Señor Khaine. Te envío esta humilde ofrenda, la primera de muchas, en tu noche, Noche de la Muerte. Que esto sea una señal del pacto entre nosotros, y préstame tu fuerza. Que los asesinatos que cometa esta noche sean en tu nombre y para tu gloria."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Lord Khaine. I send you this meagre offering, the first of many, on your night, Death Night. Let this be a sign of the compact between us, and lend your strength to me. Let the murders I commit this night be in your name and for your glory."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Señor Khaine. Te envío esta humilde ofrenda, la primera de muchas, en tu noche, Noche de la Muerte. Que esto sea una señal del pacto entre nosotros, y préstame tu fuerza. Que los asesinatos que cometa esta noche sean en tu nombre y para tu gloria."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: King Kazador is the legendary King of Karak Azul, a magnificent and ancient Dwarf Hold that is situated with the southern lands of the Worlds Edge Mountains.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Rey Kazador es el legendario Rey de Karak Azul, una magnífica y antigua fortaleza enana situada en las tierras del sur de las Montañas del Fin del Mundo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Kragg is the oldest and by far the most powerful living Runesmith - a gnarled old Dwarf, strong and enduring as a weather-beaten oak.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Kragg es el más viejo y, con mucho, el más poderoso Herrero Rúnico vivo: un viejo Enano retorcido, fuerte y resistente como un roble curtido por el tiempo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A traditionalist in every sense, Thorek cannot abide new technology, and takes every opportunity to speak his mind on ‘new inventions’.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Tradicionalista en todos los sentidos, Thorek no puede tolerar la nueva tecnología y aprovecha cada oportunidad para expresar su opinión sobre las "nuevas invenciones".

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Though the Hawk of Wurtbad is but a young man and lacks the battle experience of his fellow Elector Counts, like all Imperial nobles he has been trained in swordsmanship from youth. Coupled with the mighty weapon of his predecessors, Alberich Haupt-Anderssen is still a dangerous foe.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque el Halcón de Wurtbad es apenas un joven y carece de la experiencia en batalla de sus compañeros Condes Electores, como todos los nobles imperiales, ha sido entrenado en esgrima desde su juventud. Unido al poderoso arma de sus predecesores, Alberich Haupt-Anderssen sigue siendo un enemigo peligroso.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Alberich von Korden is a Witch Hunter who is feared as well as respected in settlements across the Vale of Darkness.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Alberich von Korden es un Cazador de Brujas temido y respetado en los asentamientos de todo el Valle de la Oscuridad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Although Hochland is not an especially large or important province its count is one of the most valiant leaders in the Empire. Aldebrand is very tall and thin, but immensely strong and fit, making him a match for larger, heavier opponents in combat.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque Hochland no es una provincia especialmente grande ni importante, su conde es uno de los líderes más valientes del Imperio. Aldebrand es muy alto y delgado, pero inmensamente fuerte y ágil, lo que lo convierte en un rival para oponentes más grandes y pesados en combate.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Boris Todbringer is a determined man indeed, for outwardly he has remained as vigorous as ever, a fearsome fighter and leader.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Boris Todbringer es, sin duda, un hombre decidido, pues exteriormente se ha mantenido tan vigoroso como siempre, siendo un luchador y líder temible.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Edvard Van Der Kraal is the dreaded field commander of the infamous Manann's Blades, a powerful mercenary regiment owned and operated via intermediaries of the shadowy Merchant Lords of Marienburg.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Edvard Van Der Kraal es el temido comandante de campo de las infames Espadas de Manann, un poderoso regimiento de mercenarios dirigido y operado por intermediarios de los oscuros Señores Mercaderes de Marienburgo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The notoriously foul-tempered Helmut Feurbach of Talabecland is a whimsical, heavy-handed ruler who frequently finds himself at odds with his peers due to his poor judgement and irritating persona.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El notoriamente malhumorado Helmut Feurbach de Talabecland es un gobernante caprichoso y autoritario que frecuentemente se encuentra en desacuerdo con sus iguales debido a su pobre juicio y personalidad irritante.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Luthor Huss, known by others as the Prophet of Sigmar is a legendary and zealously pious Warrior Priest of the Cult of Sigmar that has traveled the length and breath of the Empire, preaching against corruption and rousing the faithful to seek the will of holy Sigmar.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Luthor Huss, conocido por otros como el Profeta de Sigmar, es un Sacerdote Guerrero del Culto de Sigmar legendario y celosamente piadoso que ha viajado por todo el Imperio, predicando contra la corrupción y animando a los fieles a buscar la voluntad del santo Sigmar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Marius Leitdorf, known most infamously as the Mad Count of Averland or as he says it the Elector Count of Averland and is counted as one of the Empire's bravest if not most sane Generals within the Empire's armed forces.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Marius Leitdorf, conocido más infamemente como el Conde Loco de Averland o, como él mismo dice, el Conde Elector de Averland, es considerado uno de los generales más valientes del Imperio, aunque no necesariamente el más cuerdo dentro de las fuerzas armadas del Imperio.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The younger of Valmir's two legitimate sons, Oleg is a towering leader of men and a warrior born, since achieving manhood, Oleg has led countless patrols into the Forest of Shadows, earning well his promotion to Captain.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El menor de los dos hijos legítimos de Valmir, Oleg es un líder imponente de hombres y un guerrero nato. Desde que alcanzó la mayoría de edad, Oleg ha liderado innumerables patrullas en el Bosque de las Sombras, ganándose con creces su promoción a Capitán.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Theoderic Gausser or known more formally as Elector Count Theoderic Gausser, Grand Baron of Nordland, Prince of Salzenmund, Lord of Laurelorn, Duke of Marienburg, and Terror of the Norscans. Yes, that is a lot of titles.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Theoderic Gausser, conocido formalmente como Conde Elector Theoderic Gausser, Gran Barón de Nordland, Príncipe de Salzenmund, Señor de Laurelorn, Duque de Marienburgo y Terror de los Norscanos. Sí, son muchos títulos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Valmir von Raukov is a tough warlord whose constant vigil has protected the northern borders of the Empire for many years.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Valmir von Raukov es un duro señor de la guerra cuya constante vigilancia ha protegido las fronteras septentrionales del Imperio durante muchos años.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Todbringer took Vorn under his wing when he was still a young boy, raising him as his own son. Nevertheless, he was a stern father figure with high demands and expectations, being particularly cautious not to let the young lad have a privileged upbringing.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Todbringer tomó a Vorn bajo su tutela cuando aún era un niño, criándolo como a su propio hijo. Sin embargo, fue una figura paterna severa con altas exigencias y expectativas, siendo particularmente cauteloso para no permitir que el joven tuviera una crianza privilegiada.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The League of Ostermark is a rural province with danger lurking in every corner. All eyes are fixed upon it's borders and watchtowers are garrisoned with stout, practical men. Trolls and Chaos Warbands are an ever-present threat. Greenskins inhabit the World's Edge Mountains. Sylvania is a southern neighbor. But the common folk have someone to look up to.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Liga de Ostermark es una provincia rural con peligro acechando en cada esquina. Todas las miradas están fijas en sus fronteras, y las torres de vigilancia están guarnecidas por hombres fuertes y prácticos. Los trolls y las bandas de guerra del Caos son una amenaza constante. Los pielesverdes habitan las Montañas del Fin del Mundo. Sylvania es un vecino del sur. Pero el pueblo común tiene a alguien en quien confiar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Always ready for murderin!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¡Siempre listos para asesinar!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Enlightenment is achieved by mastering not only the body, but the soul. Only then can a warrior truly understand the value of life and why it should be protected at all costs."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "La iluminación se logra dominando no solo el cuerpo, sino el alma. Solo entonces un guerrero puede comprender verdaderamente el valor de la vida y por qué debe ser protegida a toda costa."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan is the present day Captain of the Phoenix Guard, and wielder of the Phoenix Blade.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan es el Capitán actual de la Guardia del Fénix, y portador de la Espada del Fénix.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Caradryan is the present day Captain of the Phoenix Guard, and wielder of the Phoenix Blade.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Caradryan es el Capitán actual de la Guardia del Fénix, y portador de la Espada del Fénix.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Korhil, Captain of the White Lions is the leader of the White Lions honor guard and the personal and trusted bodyguard of Phoenix King Finubar the Seafarer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Korhil, Capitán de los Leones Blancos, es el líder de la guardia de honor de los Leones Blancos y el guardaespaldas personal y de confianza del Rey Fénix Finubar el Navegante.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Rastiltin Bebchuk is the current leader of a Kislevite military order of Ranger-Templars called the Brotherhood of the Bear.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Rastiltin Bebchuk es el actual líder de una orden militar kislevita de templarios guardabosques llamada la Hermandad del Oso.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Chakax is the eldest of the ancient city’s Temple Guard. He has never yielded in his task and has butchered whole regiments of foes that have dared attempt to kill his charges.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Chakax es el más anciano de la Guardia del Templo de la antigua ciudad. Nunca ha cedido en su tarea y ha masacrado a regimientos enteros de enemigos que se han atrevido a intentar matar a sus protegidos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There are few slann mage-priests left upon the world from the Second Spawning. Lord Huinitenuchli is one such revered being.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Quedan pocos Sacerdotes Magos Slann en el mundo desde la Segunda Creación. El Señor Huinitenuchli es uno de esos seres reverenciados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Tetto'eko is the Chief Astronomer of the Temple of the Eclipse in Tlaxtlan and one of the greatest Skink Priests the Lizardmen have ever known.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Tetto'eko es el Astrónomo Principal del Templo del Eclipse en Tlaxtlan y uno de los más grandes Sacerdotes Eslizones que los Hombres Lagarto han conocido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Egil Styrbjorn, known also as the Slayer of Souls and the Butcher of Immortals is a Norscan High Jarl of Skaeling, and one of the greatest champions of the Blood God Khorne to ever walk the land.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Egil Styrbjorn, conocido también como el Asesino de Almas y el Carnicero de Inmortales, es un Alto Jarl de los Skaeling y uno de los mayores campeones del Dios de la Sangre Khorne que jamás haya pisado la tierra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Egil Styrbjorn has taken many consorts from amongst the womenfolk of Strovengaard, for many women of Norsca are desirous to share their beds with warriors who bear the stigmata of the Dark Gods. From these countless wives did Styrbjorn sire a brood of 13 progeny of all ages, amongst them were Hrefna and Fraygerd, axe-maidens of consummate skill and deadliness.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Egil Styrbjorn ha tomado muchas consortes entre las mujeres de Strovengaard, pues muchas mujeres de Norsca desean compartir su lecho con guerreros que llevan el estigma de los Dioses Oscuros. De estas incontables esposas, Styrbjorn engendró una prole de 13 descendientes de todas las edades, entre ellos Hrefna y Fraygerd, doncellas de hacha de habilidad y mortalidad consumadas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Egil Styrbjorn has taken many consorts from amongst the womenfolk of Strovengaard, for many women of Norsca are desirous to share their beds with warriors who bear the stigmata of the Dark Gods. From these countless wives did Styrbjorn sire a brood of 13 progeny of all ages, amongst them were Hrefna and Fraygerd, axe-maidens of consummate skill and deadliness.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Egil Styrbjorn ha tomado muchas consortes entre las mujeres de Strovengaard, pues muchas mujeres de Norsca desean compartir su lecho con guerreros que llevan el estigma de los Dioses Oscuros. De estas incontables esposas, Styrbjorn engendró una prole de 13 descendientes de todas las edades, entre ellos Hrefna y Fraygerd, doncellas de hacha de habilidad y mortalidad consumadas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under Feskit's leadership, Clan Mordkin has recovered much of the wealth and influence it has lost in the preceding centuries.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo el liderazgo de Feskit, el Clan Mordkin ha recuperado gran parte de la riqueza e influencia que perdió en los siglos precedentes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ramhotep the Visionary has designed the Grand Necropolis of Resetra, the Monuments of Eternal Death in Zandri, the Monoliths of the Great Plains and many other architectural wonders. He is perhaps the greatest Necrotect in history.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ramhotep el Visionario ha diseñado la Gran Necrópolis de Resetra, los Monumentos de la Muerte Eterna en Zandri, los Monolitos de las Grandes Llanuras y muchas otras maravillas arquitectónicas. Es quizás el mayor Necroteco de la historia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under his rule, life has returned to the desert and once again crops grow around the city of Numas. Numas is a marvellous place, and over many centuries the pyramids have been restored to their former glory.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo su gobierno, la vida ha regresado al desierto y nuevamente los cultivos crecen alrededor de la ciudad de Numas. Numas es un lugar maravilloso, y durante muchos siglos las pirámides han sido restauradas a su antigua gloria.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Melekh the Changer is a mighty Chaos Champion of Tzeentch and one of Archaon's Lieutenants.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Melekh el Cambiador es un poderoso Campeón del Caos de Tzeentch y uno de los lugartenientes de Archaón.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Dieter Helsnicht, known as the Doom Lord of Middenheim or Doom Lord of the Undead. He built a secret fortress in the Forest of Shadows and concealed it so well that it was never discovered by the Witch Hunters who searched for him for years. There he slowly built up his strength and plotted his revenge.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Dieter Helsnicht, conocido como el Señor de la Perdición de Middenheim o el Señor de la Perdición de los No Muertos, construyó una fortaleza secreta en el Bosque de las Sombras y la ocultó tan bien que nunca fue descubierta por los Cazadores de Brujas que lo buscaron durante años. Allí acumuló lentamente su fuerza y planeó su venganza.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lord Daith, most celebrated of all the Elven smiths, is the master of Torgovann, and has been for as long as any Elf can recall.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Señor Daith, el más célebre de todos los herreros elfos, es el maestro de Torgovann y lo ha sido durante más tiempo del que cualquier elfo puede recordar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Naieth the Prophetess is skilled in the arcane art of divination. Only a select band of mages know this secret lore.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Naieth la Profetisa es experta en el arte arcano de la adivinación. Solo un selecto grupo de magos conoce este Saber secreto.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wychwethyl the Wild is a Wardancer of exceptional skill and agility. It is he who performs the ritual dance at the beginning of spring which awakens the King and Queen in the Wood after their long sleep in the Oak of Ages.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Wychwethyl el Salvaje es un Bailarín Guerrero de habilidad y agilidad excepcionales. Es él quien realiza la danza ritual al comienzo de la primavera que despierta al Rey y la Reina del Bosque tras su largo sueño en el Roble de las Edades.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: {{tr:units_custom_battle_mounts_localised_description_wh3_main_ksl_cha_boyar_0wh3_main_ksl_cha_boyar_1}}
Some followers of Taal are able to converse with animals and this extends to the Brotherhood as well. It is not rare to see Rastiltin spending more time with his bears than his fellow soldiers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos seguidores de Taal son capaces de conversar con los animales, y esto también se extiende a la Hermandad. No es raro ver a Rastiltin pasando más tiempo con sus osos que con sus compañeros soldados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Grand Master is always at the forefront of an army when it marches to war, and is usually among the most trusted of military advisors and generals, and when not engaged in warfare is often charged with planning for it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Gran Maestre siempre está al frente de un ejército cuando marcha a la guerra, y suele estar entre los asesores y generales militares más confiables. Cuando no está involucrado en la guerra, a menudo se encarga de planificarla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Rastiltin Bebchuk is the current Grand Master of Brotherhood of the Bear. While never truly safe, with Rastiltin's leadership they have kept Kislev's borderlands safer against the invading Chaos worshippers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Rastiltin Bebchuk es el actual Gran Maestre de la Hermandad del Oso. Aunque nunca están realmente a salvo, bajo el liderazgo de Rastiltin han mantenido más seguras las tierras fronterizas de Kislev contra los adoradores invasores del Caos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A life lived hand-in-hand with nature means that, when this one calls upon the trees, they answer his request.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una vida vivida mano a mano con la naturaleza significa que, cuando este llama a los árboles, ellos responden a su solicitud.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Tzarina Taira Pavlovna of Kislev formed this unusual knightly order four centuries ago as an answer to the pleas of those Kislevites who lived on the tsardom's borderlands and were constantly harassed by marauding Orcs and Chaos Warriors.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Tzarina Taira Pavlovna de Kislev formó esta inusual orden de caballería hace cuatro siglos como respuesta a las súplicas de los kislevitas que vivían en las tierras fronterizas del zarato y eran constantemente hostigados por orcos saqueadores y guerreros del Caos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The brotherhood's knights are trained in the tactics of ambush and guerrilla warfare and their superior equipment, experience and careful preparation have guaranteed many victories for Kislev over the years.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los caballeros de la hermandad están entrenados en tácticas de emboscada y guerra de guerrillas, y su equipo superior, experiencia y cuidadosa preparación han garantizado muchas victorias para Kislev a lo largo de los años.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Bray-Shaman magnifies the savage and animalistic parts of the foe's psyche until they are no more than growling beasts.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Bray-Chamán magnifica las partes salvajes y animalísticas de la psique del enemigo hasta que no son más que bestias gruñendo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It has been known for Temple Guard to maintain such a sleepless vigil for centuries, thick layers of dust settling upon their reptilian forms — yet the ever-watchful guardians are not immobile statues, and can erupt into sudden violence should they perceive any threat to their charges.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se sabe que la Guardia del Templo mantiene tal vigilia sin sueño durante siglos, capas gruesas de polvo se asientan sobre sus formas reptilianas — sin embargo, los guardianes siempre vigilantes no son estatuas inmóviles, y pueden estallar en violencia repentina si perciben alguna amenaza para sus protegidos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Only the most powerful of the Slann are allowed to contemplate from Xlanhuapec’s secluded Eternity Chamber and when they retire to its tranquil composure, it is Chakax alone who is entrusted to watch over them. He has been known to maintain his vigil for many centuries at a time.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Solo los Slann más poderosos tienen permitido contemplar desde la aislada Cámara de la Eternidad de Xlanhuapec, y cuando se retiran a su tranquila composición, es solo Chakax quien es confiado con su vigilancia. Se sabe que mantiene su vigilia durante muchos siglos a la vez.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As the last line of defence between an assasin's blade and the Mage-Priest he is charged with defending, Chakax's skills as a bodyguard are commensurate with his age.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como la última línea de defensa entre la espada de un asesino y el Mago Sacerdote que se le ha encargado defender, las habilidades de Chakax como guardaespaldas son acordes con su edad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Not a single Slann under Chakax' special protection has died to an enemy blow, and he has become expert at discerning the most covert of threats and then flattening them with a mighty two-handed swing.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ni un solo Slann bajo la protección especial de Chakax ha muerto por el golpe de un enemigo, y él se ha convertido en un experto en discernir las amenazas más ocultas y luego aplastarlas con un poderoso golpe a dos manos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Very few Saurus Temple Guard will ever prove worthy enough to protect a Slann Mage-Priest at his most vulnerable moments — when he meditates in his Eternity Chamber. Chakax is one of those who are worthy enough.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Muy pocos Guerreros de la Guardia del Templo Saurus demostrarán alguna vez ser lo suficientemente dignos como para proteger a un Mago Sacerdote Slann en sus momentos más vulnerables — cuando medita en su Cámara de la Eternidad. Chakax es uno de los que son lo suficientemente dignos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A survivor… or is it a really good Ward Save?
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¿Un sobreviviente… o es una excelente Salvación contra Magia?

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Plaque of Shrouded Mists is an ancient stone relic carved before the second spawning of the Slann that contains elements of the Old Ones’ own, indecipherable, language. The unfathomable power contained within these graven images is enough to cause the unwary to go mad, and simply by glancing at the glyphs, unprepared minds can be shocked into a bewildering stupor as the insignificance of their puny lives on the cosmic scales of the Old Ones is relentlessly forced into their minds.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Placa de las Nieblas Ocultas es una antigua reliquia de piedra tallada antes de la segunda creación de los Slann que contiene elementos del propio, indecifrable, lenguaje de los Antiguos. El poder insondable contenido en estas imágenes grabadas es suficiente para hacer que los desprevenidos se vuelvan locos, y solo al echar un vistazo a los glifos, mentes no preparadas pueden caer en un estupor desconcertante, ya que la insignificancia de sus vidas ante las escalas cósmicas de los Antiguos se les impone implacablemente en sus mentes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: All shall be one, as it is written.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Todo será uno, como está escrito.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Contemplation is the path to alignment, to the correct interpretation of the Great Plan.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La contemplación es el camino hacia la alineación, hacia la interpretación correcta del Gran Plan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Everywhere we shine, death and life burn into something new…"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Allí donde brillamos, la muerte y la vida se transforman en algo nuevo…"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: According to his most senior Skink Priest attendant, these words were said by Lord Huinitenuchli when the first Elves to enter Lustria were brought before him
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Según su asistente, el más antiguo de los Sacerdotes Eslizones, estas palabras fueron dichas por el Señor Huinitenuchli cuando los primeros Elfos que entraron en Lustria fueron traídos ante él.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Through millennia of study, total mastery over magic may be attained.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A través de milenios de estudio, puede alcanzarse el dominio total sobre la magia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The power of the Old Ones, stored for future use so that - at precisely the right time - the Great Plan may be advanced.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El poder de los Antiguos, almacenado para su uso futuro para que, en el momento preciso, el Gran Plan pueda avanzar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Cold, merciless, without pity, obeying only logic. Hardened against magic's ill-effects.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Frío, implacable, sin piedad, obedeciendo solo la lógica. Endurecido contra los efectos negativos de la magia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando es herido, la pura fuerza de voluntad del Slann literalmente recombina su cuerpo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los patrones de pensamiento del Mago Sacerdote son tan ajenos que ni siquiera los Magos enemigos pueden percibirlos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Through millennia of study, total mastery over magic may be attained.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A través de milenios de estudio, puede alcanzarse un dominio total sobre la magia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lord Huinitenuchli is the creator and the teacher of the Guardian Mist, a magical mist protecting Xlanhuapec and its surroundings from invaders.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Lord Huinitenuchli es el creador y maestro de la Niebla Guardiana, una niebla mágica que protege Xlanhuapec y sus alrededores de los invasores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Slann is especially skilled in the elemental magical arts, his very words turn to creeping vapour, filling his chamber with cloying fog and spreading forth to encompass the entire city.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Slann está especialmente dotado en las artes mágicas elementales, sus propias palabras se transforman en un vapor reptante que llena su cámara de una densa niebla y se extiende para abarcar toda la ciudad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: For its own protection, the entire city of Xlanhuapec is perpetually wreathed in banks of coiling mist and it is possible to pass within a few yards of its boundary stones without noting the city’s sprawling presence, so thick are those swirling vapours.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Para su propia protección, la ciudad entera de Xlanhuapec está perpetuamente envuelta en bancos de niebla serpenteante, y es posible pasar a unos pocos pasos de sus piedras limítrofes sin notar la presencia extensa de la ciudad, tan densos son esos vapores arremolinados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: According to his most senior Skink Priest attendant, these words were said by Lord Huinitenuchli when the first Elves to enter Lustria were brought before him
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Según su sacerdote eslizón asistente más senior, estas palabras fueron pronunciadas por Lord Huinitenuchli cuando los primeros elfos que entraron en Lustria fueron llevados ante él.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lord Huinitenuchli defeated a Slaaneshi Daemon Prince referred to in the archives as 'the nether-thing of the second moon' during the Great Catastrophe, though the Slann's body was grievously wounded and he took many years to recover from the harm done to him.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Lord Huinitenuchli derrotó a un Príncipe Demonio de Slaanesh mencionado en los archivos como "la cosa del inframundo de la segunda luna" durante la Gran Catástrofe, aunque el cuerpo del Slann fue gravemente herido y tardó muchos años en recuperarse del daño sufrido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Atop this staff is a mystical orrery with which Tetto’eko can alter the trajectory of passing comets.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En la cima de este bastón hay un orrery místico con el cual Tetto’eko puede alterar la trayectoria de los cometas que pasan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As stellar alignments draw near, Tetto’eko can see opportunities for his forces to exploit in the future.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A medida que los alineamientos estelares se acercan, Tetto’eko puede ver oportunidades para que sus fuerzas las exploten en el futuro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Mighty, horned, reptilian beasts, Stegadons are naturally armoured with bony scales and spikes protruding from their crests.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bestias reptilianas poderosas y cornudas, los Stegadons están naturalmente armados con escamas óseas y espinas que sobresalen de sus crestas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: At over a century old, Tetto’eko is ancient for a Skink, yet his mind is quick and his unprecedented ability to predict the future only seems to improve.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con más de un siglo de vida, Tetto’eko es un anciano para un Eslizón, pero su mente sigue siendo ágil y su habilidad sin precedentes para predecir el futuro parece solo mejorar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Skinks have learned that Salamanders are particularly effective at burning foes out of fortifications. So were the wooden palisades of the Norse colonies destroyed and defenders removed from the towers of the beached Black Ark, the Umbral Tide.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Eslizones han aprendido que los Salamandras son particularmente eficaces para quemar a los enemigos de las fortificaciones. Así fueron destruidas las empalizadas de madera de las colonias nórdicas y los defensores fueron expulsados de las torres del Arca Negra encallada, la Marea Umbral.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It has been said that the Lizardmen have never lost a battle with Tetto’eko present. So famous are Tetto’eko’s predictions that he is afforded the same reverence as a Slann - the Temple Guard bowing low as the Skink hovers across the city to attend to his many star-viewings.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se dice que los Hombres Lagarto nunca han perdido una batalla con Tetto’eko presente. Tan famosas son las predicciones de Tetto’eko que se le concede la misma reverencia que a un Slann: la Guardia del Templo se inclina profundamente mientras el Eslizón flota por la ciudad para atender sus numerosos estudios estelares.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Skink Priest was spawned when the true moon obscured the cursed second moon; this was previously seen as an ill omen, but with the coming of Tetto’eko it has now been pronounced as a sign of good fortune.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Sacerdote Eslizón fue engendrado cuando la luna verdadera oscureció a la maldita segunda luna; anteriormente esto se veía como un mal presagio, pero con la llegada de Tetto’eko ahora se considera un signo de buena fortuna.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Tetto'eko's appearance on the battlefield heralds events of such importance that heavenly bodies have been known to realign themselves in his favour.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La aparición de Tetto’eko en el campo de batalla anuncia eventos de tal importancia que los cuerpos celestiales han llegado a realinearse a su favor.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: By Tetto’eko’s predictions, many dire events have been averted before they were allowed to happen. It was Tetto’eko and his precognitive skills that defeated the Skaven forces that massed once again at Quetza. It was Tetto’eko that pointed the great Chameleon Skink Oxyotl towards the hidden enclave of Skaven Assassins that was waiting to ambush Lord Mazdamundi.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Gracias a las predicciones de Tetto’eko, se han evitado muchos eventos nefastos antes de que pudieran ocurrir. Fue Tetto’eko y sus habilidades precognitivas quienes derrotaron a las fuerzas Skaven que se reunían nuevamente en Quetza. Fue Tetto’eko quien señaló al gran Eslizón Camaleón Oxyotl hacia el enclave oculto de Asesinos Skaven que aguardaban para emboscar al Señor Mazdamundi.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those sensitive to the skeins of destiny can feel its precarious balance as well as sense Tetto’eko’s uncanny ability to shift the winds of fate his own way.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos sensibles a los hilos del destino pueden sentir su precario equilibrio, así como percibir la extraordinaria habilidad de Tetto’eko para inclinar los vientos del destino a su favor.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Mighty beasts of groaning iron and brass, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bestias poderosas de hierro y bronce rechinantes, más altas que un hombre y poseedoras de una masa aplastante.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "We will slaughter them all, and laugh as they beg for mercy. It will be a good day."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Los mataremos a todos, y nos reiremos mientras suplican por misericordia. Será un buen día."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Gran Sabueso de la Guerra tiene una sed eterna de sangre y matanza, su rabia se manifiesta en el espíritu marcial imparable de sus guerreros.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las turbas de Bárbaros obtienen una movilidad aún mayor cuando conducen sus toscos carros hechos de hueso y madera, ensamblados con las entrañas y tendones de los vencidos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "My Master is the Beginning and he is the End. He is the Master of mortals, and the core of our Dead Hearts. Deny him and you deny yourselves. Honour him, and acknowledge he to whom we owe it all."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Mi Maestro es el Principio y es el Fin. Es el Amo de los mortales, y el núcleo de nuestros Corazones Muertos. Negadlo, y os negáis a vosotros mismos. Honradlo, y reconoced a aquel a quien le debemos todo."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Styrbjorn's army is usually largely assembled from his loyal berserker warriors, also known as Savages, they are a brutal sect of Northmen warriors, known chiefly for being subject to terrifying battle-frenzies.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El ejército de Styrbjorn está compuesto en gran medida por sus leales guerreros berserkers, también conocidos como Salvajes. Son una secta brutal de guerreros norteños, conocidos principalmente por sucumbir a aterradoras frenesíes de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Styrbjorn has slain tens of thousands of foes in battle, and has amply demonstrated the favour of his god Khorne by doing so. The Jarl's naturally prodigious strength is further augmented by an unnatural constitution, as the blessings of his god has made him capable to shrug off even the most terrible of blows with ease.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Styrbjorn ha matado a decenas de miles de enemigos en combate y ha demostrado ampliamente el favor de su dios Khorne al hacerlo. La fuerza prodigiosa del Jarl, que ya era natural, se ve incrementada por una constitución sobrenatural, ya que las bendiciones de su dios le permiten resistir incluso los golpes más terribles con facilidad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Styrbjorn's ascension to the throne saw his clan grow in power and influence, his daring leadership and peerless battle skill bringing victory on countless raids staged against the traditional foes of the tribe.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La ascensión de Styrbjorn al trono vio crecer a su clan en poder e influencia, gracias a su liderazgo audaz y sus incomparables habilidades en combate, que le trajeron victoria en innumerables incursiones contra los enemigos tradicionales de la tribu.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Only a foolish hunter returns to the same hunting ground every day. A wise hunter varies his hunts, so as not to hunt any one of his prey-flocks to extinction."
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Solo un cazador necio regresa todos los días al mismo terreno de caza. Un cazador sabio varía sus cacerías, para no llevar a la extinción a ninguno de sus rebaños de presas."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Strovengaard's wolves will follow its Jarl, defending his person with great savagery and scant regard for their own lives.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los lobos de Strovengaard seguirán a su Jarl, defendiendo su persona con gran ferocidad y con poco cuidado por sus propias vidas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The steeds of Chaos are vicious mounts enveloped in thick plate barding - coal-black chargers infused with Daemon blood and a temperament to match.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los corceles del Caos son monturas feroces envueltas en gruesas bardas de placas: cargadores negros como el carbón, impregnados con sangre de Demonio y un temperamento que lo refleja.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A Gorebeast Chariot is a massive construction of hell-forged metal, mutant beast and jagged blade, ridden to war by some of the most powerful and bloodthirsty warriors in the world.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un Carro de Bestia Sangrienta es una construcción masiva de metal forjado en el infierno, bestias mutantes y hojas dentadas, llevado a la guerra por algunos de los guerreros más poderosos y sedientos de sangre del mundo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Every skull taken in the Blood God's honour proves this one's loyalty to the Skull Throne.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cada cráneo tomado en honor al Dios de la Sangre demuestra la lealtad de este guerrero al Trono de los Cráneos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of the Hound in even the most dire situations.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Se necesita un líder en el campo de batalla, capaz de reunir a las fuerzas del Sabueso incluso en las situaciones más desesperadas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Hatred is such a simple emotion, and one so easy for mortals to be consumed by.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El odio es una emoción simple y tan fácil de consumir a los mortales.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: No magic can deter one driven by the murderous force of fury.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ninguna magia puede disuadir a quien está impulsado por la fuerza asesina de la furia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The steeds of Chaos are vicious mounts enveloped in thick plate barding - coal-black chargers infused with Daemon blood and a temperament to match.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los corceles del Caos son monturas feroces envueltas en gruesas bardas de placas: cargadores negros como el carbón, impregnados con sangre de Demonio y un temperamento que lo refleja.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Even Chaos Lords struggle to tame Manticores, so for an exalted one to break the will of such a ferocious monstrosity? Then she must surely be destined for greatness.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Incluso los Señores del Caos luchan por domar a las Mantícoras, así que, ¿que un exaltado logre doblegar la voluntad de una monstruosidad tan feroz? Eso significa que seguramente está destinado a la grandeza.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Hrefna's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under her command.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El pozo de rabia eterna de Hrefna nunca se seca, ni el flujo constante de guerreros ansiosos por servir bajo su mando.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The favour of Hound is earned in blood and the brutal decimation of His foes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El favor del Sabueso se gana con sangre y la brutal devastación de Sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: This brutal Hero of Khorne decimates the lands of man and monster alike – the avatar or wrath incarnate!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Este brutal Héroe de Khorne devasta las tierras de hombres y monstruos por igual: ¡el avatar de la ira encarnada!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The raging fire of hate manifests itself in battle, immolating enemies in its smouldering heat.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El fuego ardiente del odio se manifiesta en la batalla, inmolando a los enemigos con su calor abrasador.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Delighting in death and suffering, these savage warriors follow their ignoble Lord wherever he goes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Deleitados por la muerte y el sufrimiento, estos guerreros salvajes siguen a su ignominioso Señor dondequiera que vaya.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquellos que no doblan la rodilla ante los Dioses del Norte pronto ven todo lo que aprecian obliterado frente a ellos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El intenso frío y la oscuridad casi constante del lejano norte crean un tipo particular de asesino.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los más dignos de la vanguardia del Caos son bendecidos con las mutaciones más elaboradas, que también les permiten moverse más rápido durante más tiempo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Solo las criaturas más feroces pueden sobrevivir en el norte congelado; las más fuertes son reunidas para la guerra y forzadas al hambre para volverlas más salvajes, listas para la próxima batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¿Qué magia puede penetrar el odio abrasador en las mentes de los seguidores más brutales del Dios de la Sangre?

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "We will slaughter them all, and laugh as they beg for mercy. It will be a good day."
