character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Los mataremos a todos, y nos reiremos mientras suplican por misericordia. Será un buen día."

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: It should be no surprise that a race without a shred of honour or decency between them have even less regard for each other's lives.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No debería ser sorprendente que una raza sin un pedazo de honor ni decencia entre ellos tenga aún menos respeto por la vida de sus semejantes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A specially-engineered breed of Rat Ogre, the Bonebreaker has a braced platform strapped or bolted to its back for carrying a Skaven Warlord to battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Una raza especialmente diseñada de Ogre Rata, el Quebrantahuesos tiene una plataforma reforzada atada o atornillada a su espalda para llevar a un Señor de la Guerra Skaven a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: For the gaudier Warlord, Clan Moulder offers their most bloated Pox Rats as mounts to flail, crush, and savage a way through the enemy’s ranks.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Para el Señor de la Guerra más ostentoso, el Clan Moulder ofrece sus Ratas de Plaga más hinchadas como monturas para abrirse paso entre las filas enemigas a golpes, aplastamientos y mordiscos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Though Feskit is no longer as physically impressive as he has once been, his mind is still sharp, and what he can't protect with strength, he defends with cunning.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aunque Feskit ya no es tan impresionante físicamente como lo fue en su momento, su mente sigue siendo aguda, y lo que no puede proteger con fuerza, lo defiende con astucia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under Feskit's leadership, Clan Mordkin has recovered much of the wealth and influence it had lost in the preceding centuries.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo el liderazgo de Feskit, el Clan Mordkin ha recuperado gran parte de la riqueza e influencia que había perdido en los siglos previos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Feskit's personal clawband, the Mordrat Guard displays a most un-skaven loyalty to their leader. This is chiefly because Feskit's patronage ensured that they seldom saw battle – after all, the warlord scarcely desired to risk his most reliable warriors and thus leave himself vulnerable to rival.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La banda personal de Feskit, la Guardia Mordrat muestra una lealtad muy poco Skaven hacia su líder. Esto se debe principalmente a que el patrocinio de Feskit aseguraba que rara vez veían batalla; después de todo, el señor de la guerra apenas deseaba arriesgar a sus guerreros más confiables y así dejarse vulnerable ante los rivales.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Clan Mordkin was one of the many Warlord Clans to fight against the Undead legions of Nagash. Inspired by the fearsome sight of the walking dead, and wishing to intimidate any rivals, the Skaven of Clan Mordkin has taken to adorning themselves with the bones of their foes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Clan Mordkin fue uno de los muchos Clanes de Señores de la Guerra que lucharon contra las legiones de No Muertos de Nagash. Inspirados por la temible visión de los muertos vivientes, y deseando intimidar a cualquier rival, los Skaven del Clan Mordkin han comenzado a adornarse con los huesos de sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: To this day, the Skaven of Clan Mordkin remain obsessed with death. They are instantly recognisable for their fearsome appearance and they still frequently incorporate bones and skulls into their armour.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Hasta el día de hoy, los Skaven del Clan Mordkin siguen obsesionados con la muerte. Son instantáneamente reconocibles por su apariencia temible y aún incorporan frecuentemente huesos y calaveras en su armadura.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Only the bravest warriors are able to withstand the ominous rattling sound this magical halberd makes. It is one of the most powerful items Feskit has gathered during his years of ruling Clan Mordkin and he carries it into the battle with a sense of pride and accomplishment.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Solo los guerreros más valientes son capaces de soportar el ominoso sonido que produce esta alabarda mágica. Es uno de los objetos más poderosos que Feskit ha reunido durante sus años de gobierno del Clan Mordkin y lo lleva a la batalla con un sentido de orgullo y logro.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: An unholy battle altar dedicated to the Great Horned Rat, its ominous tolling strikes awe into evil Skaven hearts and fear into their opponents.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un altar de batalla profano dedicado a la Gran Rata Cornuda, cuyo ominoso repicar llena de asombro los corazones de los malvados Skaven y de temor a sus oponentes.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "They stand staring into the sun for enternity, the physical embodiedment of the everlasting gods. Terrible ye who looked into their divine forms! "
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Se quedan mirando al sol por la eternidad, la encarnación física de los dioses eternos. ¡Terribles aquellos que miren sus formas divinas!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Powerful, elite warriors who ride atop giant snake-shaped statues given to them as a reward for their prowess and utter dedication to their sovereign lord.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Guerreros poderosos y de élite que montan sobre estatuas gigantes en forma de serpiente que se les otorgan como recompensa por su destreza y absoluta dedicación a su señor soberano.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When the trap is sprung, several horrifying, snake-like forms burst from the ground to surround their prey. The Sepulchral Stalkers impale their foes on ornate staves before they even realize they are under attack.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando la trampa se activa, varias formas horribles y serpenteantes emergen del suelo para rodear a su presa. Los Acechadores Sepulcrales traspasan a sus enemigos con bastones ornamentados antes de que siquiera se den cuenta de que están siendo atacados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "That which was stone, arise! Bone and bronze and leather and tar, creature of power awake and visit destruction on the enemies of Khemri!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Lo que era piedra, resucita! Hueso, bronce, cuero y alquitrán, criatura de poder despierta y lleva la destrucción a los enemigos de Khemri!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Beware the guardians of the Underworld who stalk among us!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Cuidado con los guardianes del Inframundo que acechan entre nosotros!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Tougher than normal necroserpents, this Ramhotep's creation is a monstrous mount that shatters bones with every swipe of its tail and sink scimitar-sized fangs deep into soft flesh.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Más duras que las necroserpientes normales, esta creación de Ramhotep es una monstruosa montura que destroza huesos con cada golpe de su cola y hunde colmillos del tamaño de cimitarra profundamente en la carne blanda.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El orgullo de los ejércitos de Nehekhara, impactando las líneas enemigas con fuerza capaz de destrozar huesos y triturando los cadáveres bajo sus pesadas ruedas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Giant leonine statues, almost impervious to harm; they wade through foes, crushing them like bothersome insects.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Estatuas leoninas gigantes, casi impenetrables al daño; se abren paso entre los enemigos, aplastándolos como insectos molestos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: With his army of walking statues, Ramhotep intends to pull down the cities of those who defiled his work, slay the inhabitants of these uncultured civilisations, and construct his greatest monument to date: a vast mausoleum built from the bones of his foes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con su ejército de estatuas ambulantes, Ramhotep pretende derribar las ciudades de aquellos que profanaron su obra, matar a los habitantes de estas civilizaciones incultas y construir su mayor monumento hasta la fecha: un vasto mausoleo hecho con los huesos de sus enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Upon awakening from his death sleep, Ramhotep was horrified, and he set about excavating and restoring his marvels at once. Ramhotep's skill in undeath is as skilled as it was in life, and the statues that receive his attention are restored to their former majesty, striding into battle as if they were carved only yesterday.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Al despertar de su sueño de muerte, Ramhotep se horrorizó, y se dedicó a excavar y restaurar sus maravillas de inmediato. La habilidad de Ramhotep en la no-muerte es tan hábil como lo fue en vida, y las estatuas que reciben su atención son restauradas a su antigua majestad, marchando a la batalla como si hubieran sido esculpidas ayer mismo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: His craftsmanship was second to none, and it is said that his statues in the Valley of Kings were so lifelike that it is said that the kings of Nehekhara believed the gods themselves had returned to the mortal world.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Su destreza no tenía igual, y se dice que sus estatuas en el Valle de los Reyes eran tan realistas que se dice que los Reyes Sacerdotes de Nehekhara creyeron que los dioses mismos habían regresado al mundo mortal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ramhotep the Visionary was perhaps the greatest Necrotect in history. His craftsmanship was second to none, and it is said that his statues in the Valley of Kings were so lifelike that the Priest Kings of Nehekhara believed the gods themselves had returned to the mortal world.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Ramhotep el Visionario fue quizás el mayor Necroteco de la historia. Su destreza no tenía igual, y se dice que sus estatuas en el Valle de los Reyes eran tan realistas que los Reyes Sacerdotes de Nehekhara creyeron que los dioses mismos habían regresado al mundo mortal.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In ancient Nehekhara, the finest artisans were commissioned to build grand burial tombs and upon completion they were expected to commit ritual suicide. Ramhotep was aghast at the thought, for it would deny the world of the beautiful creations he had yet to make. Thus, Ramhotep would manipulate the more arrogant Necrotects of the age to take his place.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En la antigua Nehekhara, los mejores artesanos fueron encargados de construir grandes tumbas funerarias y, al completarlas, se esperaba que cometieran suicidio ritual. Ramhotep se horrorizó ante la idea, pues negaría al mundo las hermosas creaciones que aún no había hecho. Así, Ramhotep manipularía a los Necrotecos más arrogantes de la época para tomar su lugar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuidado con el aguijón del escorpión, oculto bajo las arenas del desierto, pero siempre dispuesto a atacar.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Aquel cuya voluntad trasciende la muerte puede golpear desde más allá de la tumba, con efectos devastadores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Tutankhanut has led his army to many victories. Fighting in the thick of battle his golden form deflects even the most powerful attacks.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Tutankhanut ha llevado a su ejército a muchas victorias. Luchando en el fragor de la batalla, su forma dorada desvía incluso los ataques más poderosos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Tutankhanut arises from his tomb, resplendent in his golden body and death mask, the still living people of Numas hearken to his call, perceiving him as blessed by the gods.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando Tutankhanut se levanta de su tumba, resplandeciente en su cuerpo de oro y máscara mortuoria, los aún vivos de Numas escuchan su llamado, viéndolo como bendecido por los dioses.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El orgullo de los ejércitos de Nehekhara, impactando las líneas enemigas con fuerza capaz de destrozar huesos y triturando los cadáveres bajo sus pesadas ruedas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Destreros muertos desde hace mucho tiempo, despertados para servir a sus amos no-muertos mucho más allá de la muerte.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Look, I want it golden, GOLDEN, got it? Good, now get to work my loyal subjects!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "Mira, quiero que sea dorado, ¡DORADO, ¿entendido?! Bien, ¡ahora pongan manos a la obra mis leales súbditos!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Hunting is not just something I do, it's part of who I am!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Cazar no es solo algo que hago, es parte de quién soy!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: According to the Nehekharan beliefs in the afterlife the gods would bestow each king with a body of gold. Tutankhanut was furious to find this was not the case and demanded that his priests fashion him such a body.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Según las creencias nehekhara en la vida después de la muerte, los dioses otorgarían a cada rey un cuerpo de oro. Tutankhanut se enfureció al descubrir que esto no era así y exigió que sus sacerdotes le fabricaran tal cuerpo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Unencumbered by heavy armour or barding, a Tomb King's skeletal cavalry legions maintain a punishing pace as they traverse the scorching deserts of Nehekhara.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Despojados de pesadas armaduras o bardas, las legiones de caballería esquelética de un Rey de la Tumba mantienen un ritmo implacable mientras atraviesan los abrasadores desiertos de Nehekhara.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: You can never have too much gold, right?
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Nunca se tiene demasiado oro, ¿verdad?

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Under his rule, life has returned to the desert and once again crops grow around the city of Numas. Numas is a marvellous place, and over many centuries the pyramids have been restored to their former glory.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Bajo su gobierno, la vida ha regresado al desierto y nuevamente los cultivos crecen alrededor de la ciudad de Numas. Numas es un lugar maravilloso, y durante muchos siglos las pirámides han sido restauradas a su antigua gloria.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In life, Tutankhanut was renowned as a particularly skilled bowman, even when speeding along the plains on his war chariot.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En vida, Tutankhanut fue reconocido como un arquero particularmente hábil, incluso cuando recorría las llanuras a gran velocidad en su carro de guerra.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: In Numas, life has returned to the desert and once again crops grow around the city. Numas is a marvellous place, and over many centuries the pyramids have been restored to their former glory.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: En Numas, la vida ha regresado al desierto y nuevamente los cultivos crecen alrededor de la ciudad. Numas es un lugar maravilloso, y durante muchos siglos las pirámides han sido restauradas a su antigua gloria.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The steeds of Chaos are vicious mounts enveloped in thick plate barding - coal-black chargers infused with Daemon blood and a temperament to match.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los corceles del Caos son monturas feroces envueltas en gruesas bardas de placas: cargadores negros como el carbón, impregnados con sangre de Demonio y un temperamento que lo refleja.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como parte del ritual de vinculación, los cuerpos de los Chilladores son aplastados y transmutados en aspectos inverosímiles.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Champions of Tzeentch are amongst the most magically attuned of all Chaos Champions and Chaos Lords, warriors that combine the raw brute strength of the tribes of the Northmen with the magical powers of Chaos itself.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Campeones de Tzeentch están entre los más sintonizados mágicamente de todos los Campeones del Caos y Señores del Caos, guerreros que combinan la fuerza bruta de las tribus de los Hombres del Norte con los poderes mágicos del Caos mismo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Champions of Tzeentch are brightly adorned, with crests and elaborate capes and panoply, their Chaos Armour is decorated in dazzling colours, inlaid with bands of gold and bluish-silver and constructed from strangely curving components.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Campeones de Tzeentch están adornados con colores brillantes, con penachos, capas elaboradas y panoplias. Su Armadura del Caos está decorada con colores deslumbrantes, incrustada con bandas de oro y plata azulada, y construida con componentes de formas extrañas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The power Tzeentch, the Chaos God of change and intrigue, grants his Champions allows them to become masters of magic, which mixed with their skill in combat, makes them truly powerful foes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El poder que Tzeentch, el Dios del Caos del cambio y las intrigas, otorga a sus Campeones les permite convertirse en maestros de la magia, lo que, combinado con sus habilidades en combate, los convierte en enemigos verdaderamente poderosos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Winds of Magic twist and churn around Tzeentch's almighty Paragons of Change.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Vientos de la Magia se retuercen y agitan alrededor de los poderosos Paladines del Cambio de Tzeentch.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "The Eagle protects me, for I am but a vessel of change!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡El Águila me protege, porque soy solo un recipiente del cambio!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The arcane fire of Tzeentch shall never be quenched!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: ¡El fuego arcano de Tzeentch nunca será apagado!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: When Melekh left for the Chaos Wastes, eventually finding a portal into the Realm of Chaos itself. There, he was beset by daemons of Tzeentch, but by mastering his fear, he forced them to submit to his will, enslaving an army of gibbering Horrors, flickering Flamers and rapacious Screamers to protect him.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Cuando Melekh partió hacia los Yermos del Caos, eventualmente encontró un portal al Reino del Caos. Allí fue atacado por demonios de Tzeentch, pero al dominar su miedo, los obligó a someterse a su voluntad, esclavizando a un ejército de Horrores balbuceantes, Llameros chisporroteantes y Chilladores voraces para protegerlo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Screeching through the air like few before them, they would be a wonderous sight to behold if their coming did not always spell death and, as is their namesake, total and utter doom.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Chillando a través del aire como pocos antes que ellos, serían una maravilla de contemplar si su llegada no significara siempre la muerte y, como indica su nombre, una perdición total.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Como parte del ritual de vinculación, los cuerpos de los Chilladores son aplastados y transmutados en aspectos inverosímiles.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las Pesadillas más impresionantes son aquellas criadas con sangre fresca. Monstruosidades tan nobles son monturas dignas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El rugido de una Manticora garantiza hacer huir a los mortales, pues saben que una criatura del terror está cerca.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Sight of Dieter riding atop the back of a monstrous manticore is not uncommon. Who knows what other monsters he has managed to bound to his will..
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: No es raro ver a Dieter montando sobre una monstruosa manticora. ¿Quién sabe qué otros monstruos ha logrado someter a su voluntad?

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Dieter Helsnicht has an iron will and can bend even the most powerful creatures to his authority.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Dieter Helsnicht tiene una voluntad de hierro y puede doblegar incluso a las criaturas más poderosas bajo su autoridad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: From his dark and evil hiding place Helsnicht has prepared his evil plans to bring death to the Empire for decades. Those who had previously known Dieter Helsnicht in the Empire have either died or forgotten him.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Desde su oscuro y malvado escondite, Helsnicht ha preparado sus planes malignos para llevar la muerte al Imperio durante décadas. Aquellos que conocieron a Dieter Helsnicht en el Imperio han muerto o lo han olvidado.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Dieter, drawn by an irresistible curiosity, travelled to the fortress of Nagashizzar as a young man. What happened to him in that cursed place is not known, but he returned to Middenheim a changed man, his hair turned prematurely grey and his skin tinged with an unhealthy pallor. The Doomlord had been born!
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Impulsado por una curiosidad irresistible, Dieter viajó a la fortaleza de Nagashizzar cuando era joven. Lo que le sucedió en ese lugar maldito no se sabe, pero regresó a Middenheim cambiado: su cabello se volvió prematuramente gris y su piel adquirió un tinte malsano. ¡El Señor de la Perdición había nacido!

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: From his secret fortress hidden deep in the Forest of Shadows the Doom Lord remains a threat to the Empire's security. Shambling corpses and terrifying Wraiths are often seen wondering their abyssal forests, and tales persist that the Doom will approach them eventually.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Desde su fortaleza secreta oculta en el Bosque de las Sombras, el Señor de la Perdición sigue siendo una amenaza para la seguridad del Imperio. Cadáveres tambaleantes y espectros aterradores a menudo son vistos vagando por sus bosques abismales, y persisten los relatos de que la Perdición eventualmente se acercará.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Dieter is a man of deep, if twisted, intelligence and has prepared for every eventuality. He has built a secret fortress deep in the Forest of Shadows to which he could escape should should the need arise.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Dieter es un hombre de inteligencia profunda, aunque retorcida, y se ha preparado para todas las eventualidades. Ha construido una fortaleza secreta en lo profundo del Bosque de las Sombras a la que podría escapar si surgiera la necesidad.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: From all corners of the forest, they come to defend their homes.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: De todos los rincones del bosque, acuden para defender sus hogares.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lord Daith is always tinkering, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption he is working on.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Señor Daith siempre está haciendo ajustes, llamando a estas modificaciones "mejoras", y la mayoría realmente mejoran lo que sea que esté trabajando.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Lord Daith has a lot of experience with different weapons and as such is deadly with any weapon, be it hammer, sword or halberd.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Señor Daith tiene mucha experiencia con diferentes armas y, como tal, es letal con cualquier arma, ya sea martillo, espada o alabarda.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Forge of Starlight is the domain of makers and craftsmen, of the artisans and smiths who create all Athel Loren’s many tools of wonder and war.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La Forja de la Luz de las Estrellas es el dominio de los fabricantes y artesanos, de los herreros y creadores que elaboran todas las maravillosas herramientas de guerra y maravilla de Athel Loren.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Daith is blind, and has been so as long as any have known him, but none of this slows his craftsmanship at the forge. He performs his works by touch, and by the way hot metal changes the taste of the air. Nor does his lack of vision still his tongue, which is just as fiery as his forge.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Daith es ciego y lo ha sido desde que cualquiera lo recuerde, pero nada de esto ralentiza su habilidad en la forja. Realiza sus trabajos por el tacto y por cómo el metal caliente cambia el sabor del aire. Tampoco su falta de visión frena su lengua, que es tan ardiente como su forja.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Some whisper that Daith is older even than Ariel and Orion, that he fled Ulthuan with the first colonists; others claim that it was he who forged Aenarion’s Dragon armour. For such to be true, Daith would have to be many thousands of years old — something that would be considered near-impossible in any realm other than timeless Athel Loren.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos susurran que Daith es incluso más viejo que Ariel y Orion, que huyó de Ulthuan con los primeros colonos; otros afirman que fue él quien forjó la armadura de dragón de Aenarion. Para que esto fuera cierto, Daith tendría que tener miles de años de edad, algo que se consideraría casi imposible en cualquier reino fuera del atemporal Athel Loren.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: A hunter is nothing without a quiver of reliable arrows. Usually the skilled archers of the Glade Guard fashion their own arrows, but they might make an exception with the arrows that comes out of Forge of Starlight.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Un cazador no es nada sin un carcaj de flechas fiables. Por lo general, los habilidosos arqueros de la Guardia del Claro fabrican sus propias flechas, pero podrían hacer una excepción con las flechas que salen de la Forja de la Luz de las Estrellas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Forged by the blind priests of the Elven God of Smiths, and imbued with his skill and shrewdness, the hammer crushes all it touches.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Forjado por los sacerdotes ciegos del Dios Herrero Élfico, e imbuido con su habilidad y astucia, el martillo aplasta todo lo que toca.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Naieth's mortal form seems to shimmer and fade as she links her allies to the prophecies of the stars.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: La forma mortal de Naieth parece brillar y desvanecerse mientras enlaza a sus aliados con las profecías de las estrellas.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Calling upon the spirits of air, Naieth sends mighty winds howling across the battlefield.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Invocando a los espíritus del aire, Naieth envía poderosos vientos aullando por todo el campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Naieth the Prophetess is skilled in the arcane art of divination. Only a select band of mages know this secret lore. By means of divining rods cut from magical trees they are able to 'feel' the flow of magic deep within the ground.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Naieth la Profetisa es hábil en el arte arcano de la adivinación. Solo un selecto grupo de magos conoce este saber secreto. Mediante varitas adivinas hechas de árboles mágicos, son capaces de 'sentir' el flujo de la magia profundamente en el suelo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Naieth has gained quite a following amongst her kindred mages. Spellsingers from all of Wood Elf realms have joined her host in order to learn her ancient arcane ways.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Naieth ha ganado una gran cantidad de seguidores entre sus congéneres magos. Los cantores de hechizos de todos los reinos de los Elfos Silvanos se han unido a su hueste para aprender sus antiguos caminos arcanos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Naieth has become so adept at interpreting changes in the flow of magic that she is know throughout Loren as The Prophetess.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Naieth se ha vuelto tan experta en interpretar los cambios en el flujo de la magia que es conocida en todo Loren como La Profetisa.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Changes in the flow of magic can be detected using the divining rods and used to predict impending danger or the presence of intruders in the forest.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los cambios en el flujo de la magia pueden ser detectados usando varitas adivinas y usarse para predecir el peligro inminente o la presencia de intrusos en el bosque.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Naieth is always accompanied by her faithful companion Othu the Owl. When not flying around the battlefield Othu rests on Naieth's wrist. Naieth is able to understand the owl's twitterings and knows how to interpret his strange wisdom.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Naieth siempre está acompañada por su fiel compañero Othu el Búho. Cuando no vuela por el campo de batalla, Othu reposa en la muñeca de Naieth. Naieth puede entender los trinos del búho y sabe interpretar su extraña sabiduría.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The bond between rider and steed goes beyond friendship or family; they act as one.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El vínculo entre jinete y corcel va más allá de la amistad o la familia; actúan como uno solo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Vuela en tus alas, como un águila. Toca el sol. Rastrea al enemigo, embosca y vence.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: With its magnificent frame and the great plumes of steam of its snorting breath, the Great Stag instils unflinching valour into those who ride it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Con su magnífica figura y los grandes vapores de su resoplido, el Gran Ciervo inspira un valor inquebrantable en aquellos que lo montan.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Stardust Globes are crystal orbs filled with trickster's special concoctions that will make anyone caught in their way an easy prey for Wychwethyl and his followers.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los Globos de Polvo de Estrellas son orbes de cristal llenos de la especial mezcla del embaucador que convierten a cualquiera atrapado en su camino en una presa fácil para Wychwethyl y sus seguidores.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter attacks.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: El Dios Embaucador conoce todo tipo de artimañas y trucos que pueden usarse para contrarrestar ataques.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Some Wood Elf warriors are adorned with all manner of tattoos and warpaint that grant them the blessing of their gods. Such Talismanic Tattoos can ward against all manner of attacks, sometimes even those utilising magic.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Algunos guerreros elfos del bosque están adornados con todo tipo de tatuajes y pinturas de guerra que les otorgan la bendición de sus dioses. Tales Tatuajes Talismanes pueden proteger contra todo tipo de ataques, incluso los que emplean magia en ocasiones.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Eldrazor is the patron of duellists and of those who yearn to fight battles - at least if the combatant fights for a just cause, rather than out of mindless barbarism.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Eldrazor es el patrón de los duelistas y de aquellos que ansían luchar en batallas, al menos si el combatiente lucha por una causa justa, y no por una barbarie sin sentido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Gran parte de la guerra es un arte. Con el tiempo y mucha práctica, los movimientos de combate pueden parecer una serie de movimientos de danza perfectamente ensayados.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: There are paths and secret ways located in Athel Loren that only Wychwethyl and his kin know about.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Hay senderos y caminos secretos en Athel Loren que solo Wychwethyl y sus parientes conocen.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wychwethyl knows an ancient and secret war dance which he uses in battle with deadly efficiency.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Wychwethyl conoce una danza guerrera antigua y secreta que usa en batalla con letal eficiencia.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: All of Wychwethyl's Wardancers are sublime warriors, made even more deadly through their ancient war dances. For these, the favoured rituals of the Trickster God, no rhythm is called nor are orders issued. Instead, the dancers instinctively enact a pattern of lethal movements, complementing the dances performed by the rest of the troupe.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Todos los Bailarines Guerreros de Wychwethyl son guerreros sublimes, aún más mortales gracias a sus antiguas danzas guerreras. En estas, los rituales favoritos del Dios Embaucador, no se llama a ningún ritmo ni se emiten órdenes. En cambio, los bailarines ejecutan instintivamente un patrón de movimientos letales, complementando las danzas realizadas por el resto de la tropa.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wychwethyl leaps and pirouettes through the enemy ranks to music only he hears, gracefully evading his opponent’s clumsy blows and ending his life with an impossibly swift to strike of his own.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Wychwethyl salta y gira entre las filas enemigas al ritmo de una música que solo él oye, evadiendo con gracia los golpes torpes de su oponente y terminando su vida con un golpe imposible de rápido.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: "Take your swords, put your helmets on and may Loec guide you, for we march to war!"
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: "¡Tomad vuestras espadas, poned vuestros cascos y que Loec os guíe, porque marchamos a la guerra!"

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: All who have seen Wychwethyl the Wild in battle and lived to tell about it have praised his savagery in melee.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Todos los que han visto a Wychwethyl el Salvaje en batalla y han vivido para contarlo han elogiado su salvajismo en el combate cuerpo a cuerpo.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Wychwethyl carries the Drum of Orcskin which is made from the stretched skin of an Orc warlord slain at the battle of the Glade of Woe and beaten with a drumstick made from his rib-bone.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Wychwethyl lleva el Tambor de Piel de Orco, hecho con la piel estirada de un caudillo orco asesinado en la batalla del Claro del Lamento y tocado con un palo hecho de su hueso costal.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: As these deadly creatures gain momentum, balefire flickers from their eyes and nostrils, giving the impression that the chariot has galloped straight from the realm of nightmares into reality.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: A medida que estas criaturas mortales ganan impulso, el fuego funesto parpadea desde sus ojos y fosas nasales, dando la impresión de que el carro ha galopado directamente desde el reino de las pesadillas hacia la realidad.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The Dark Gods reward any pragmatic technological advances devised to wage war in their names by greatly improving their capabilities and performance.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los Dioses Oscuros recompensan cualquier avance tecnológico pragmático ideado para librar guerra en sus nombres, mejorando enormemente sus capacidades y rendimiento.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: "My name? Long ago such worthless details fell from memory. I know only the lust for glorious battle - for blood, for victory! I seek only the Eye of Tzeentch - his favour, his grace, his Dark Gifts - that through them, I may be remade - reborn!"
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: "¿Mi nombre? Hace mucho que tales detalles inútiles cayeron de la memoria. Solo conozco el deseo de una gloriosa batalla - ¡por sangre, por victoria! Busco solo el Ojo de Tzeentch - su favor, su gracia, sus Oscuros Regalos - para que, a través de ellos, pueda ser rehecho - ¡renacido!"

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: "Why do we raid your lands? Why do we burn your homes? Why do we flay your flesh? To serve the Lord of Change and his magnificent designs."
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: "¿Por qué saqueamos tus tierras? ¿Por qué quemamos tus hogares? ¿Por qué desollamos tu carne? Para servir al Señor del Cambio y a sus magníficos diseños."

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Unlike Malekith, who claims to be Khaine's mortal avatar purely for the accompanying political advantage, Tullaris is the Lord of Murder's true herald.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: A diferencia de Malekith, que afirma ser el avatar mortal de Khaine únicamente por la ventaja política que esto conlleva, Tullaris es el verdadero heraldo del Señor del Asesinato.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Under Tullaris' command, the Executioners have partaken in such cold-blooded destruction that they have gained a fearful reputation across the world.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Bajo el mando de Tullaris, los Ejecutores han participado en tal destrucción a sangre fría que han ganado una temible reputación por todo el mundo.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: When the Executioners first formed a bodyguard for the Hag Queen on a journey to Naggarond, she chose Tullaris to lead it.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Cuando los Ejecutores formaron por primera vez una guardia personal para la Reina Bruja en un viaje a Naggarond, ella eligió a Tullaris para liderarla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Even Witch Elves are wary of his anger, and no few Brides of Khaine have found their necks upon Tullaris' chopping block.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Incluso las Elfas Brujas son cautelosas ante su ira, y no pocas Novias de Khaine han encontrado sus cuellos sobre el bloque de cortar de Tullaris.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Hay un gran placer en la humillación y el sufrimiento de los demás; este ha sentido y disfrutado de ello.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: So notorious has Tullaris become within the city of Har Ganeth and beyond that the rumour of his presence sets an unassailable fear in his enemies' quivering flesh, and the merest glimpse of his blood-encrusted armour has been known to rout foes from the battlefield.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Tan notorio se ha vuelto Tullaris dentro de la ciudad de Har Ganeth y más allá que el rumor de su presencia siembra un miedo inquebrantable en la carne temblorosa de sus enemigos, y el mero vistazo a su armadura empapada en sangre ha sido suficiente para hacer huir a los enemigos del campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Unlike Malekith, who claims to be Khaine's mortal avatar purely for the accompanying political advantage, Tullaris is the Lord of Murder's true herald.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: A diferencia de Malekith, que afirma ser el avatar mortal de Khaine únicamente por la ventaja política que esto conlleva, Tullaris es el verdadero heraldo del Señor del Asesinato.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Under Tullaris' command, the Executioners have partaken in such cold-blooded destruction that they have gained a fearful reputation across the world.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Bajo el mando de Tullaris, los Ejecutores han participado en tal destrucción a sangre fría que han ganado una temible reputación por todo el mundo.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: When the Executioners first formed a bodyguard for the Hag Queen on a journey to Naggarond, she chose Tullaris to lead it.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Cuando los Ejecutores formaron por primera vez una guardia personal para la Reina Bruja en un viaje a Naggarond, ella eligió a Tullaris para liderarla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Even Witch Elves are wary of his anger, and no few Brides of Khaine have found their necks upon Tullaris' chopping block.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Incluso las Elfas Brujas son cautelosas ante su ira, y no pocas Novias de Khaine han encontrado sus cuellos sobre el bloque de cortar de Tullaris.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Hay un gran placer en la humillación y el sufrimiento de los demás; este ha sentido y disfrutado de ello.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: So notorious has Tullaris become within the city of Har Ganeth and beyond that the rumour of his presence sets an unassailable fear in his enemies' quivering flesh, and the merest glimpse of his blood-encrusted armour has been known to rout foes from the battlefield.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Tan notorio se ha vuelto Tullaris dentro de la ciudad de Har Ganeth y más allá que el rumor de su presencia siembra un miedo inquebrantable en la carne temblorosa de sus enemigos, y el mero vistazo a su armadura empapada en sangre ha sido suficiente para hacer huir a los enemigos del campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Sabiendo que es el raro plan el que sobrevive al contacto con el enemigo, pero estando preparado para todas las eventualidades, eleva a este por encima de los meros planificadores.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The old Loremaster is so imbued with magic that enemies find it inexplicably difficult to judge the distance to their foes, seeing their targets receding before their eyes
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: El viejo Maestro de Sabiduría está tan imbuido de magia que los enemigos encuentran inexplicablemente difícil juzgar la distancia a sus enemigos, viendo sus objetivos retroceder ante sus ojos.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: This one is no apprentice in the high magic but a master of True Magic and winds of Qhaysh.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Este no es un aprendiz de la alta magia, sino un maestro de la Verdadera Magia y de los vientos de Qhaysh.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: "Our duty is clear. If you cannot stand against them, then we will take a force and destroy these rat-things that prey upon you. Make way."
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: "Nuestro deber es claro. Si no puedes enfrentarte a ellos, entonces tomaremos una fuerza y destruiremos estas cosas-ratón que se alimentan de ti. Haz espacio."

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: These days Belannaer sits in the White Tower and reflects upon a lifetime of study. He is painfully aware that his duties have not yet ended. He senses that a greater challenge lies ahead, and that his powers will be sorely tested before he is allowed to find peace.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Hoy en día Belannaer se sienta en la Torre Blanca y reflexiona sobre una vida de estudio. Es dolorosamente consciente de que sus deberes aún no han terminado. Siente que un mayor desafío está por delante, y que sus poderes serán severamente puestos a prueba antes de que se le permita encontrar paz.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Training for decades have made Belannaer a Loremaster of Hoeth, invariably gifted warrior, for his intellects find even the exacting disciplines of the Swordmasters almost childishly easy to master.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: El entrenamiento durante décadas ha convertido a Belannaer en un Maestro de Sabiduría de Hoeth, un guerrero excepcionalmente dotado, pues su intelecto encuentra incluso las disciplinas rigurosas de los Espadachines casi infantiles de tan fáciles de dominar.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Those who seek greater understanding of the world may turn to Hoeth for knowledge and guidance.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Aquellos que buscan un mayor entendimiento del mundo pueden recurrir a Hoeth para obtener conocimiento y guía.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The Book of the Phoenix tells the ancient legend of Asuryan – an allegorical story of the fate of all civilizations, of birth, growth, glory, decline and eventual destruction. By reading one of the verses of the book, Belannaer may gain one of several effects, unless the book is destroyed or nullified by some means.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: El Libro del Fénix cuenta la antigua leyenda de Asuryan — una historia alegórica sobre el destino de todas las civilizaciones, del nacimiento, crecimiento, gloria, declive y eventual destrucción. Al leer uno de los versos del libro, Belannaer puede obtener uno de varios efectos, a menos que el libro sea destruido o anulado de alguna manera.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: This verse will double the strength of Belannaer
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Este verso duplicará la fuerza de Belannaer.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: This verse will allow Belannaer to cast one of his spells without expending energy.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Este verso permitirá a Belannaer lanzar uno de sus hechizos sin gastar energía.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: "My Master is the Beginning and he is the End. He is the Master of mortals, and the core of our Dead Hearts. Deny him and you deny yourselves. Honour him, and acknowledge he to whom we owe it all."
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: "Mi Maestro es el Principio y es el Fin. Es el Amo de los mortales, y el núcleo de nuestros Corazones Muertos. Negadlo, y os negáis a vosotros mismos. Honradlo, y reconoced a aquel a quien le debemos todo."

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Banquetearse con la sangre de los enemigos masacrados puede atraer la atención, y quizás el favor, del Sabueso.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The Hound's unearthly fury is personified by its Champions' thirst for war and hunger for unending blood and violence.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: La furia sobrenatural del Sabueso se personifica en la sed de guerra de sus Campeones y su hambre de sangre y violencia sin fin.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Lo que no se ofrece como tributo a los Dioses Oscuros del Norte es cosechado por sus sirvientes para su propio beneficio mezquino.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Hunting teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: La caza enseña a un guerrero no solo cuándo disparar, sino dónde, lo que marca una gran diferencia.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: None know better the secrets of Ghur, the Lore of Beasts, than those who have mastered its Lore.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Nadie conoce mejor los secretos de Ghur, el Saber de las Bestias, que aquellos que han dominado su Saber.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Wardancers roam Athel Loren in tighdy knit troupes, treading paths and secret ways that few others know or dare use.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los Bailarines Guerreros recorren Athel Loren en pequeñas y estrechas compañías, recorriendo caminos y senderos secretos que pocos otros conocen o se atreven a usar.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Few take up the Ranger’s glaive without having suffered tragedy at the hands of the Wildwood’s denizens. Most have lost a loved one to a changeling; others have experienced firsthand the destruction caused by the rampage of an insane Treeman.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Pocos toman la alabarda del Guardabosques sin haber sufrido una tragedia a manos de los habitantes del Bosquesalvaje. La mayoría ha perdido a un ser querido a manos de un cambiante; otros han experimentado de primera mano la destrucción causada por la furia de un Hombre Árbol enloquecido.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Waywatchers are silent sentinels, the guardians of the paths leading into Athel Loren. They are masters of concealment, and can lie unmoving and unnoticed for days on end before springing an ambush on a startled and unfortunate prey.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los Exploradores son centinelas silenciosos, los guardianes de los senderos que conducen a Athel Loren. Son maestros del camuflaje y pueden permanecer inmóviles e inadvertidos durante días antes de lanzar una emboscada sobre una presa desprevenida y desafortunada.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: When the Wood Elves go to war, they do so in partnership with the creatures of the forest. Many of Athel Loren’s beasts understand the perils that constandy threaten the forest, and offer their services willingly
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Cuando los Elfos Silvanos van a la guerra, lo hacen en asociación con las criaturas del bosque. Muchas de las bestias de Athel Loren comprenden los peligros que constantemente amenazan al bosque y ofrecen sus servicios voluntariamente.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Those that claim the honour of the Lady's Champion benefit from her protection even more than Knights who have supped from the Grail.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Aquellos que reclaman el honor de ser el Campeón de la Dama reciben su protección aún más que los Caballeros que han bebido del Grial.

character_skills_localised_name_mixu_brt.value_translated: Gran Maestro de los Caballeros de Origo

character_skills_localised_name_mixu_cst.value_translated: La Mano Derecha del Rey Pirata

character_skills_localised_name_mixu_emp.value_translated: El Poder de la Sangre y la Cerveza

The Key to the Eternity Chamber

Maestro de Saber, Saber de las Bestias

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: A master of forest beasts and nature, always willing to help those in need.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Una maestra de las bestias del bosque y la naturaleza, siempre dispuesta a ayudar a quienes lo necesitan.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: The Bretonnian coastline will be unsafe now that the one of the greatest protectors of it is dead..
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: La costa bretoniana será insegura ahora que uno de sus mayores protectores está muerto...

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Perhaps he should've chosen the life of a Hermit Knight instead?
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Quizás debería haber elegido la vida de un Caballero Ermitaño en su lugar.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: ...will always beat youth and exuberance."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: ...siempre vencerán a la juventud y el entusiasmo."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "If only the Duke wasn't too honorable to hide, then perhaps he could defend the Forest of Arden."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "Si tan solo el Duque no fuera demasiado honorable para esconderse, tal vez podría defender el Bosque de Arden."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Not so holy now, m'lord? Lying back in your own pigsty, if only your watery tart could see you now!
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: ¿No tan santo ahora, mi señor? Reposando en tu propio chiquero, ¡si tan solo tu dama acuática pudiera verte ahora!

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Mixing alcohol and violence never ends well, does it?
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Mezclar alcohol y violencia nunca termina bien, ¿verdad?

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Defeated Molokh Slugtongue
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Derrotado Molokh Slugtongue

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Apparently even a master manipulator can be outsmarted, the Changer of Ways won't be too happy about this or was it all according to his plan anyway?
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Al parecer, incluso un maestro manipulador puede ser superado en astucia. El Transformador de Caminos no estará muy contento con esto, ¿o era todo parte de su plan?

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Kindly take your boat and get off MY ISLAND! If I see you here ever again, there is going to be trouble, you hear me!
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: ¡Amablemente lleva tu barco y sal de MI ISLA! Si vuelvo a verte aquí, habrá problemas, ¿me oyes?

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Not enough bullets or liquor, but you can be sure about one thing, lad, he'll be back.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: No hubo suficientes balas ni licor, pero de algo puedes estar seguro, muchacho, él volverá.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Once again the Great King has been defeated, but no doubt he will come back one day, meanwhile his infamous treasure hall is open for visitors..
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Una vez más el Gran Rey ha sido derrotado, pero sin duda regresará algún día; mientras tanto, su infame sala del tesoro está abierta para los visitantes...

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Sometimes even the oldest grumbler will fall from grace.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: A veces incluso el más viejo gruñón caerá en desgracia.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: The threat of civil war by the other Elector Counts is usually so pressing that any rebels are forced to give it up, but not anymore.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: La amenaza de guerra civil por parte de los otros Condes Electores suele ser tan apremiante que cualquier rebelde se ve obligado a rendirse, pero ya no más.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "The shield of devotion is a poor substitute for proper armor."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "El escudo de la devoción es un pobre sustituto para una armadura adecuada."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "Sometimes the hunter becomes the hunted"
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "A veces, el cazador se convierte en la presa."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: We hunt them to keep their numbers down. It's good for the environment.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Los cazamos para mantener su número bajo. Es bueno para el medio ambiente.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "It's better to swim in the sea below, than to swing in the air and feed the crow."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "Es mejor nadar en el mar abajo, que colgar en el aire y alimentar al cuervo."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: If you don't hate me yet, don't worry...Your time will come.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Si aún no me odias, no te preocupes... Tu momento llegará.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Perhaps Marius should have listened to his warhorse, this time...
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Quizás Marius debería haber escuchado a su caballo de guerra, esta vez...

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: This is MY LAND, not yours!
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: ¡Esta es MI TIERRA, no la tuya!

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "And as we lay here prostrate, Nordland and Talabecland plot to land the final blow..."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "Y mientras yacemos aquí postrados, Nordland y Talabecland traman dar el golpe final..."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Never underestimate the value of a good commander and devastating cavalry charges.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Nunca subestimes el valor de un buen comandante y las devastadoras cargas de caballería.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: After all that hype and that's the best you got? HA! My grandmother can hit harder than you!
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Después de toda esa fama, ¿y eso es lo mejor que tienes? ¡JA! Mi abuela golpea más fuerte que tú.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: This won't change the past, but at least the King can sleep easier now, knowing the most heinous of urk treachery has been at least partially avenged.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Esto no cambiará el pasado, pero al menos el Rey puede dormir más tranquilo ahora, sabiendo que la más atroz de las traiciones de los orcos ha sido al menos parcialmente vengada.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: The renowned knowledge of the Loremaster did not aid him in his hour of need. Perhaps he should have remained in the White Tower!
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: El renombrado conocimiento del Maestro del Saber no le ayudó en su hora de necesidad. ¡Quizás debería haberse quedado en la Torre Blanca!

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: It is said that the Phoenix Guard receive a vision of their demise from Asuryan himself. If so, it certainly did not prepare the Captain for his doom.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Se dice que la Guardia del Fénix recibe una visión de su muerte de Asuryan mismo. Si es así, ciertamente no preparó al Capitán para su destino.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Who's going to save the Phoenix King now? Alastar?
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: ¿Quién va a salvar al Rey Fénix ahora? ¿Alastar?

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Accidents in the woods happen to even the most experienced warriors.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Los accidentes en el bosque les ocurren incluso a los guerreros más experimentados.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Now that the mists are weaning off, the vaults of Xlanhuapec awaits undefended for adventures brave enough to venture into mist.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Ahora que las nieblas se disipan, las bóvedas de Xlanhuapec esperan indefensas para los aventureros lo suficientemente valientes como para adentrarse en la niebla.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: You shouldn't always trust predictions from soothsayers, even the greatest can be wrong sometimes.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: No siempre deberías confiar en las predicciones de los adivinos, incluso los más grandes pueden equivocarse a veces.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "Bleh! You talk too much, oh mighty Champion of the Blood God"
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "¡Bleh! Hablas demasiado, oh poderoso Campeón del Dios de la Sangre."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: The Bretonnian coastline is safe once again, or is it?
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: La costa bretoniana está segura una vez más, ¿o no?

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: May the dead lay where they are buried, now and in the future.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Que los muertos permanezcan donde están enterrados, ahora y en el futuro.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Whoever defeats this ancient Nehekharan prince shall be infected with a gold fever.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Quien derrote a este antiguo príncipe Nehekhare será infectado con una fiebre dorada.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: He spent decades to prepare for this and it still wasn't enough. Back to the drawing board, I guess.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Pasó décadas preparándose para esto, y aún así no fue suficiente. De vuelta a la mesa de diseño, supongo.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: "Now that the supposed "God of Smithing" has been dealt with, shall we raid his armoury?"
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: "Ahora que el supuesto "Dios de la Herrería" ha sido eliminado, ¿saqueamos su arsenal?"

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Sticks and stones may break your bones even if you have magical protection.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Los palos y las piedras pueden romper tus huesos incluso si tienes protección mágica.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Defeated Wychwethyl the Wild
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Derrotado Wychwethyl el Salvaje

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: He had an unfortunate encounter with zombie pirates and is now eager to encounter them again.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Tuvo un desafortunado encuentro con piratas zombis y ahora está ansioso por encontrarlos de nuevo.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: You may not know it yet, but she will steal your heart, one way or the other. It is inevitable!
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Puede que aún no lo sepas, pero ella robará tu corazón, de una forma u otra. ¡Es inevitable!

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Someone ruined The Mad Count's favourite shirt, this is a great insult to the entire Averland and the person responsible will be caught and executed.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Alguien arruinó la camisa favorita del Conde Loco, lo cual es una gran ofensa para todo Averland, y la persona responsable será atrapada y ejecutada.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Marius believes himself to be invincible and charges off to smite his foes.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Marius se cree invencible y carga para abatir a sus enemigos.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Marius recites poetry, does impressions of the Reiksmarshal and sings bawdy songs about rotund maidens and let's not forget that moment when he rode an imaginary horse, Daisy was SO jealous after that.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Marius recita poesía, imita al Reichsmarshal y canta canciones obscenas sobre doncellas rollizas. Y no olvidemos aquel momento en que montó un caballo imaginario; Daisy estuvo MUY celosa después de eso.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: The Mad Count casually mocks his foe's equipment, fashion senses and fould odours.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: El Conde Loco se burla casualmente del equipo, el sentido de la moda y los olores nauseabundos de su enemigo.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Leitdorf is convinced that both his allies and his own shadow are out to get him.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Leitdorf está convencido de que tanto sus aliados como su propia sombra están conspirando contra él.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Marius consults with his advisor Daisy Kurt von Helboring II and has immediately figured how to solve his most troublesome issues.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Marius consulta con su asesor Daisy Kurt von Helboring II y resuelve de inmediato sus problemas más molestos.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: If there are no bones, there is no future.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Si no hay huesos, no hay futuro.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Everything is beautiful when the eyes just get used to it.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Todo es hermoso cuando los ojos se acostumbran a ello.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: There's a difference between harmless collection and obsession..
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Hay una diferencia entre una colección inofensiva y una obsesión.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: Easy come, easy go.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Fácil viene, fácil se va.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: This one has seen the blessings of the great changer.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Este ha visto las bendiciones del gran transformador.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_original: This one has seen the blessings of the great changer.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_mixu_.value_translated: Este ha visto las bendiciones del gran transformador.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh2_t.value_original: "Lord Khaine. I send you this meagre offering, the first of many, on your night, Death Night. Let this be a sign of the compact between us, and lend your strength to me. Let the murders I commit this night be in your name and for your glory."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh2_t.value_translated: "Señor Khaine. Te envío esta humilde ofrenda, la primera de muchas, en tu noche, la Noche de la Muerte. Que esto sea una señal del pacto entre nosotros, y préstame tu fuerza. Que los asesinatos que cometa esta noche sean en tu nombre y para tu gloria."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh2_t.value_original: "Enlightenment is achieved by mastering not only the body, but the soul. Only then can a warrior truly understand the value of life and why it should be protected at all costs."
character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh2_t.value_translated: "La iluminación se alcanza dominando no solo el cuerpo, sino también el alma. Solo entonces un guerrero puede entender verdaderamente el valor de la vida y por qué debe protegerse a toda costa."

character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh2_t.value_original: Caradryan is the present day Captain of the Phoenix Guard, and wielder of the Phoenix Blade.
character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh2_t.value_translated: Caradryan es el actual Capitán de la Guardia del Fénix y portador de la Hoja del Fénix.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh_dl.value_original: Win a siege battle in a Frozen climate region
character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh_dl.value_translated: Gana una batalla de asedio en una región de clima helado

character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh_dl.value_original: Win a siege battle in a Frozen climate region
character_trait_levels_colour_text_wh_dl.value_translated: Gana una batalla de asedio en una región de clima helado

character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_translated: El Rey Kazador derrotó a Gorfang Rotgut
El Duque Adalhard derrotó a Egil Styrbjorn
Derrotado el Señor de la Guerra Feskit
"La última danza de Wychwethyl terminó... abruptamente."

character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_original: At the start of your turn, have at least 500 bones in your [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Pile of Bones
character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_translated: Al comienzo de tu turno, ten al menos 500 huesos en tu [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Montón de Huesos

character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_original: At the start of your turn, have at least 1500 bones in your [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Pile of Bones
character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_translated: Al comienzo de tu turno, ten al menos 1500 huesos en tu [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Montón de Huesos

character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_original: At the start of your turn, have at least 3000 bones in your [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Pile of Bones
character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_translated: Al comienzo de tu turno, ten al menos 3000 huesos en tu [[img:mixu_skv_bones]][[/img]]Montón de Huesos

character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_original: Nothing to see here, i'm supposed to be hidden..
character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_translated: Nada que ver aquí, se supone que estoy oculto...

character_trait_levels_onscreen_name_mix.value_original: The Sire of a Thousand Drunkards

character_trait_levels_onscreen_name_wh2.value_translated: Capitán de la Guardia del Fénix

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Establish a Tzeentch Cult||You do not capture the settlement but instead establish a Tzeentch Cult inside it. From there, you can corrupt and leech off the occupier without them being aware of your presence…
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Establecer un Culto de Tzeentch||No capturas el asentamiento, sino que estableces un Culto de Tzeentch dentro de él. Desde allí, puedes corromper y aprovecharte del ocupante sin que este sea consciente de tu presencia…

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Establish a Pirate Cove||You do not capture the settlement but instead establish a Pirate Cove inside it. From there, you can conduct business and leech off the occupier without them being aware of your presence…
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Establecer una Cala Pirata||No capturas el asentamiento, sino que estableces una Cala Pirata dentro de él. Desde allí, puedes llevar a cabo negocios y aprovecharte del ocupante sin que este sea consciente de tu presencia…

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Raze||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: (Arrasar||Todos los edificios son destruidos y el asentamiento es incendiado.)

cultures_subcultures_battle_playstyle_de.value_original: Tzeentch is a race that excels at spellcasting, missile firepower and flying units. Its units are protected by a magical barrier that absorbs damage and is replenished when not taking damage. Casting spells generates favour from Tzeentch that can be used on the following army abilities:
cultures_subcultures_battle_playstyle_de.value_translated: Tzeentch es una raza que sobresale en lanzamiento de hechizos, potencia de fuego a distancia y unidades voladoras. Sus unidades están protegidas por una barrera mágica que absorbe daño y se regenera cuando no reciben daño. Lanzar hechizos genera el favor de Tzeentch, que puede usarse en las siguientes habilidades del ejército:

custom_loading_screen_components_localis.value_original: Not for nothing is Tzeentch known as the Great Deceiver, the Changer of Ways. Ever does he seek to guide mortals along paths destined to increase his own power, showing favour to those who use cunning or influence to manipulate and control the world, and watching in delight as his conspiracies unfold. The Master of Subtlety, his plots are infinitely complex and interwoven. He is the principal architect of secret alliances between his brother Gods, and also the Lord of the Grand Betrayal.
custom_loading_screen_components_localis.value_translated: No por nada Tzeentch es conocido como el Gran Conspirador, el Cambiador de Caminos. Siempre busca guiar a los mortales por senderos destinados a aumentar su propio poder, mostrando favor a aquellos que utilizan la astucia o la influencia para manipular y controlar el mundo, y observando con deleite mientras se desarrollan sus conspiraciones. El Maestro de la Sutileza, sus planes son infinitamente complejos e interconectados. Es el principal arquitecto de las alianzas secretas entre sus hermanos Dioses, y también el Señor de la Gran Traición.

custom_loading_screen_components_localis.value_original: Wychwethyl the Wild has been tasked to restore the Forest of Gloom or as the locals call it, Vale of Webs, to it's former glory by Ariel, the Queen of Athel Loren. A task well suited for one of Loec's kin and his merry crew of dancers.
custom_loading_screen_components_localis.value_translated: Wychwethyl el Salvaje ha recibido el encargo de restaurar el Bosque de las Tinieblas o, como lo llaman los lugareños, el Valle de las Telarañas, a su antigua gloria por parte de Ariel, la Reina de Athel Loren. Una tarea bien adecuada para uno de los descendientes de Loec y su alegre grupo de bailarines.
